texts.name: Hero Dice
texts.desc:
Target 1 "Elemental HERO" monster you control; roll a six-sided die and apply an appropriate effect.
 1: Take damage equal to the targeted monster's ATK.
 2: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap you control.
 3: Destroy 1 monster you control.
 4: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
 5: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.
 6: The targeted monster can attack directly this turn.

texts.name: Feather Storm
texts.desc: If you control a "Elemental HERO Avian": Switch the original ATK/DEF of all monsters your opponent controls, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Power Charger
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster you control. If the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle, it gains ATK equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Hero Call
texts.desc: Place 1 monster in your Deck to the top of your Deck.

texts.name: Elemental Mirage
texts.desc: When an "Elemental HERO" monster you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Return all monsters that you control that were destroyed by that effect to the field in the same battle positions they were in.

texts.name: Good Hero
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster with 1000 or less ATK/DEF from your Deck, and equip it with this card. It gains 300 ATK for each "Elemental HERO" monster you control. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

texts.name: Tag Request
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" monster from your hand with an ATK equal to that monster's.

texts.name: Effect Shut
texts.desc: When your opponent activates an Effect Monster's effect: Negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Impact Flip
texts.desc: Once per turn, you can flip 1 face-down Defense Position monster your opponent controls face-up. (Flip Effects are not activated at this time). When the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle, send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, both players draw 1 card.
texts.str3: Send top card of opponent's deck to the Graveyard

texts.name: Subspace Battle
texts.desc: Each player reveals 3 monsters from their Deck, one at a time (simultaneously), and the player who reveals a monster with lower ATK than their opponent's takes 500 damage and sends that card to the Graveyard, while the player who reveals a monster with higher ATK adds that card to their hand. (If they have the same ATK, both cards are sent to the Graveyard.) Then, destroy this card.
texts.str1: A player(s) doesn't have enough monsters in their Deck

texts.name: Neos Wiseman (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + 1 "Yubel" monster
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. Before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of that monster, also, gain LP equal to that monster's DEF. When this card is destroyed by battle: You can banish 1 "Yubel" from your Graveyard, then target 1 "Elemental HERO Neos" in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Backdraft
texts.desc: When a FIRE monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

texts.name: Late Hero
texts.desc: When an "Elemental HERO" monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Special Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" monster with 1000 or less ATK from your Deck.

texts.name: Protection of the Elements
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card: Banish 1 "Elemental HERO" monster you control; negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it. The banished "Elemental HERO" monster is returned to the field during the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.

texts.name: Gift of the Weak
texts.desc: Banish 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your hand; draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Legacy of a HERO (Manga)
texts.desc: While you have 2 or more Level 4 or higher "HERO" monsters in your Graveyard: Draw 3 cards.

texts.name: Magician's Library
texts.desc: Add 1 Spell from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Oil
texts.desc: Add 1 FIRE monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

texts.name: Spell Books from the Pot
texts.desc: Both players draw 3 cards.

texts.name: Ma'at (Manga)
texts.desc:
"Winged Kuriboh" + "Light and Darkness Dragon"
You can declare 1 card name; draw 1 card. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field, unless the name of the card you drew is the declared name. Its ATK/DEF is equal to the number of cards you drew with this effect x1000.

texts.name: Mysterious Monolith
texts.desc: This card can be used as an Xyz Material for the Xyz Summon of a Rank 4 Xyz Monster.

texts.name: Ascension Spiral
texts.desc: Banish 1 Xyz Monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed this turn; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks higher than the banished Xyz Monster, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

texts.name: Number 28: Titanic Moth (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 7 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. At the end of the damage calculation, when this card attacks directly: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each card in their hand.
texts.str1: Inflict 500 Damage for each card in opponent's hand

texts.name: Number 77: The Seven Sins (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 12 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy all monsters your opponent controls, then attach all monsters destroyed by this effect to this card as Xyz Materials. If this face-up card would be banished, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card instead.

texts.name: Number 95: Galaxy-Eyes Dark Matter Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc:
3 Level 9 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When this card is Xyz Summoned: It gains ATK equal to the ATK(s) of the monster(s) used as its Xyz Materials. When this card is Special Summoned: You can banish any number of Dragon-Type monsters from your Deck; your opponent banishes an equal number of monsters from their Deck. If this card battles, after damage calculation: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card can make a second attack in a row. When this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish both the opponent's monster and this card.
texts.str3: Banish this card and battled monster

texts.name: Prism Wall
texts.desc: When your opponent targets exactly 1 monster you control (and no other cards) for an attack, or with a monster effect: Target another monster you control that would be an appropriate target; that attack/monster now targets the new target, then, both players take damage equal to the new target's ATK.

texts.name: Queen Butterfly Danaus
texts.desc:
(Quick Effect): You can reduce this card's ATK to 0; Special Summon 3 Level 4 or lower Insect-Type monsters from your Graveyard.

(This card is never treated as a "Butterfly" card.)
texts.str1: Special Summon monsters from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Roachie
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Insect-Type monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Rose Papillon
texts.desc: While there is another Insect-Type monster on the field, this card can attack directly.

texts.name: Defensive Instinct
texts.desc: Change all Insect-Type monsters on the field to Defense Position.

texts.name: Insect Horde
texts.desc: When your opponent's monster declares an attack, Special Summon as many Level 3 or lower Insect-Type monsters as possible from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Regressing Wings
texts.desc: While you control a face-up Reptile-Type monster, negate the effects of all your opponent's monsters until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Primordial Charge
texts.desc: During battle between an attacking Reptile-Type monster you control and a Defense Position monster, inflict Piercing Damage.

texts.name: Dowsing Burn
texts.desc: Banish 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard; destroy 1 monster on the field with the same Type and a lower Level than the banished monster's.

texts.name: Flint Cragger (Anime)
texts.desc: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
texts.str1: Send this card to the Graveyard, inflict 500 Damage to your opponent.

texts.name: DNA Erasure Magic
texts.desc: Declare 1 monster Type. Any monster of the declared Type that is sent to the Graveyard is banished instead.

texts.name: Psychic Wave (Anime)
texts.desc: Send 1 "Jinzo" from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard while you control an Attack Position "Jinzo - Returner": Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of a "Jinzo - Returner" you control.

texts.name: Wings of Silence
texts.desc: Equip only to a Winged Beast-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK, also it is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.

texts.name: Blizzard Vision
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 WATER monster you control with a Level; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster with the same Type, Attribute and Level as that target (ATK 0/DEF 0). (This card is also still a Spell.)

texts.name: Ice Chain
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster from your hand. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Distortion Crystal
texts.desc: If you control a WATER monster: Until the End Phase, if the ATK of a monster(s) your opponent controls would be changed by a certain amount, that amount is doubled.

texts.name: Freezing Point
texts.desc: Target 1 Xyz Monster with no Xyz Materials; its ATK becomes 0.

texts.name: Ice Fire Egg
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed: Target 1 WATER Xyz Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position. Its ATK/DEF become 0, also it is treated as having a Level that is 1 higher than its Rank.

texts.name: Thousand Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand or Deck) by Tributing 1 "Baby Dragon" you control immediately after applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right.

texts.name: Skull Dice (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Roll a six-sided die; its ATK is divided by the number rolled.

texts.name: Graceful Dice (Anime)
texts.desc: Roll 1 six-sided die, then target 1 monster with 500 ATK or less; multiply its ATK by the result.

texts.name: Cross Shift
texts.desc: Swap 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand with any monster you control.

texts.name: Summon Capture
texts.desc: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 monster from it, Normal Summon that monster to your side of the field.

texts.name: Mother Spider (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) if you control no cards. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 3 "Baby Spider" from your Deck.

texts.name: Baby Spider
texts.desc: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Mother Spider": Its Level becomes 5.

texts.name: Ace of Sword
texts.desc:
Target 1 face-up monster on the field; then, toss a coin. Then, apply the following effect:
 Heads: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the targeted monster's ATK.
 Tails: You take damage equal to the targeted monster's ATK.

texts.name: Return of the Doomed (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed in the previous turn to your side of the field.

texts.name: Shadow Toon (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control "Toon World": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Insect Pheromone
texts.desc: Equip only to a "Insect Princess". Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; treat as an Insect-Type monster while it is face-up on the field. If the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle: You can make 1 of your opponent's Insect-Type monsters attack the equipped monster.

texts.name: Treasures of the Dead
texts.desc: Gain 500 LP for each Spell/Trap in your Graveyard.

texts.name: Soul Charge (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon any number of monsters from your Graveyard, then, take 500 damage for each of those monsters, but they cannot attack this turn.

texts.name: Seraphim Blaster
texts.desc: Gains 300 ATK for each Fairy-Type monster on the field.

texts.name: Heaven's Lost Property
texts.desc: Both players draw 3 cards and then discard 2 cards.

texts.name: Angelic Choir
texts.desc: Target 1 Fairy-Type monster you control; it gains 300 ATK for each Fairy-Type monster you control.

texts.name: Xyz Charge Up
texts.desc: If you would take damage from a card effect: Activate this card; that damage becomes 0. You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control gains ATK equal to the amount of damage you would have taken at the activation of this card.
texts.str1: 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control gain ATK

texts.name: Contingency Fee
texts.desc: Your opponent draw cards until they have 6 cards in their hand, then, gain 1000 LP for each card they drew.

texts.name: Life Stream Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + "Power Tool Dragon"
When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can have either player's LP that are lower than 2000 become 2000. (You choose to change your LP first). Neither player takes damage from card effects. Once per turn: You can choose a Level from 1 to 12, and change the Levels of all other Synchro Monsters you control to that Level.
texts.str3: Change your opponent's Life Points to 2000?
texts.str4: Change Levels of all other Synchro Monsters you control

texts.name: Get Your Game On!
texts.desc: Activate only if you were present at the 2007 Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME World Championship. Double the ATK of all "Elemental HERO" and "Neo-Spacian" monsters you control.
texts.str1: Where did this event take place?
texts.str5: What is the deck of the Winner?
texts.str9: What is the name of a winner?
texts.str12: What is the month of the event?
texts.str13: What is the first day of the event?
texts.str14: Name a Promotional Card in the event except this card.

texts.name: Blizzard Jet
texts.desc: Target 1 WATER Winged Beast-Type monster on the field; it gains 1500 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Necro Shot
texts.desc: Equip only to a DARK Warrior-Type monster. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard; banish it. After this effect is used 3 times, destroy this card. When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Send 1 monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.
texts.str1: Target 1 monster in your opponent's graveyard and banish it.

texts.name: Arachno-Cannibalism
texts.desc: Tribute 1 monster you control; increase the Level of all monsters you control by the Tributed monster's Level.

texts.name: Revenge Prison
texts.desc: Target 1 Xyz Monster in your Graveyard that was destroyed; Special Summon it, then Xyz Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster that is 1 Rank higher than that monster, by using that monster as the Xyz Material. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: Despair Struggle
texts.desc: If you would take battle damage while you control no other cards: Make your LP 100 instead, and if you do, draw 1 card for every 1000 damage you would have taken.

texts.name: Spreading Spider Spawn
texts.desc: If you control an Insect-Type monster, Special Summon an Insect-Type monster from your hand.

texts.name: Trap Request
texts.desc: During each of your Standby Phases: choose 1 Trap Card from your opponent's Deck and Set it in their Spell & Trap Zone. It cannot be activated. If it leaves the field, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
texts.str1: Set 1 Trap Card to your opponent's side of the field

texts.name: Whiteout
texts.desc: Negate the effects of monsters your opponent controls that target a card(s) in their hand, their Graveyard, or their side of the field.

texts.name: Level Jar
texts.desc: FLIP: Return all monsters on the field to the Decks. Then, each player must draw cards equal to the combined Levels of their returned monsters, and reveal those cards. If a player doesn't draw 1 of their returned monsters, they must discard all cards they drew.

texts.name: Prediction Princess Tarotrei (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Prediction Ritual". Once per turn: You can change all Flip Effect Monsters you control to face-down Defense Position. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. Once per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can change all face-down Defense Position monsters you control to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Prediction Princess Coinorma (Anime)
texts.desc: FLIP: You can Set 1 Level 4 or lower Flip Effect Monster directly from your hand, Deck or Graveyard. You cannot choose a "Prediction Princess Coinorma" that is in the Graveyard.

texts.name: Prediction Princess Petalelf (Anime)
texts.desc: FLIP: You can change all face-up Attack Position monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position, then monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions until the end of this turn.

texts.name: White Knight Gardna
texts.desc: If you would take battle damage from a battle involving a "White Knight" monster you control: You can banish this card from your Graveyard instead.

texts.name: White Knight Lancer
texts.desc: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

texts.name: White Knight Lord
texts.desc: Cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon (or Set). During your End Phase, if this card did not attack this turn: Take 800 damage. Cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent. When this card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: White Knight Swordsman
texts.desc: While this card is in your Graveyard, all "White Knight" monsters you control gain 300 ATK.

texts.name: Sealed Gate
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can banish 1 "White Knight Swordsman", "White Knight Lancer" and "White Knight Gardna" from your Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "White Knight Lord" from your Deck.

texts.name: Fallout
texts.desc: When you Special Summon a monster: It gains 4000 ATK/DEF, but you cannot conduct your Draw Phase, Standby Phase, Main Phase 1 and Main Phase 2 for the next 5 turns.

texts.name: Stardust Mirage (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a "Stardust Dragon": Return all monsters destroyed this turn to the field in the same battle positions they were in.

texts.name: Intervention of Fate
texts.desc: When your opponent Summons a monster, you can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to activate 1 Normal Spell Card from your hand.

texts.name: Arcanatic Doomscythe
texts.desc: Send 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard. This turn, when an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.
texts.str1: Inflict damage equal to the destroyed monster's ATK

texts.name: Divination of Fate
texts.desc: If a monster you control did not destroy an opponent's monster by battle this turn: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Arcana Force" monster from your hand.

texts.name: Defense Paralysis
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster is changed to Defense Position: Change all monsters your opponent controls to Attack Position.

texts.name: Enemy Controller (Anime)
texts.desc:
Pay 1000 LP and enter commands, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; apply the appropriate effect based on the commands entered to activate this card.
 Up, Left, Down, Right, A = Destroy it.
 Left, Right, A, B = This turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that monster, as if you controlled it.

texts.name: Dormant Volcano
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to your opponent. Then, during your next Standby Phase, both players can add 1 FIRE monster from their Decks to their hands.
texts.str1: Add 1 FIRE monster to your hand?

texts.name: Dowsing Point
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Blue Moon
texts.desc: Activated only with "Shadow Moon". When you activate this card: Destroy 1 face-up Spell/Trap on each player's side of the field, then Special Summon 1 "Homunculus Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 800) to each player's side of the field in Defense Position. While on the field, "Homunculus Tokens" are treated as Continuous Spells and cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

texts.name: Homunculus Token
texts.desc: Special Summoned by the effect of "Blue Moon". This Token is also treated as a Continuous Spell Card and cannot be used as a Tribute for a Tribute Summon.

texts.name: Demiurge Ema
texts.desc: This card gains 800 ATK for each "Homunculus Token" on the field. If this card is destroyed: destroy all "Homunculus Tokens" on the field.

texts.name: Shadow Moon
texts.desc: Send 4 Level 5 or higher monsters with different Attributes from your hand or your side of the field to the Graveyard. Activate 1 "Blue Moon" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard. Then, Special Summon 1 "Demiurge Ema" from your Deck or Graveyard.

texts.name: Guidance to Ore
texts.desc: When a Rock-Type monster you control is destroyed, you can Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with the same name as the destroyed monster.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 monster of the same name

texts.name: Lightning Crash
texts.desc: Add 1 Thunder-Type monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot Normal Summon it this turn.

texts.name: Magical Mallet (Anime)
texts.desc: Shuffle this card and any number of cards from your hand into the Deck, then draw that same number of cards.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Plasma (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card gains ATK equal to half the equipped monster's original ATK and gains the equipped monster's effects. While "D - Force" is face-up on top of your Deck, the effects of all face-up Effect monsters your opponent controls are negated, also, negate the activations and effects of your opponent's Spells/Traps that target a card(s) you control, and if you do, destroy them.

texts.name: Synchro Barrier Force
texts.desc: When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field: Negate that effect, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Synchro Monster you control.

texts.name: Lost Pride
texts.desc: Send 1 Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Add 1 Spell Card from your opponent's Graveyard to your hand. If you activate that card, you take 1000 damage.

texts.name: Dimension Voyage
texts.desc: Special Summon as many of your Synchro Monsters that are banished as possible. Effect Monsters Special Summoned by this effect cannot attack, and their effects are negated. During the End Phase, banish all monsters Special Summoned by this effect.

texts.name: Talisman of Reversal
texts.desc: When a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, except during their Draw Phase: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

texts.name: Revenge Return
texts.desc: If a monster you control is destroyed by battle: Draw 1 card. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard that was destroyed by a card effect this turn; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Hardship
texts.desc: Equip this card to a monster you control. If you would take damage by an opponent's monster's effect: You can reduce the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster to 0; you take no damage from that monster's effect. You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; destroy the equipped monster, then destroy all Equip cards on the field and send them to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Trust Chain
texts.desc: When you activate this card, target 1 face-up monster you control. It gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all face-up Synchro Monsters you control. During the Battle Phase, you can destroy this face-up card to end the Battle Phase. While this card is face-up on the field, Synchro Monsters you control cannot attack.

texts.name: Harmonia Mirror
texts.desc: When your opponent Special Summons a Synchro Monster except by Synchro Summon: Take control of that monster.

texts.name: Scramble Egg (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster you control is destroyed: Special Summon 1 "Sonic Chick" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

texts.name: Crush Star
texts.desc: When a Synchro Monster on the field is destroyed: Target 2 monsters with 1000 or less ATK (1 in your hand and 1 in your Graveyard); Special Summon them in face-up Defense Position.

texts.name: Infernity Spear Bearer
texts.desc: While you have no cards in your hand, this card gains 800 ATK.

texts.name: Infernity Shield Bearer
texts.desc: While you have no cards in your hand this card gains 800 DEF.

texts.name: Multiple Destruction (Anime)
texts.desc: If both players have 3 or more cards in their hand: Each player discards their entire hand, also you lose LP equal to the number of cards you discarded by this effect x 100 (min. 1), then each player draws 5 cards.

texts.name: Toon Briefcase (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster would be Normal Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field: Negate that Summon, and if you do, return it to the Deck.

texts.name: Sword of Soul
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, 1 face-up monster you control gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Flat LV4
texts.desc: If a monster is destroyed by battle: Both players can Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from their Deck.
texts.str2: Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck ?

texts.name: Ruklamba The Spirit King
texts.desc: When you take 1000 or more damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon monsters from your hand whose combined ATK is 2000 or less, in face-up Attack Position.
texts.str2: Special Summon monsters whose combined ATK is 2000 or less

texts.name: Yowie
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned, your opponent skips their next Draw Phase.

texts.name: Mask of Perplexity
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack: Target 1 monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; it becomes the new attack target.

texts.name: Recycling Plant
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Machine-Type Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing monsters from your side of the field or Graveyard as Fusion Materials, and if you do, it can attack this turn, ignoring the Battle City Rules.

texts.name: Watch Tranquilizer
texts.desc: A monster your opponent controls loses ATK equal to its Level x100.

texts.name: Ashingray
texts.desc: FLIP: Your opponent discards 1 card. When this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 "Ashinigray" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: Rainbow Snake Eingana
texts.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Ipiria (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Summoned: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Leading Question
texts.desc: If a Level 4 or lower Fusion Monster you control battles another monster, it gains 800 ATK during the Damage Step only.

texts.name: Sinister Justice
texts.desc: Level 4 or lower Fusion Monsters can attack during the turn they are Fusion Summoned, ignoring the Battle City Rules. If a Level 4 or lower Fusion Monster inflicts battle damage: Gain 800 LP.

texts.name: Penguin Torpedo (Anime)
texts.desc: This card can attack directly. If it does with this effect, destroy it at the end of the Damage Step.

texts.name: Defender Iceberg
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: you can change it to face-up Defense Position. Other WATER monsters you control cannot be targeted for an attack.

texts.name: The Big Server
texts.desc: This card can attack directly. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 "Service Ace" from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, your opponent draws 1 card.

texts.name: Service Ace
texts.desc: Target 1 card in your hand; your opponent must guess whether it is a Spell, Trap or monster, then, reveal it to your opponent. If they guessed wrong, inflict 1500 damage to your opponent. Banish the targeted card after this card resolves.

texts.name: Super Guard
