texts.name: Ruby Dragon
texts.desc: With the entire body covered with ruby, this dragon's appearance is very beautiful. It doesn't like fighting and has very high defense power.

texts.name: Shadow Balance
texts.desc:
When your opponent Summons a monster(s), and they controls more monsters than you do: Destroy monsters your opponent controls until both players control the same number of monsters.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card.)

texts.name: Dice Dungeon
texts.desc:
If you control no monsters, destroy this card. When a monster battles another monster: each player rolls a six-sided die and their monster gains these effects until the end of the Damage Step:
 1: It loses 1000 ATK
 5: Its original ATK is halved
 6: Its original ATK is doubled

texts.name: Banderillero Fiend
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned.

texts.name: Synchro Prominence
texts.desc: Each player who controls a Synchro Monster(s) can inflict 1000 damage to their opponent.

texts.name: Burst Synchro Summon
texts.desc: When you would take damage from an opponent's card effect: You take no damage, also, Special Summon 1 Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck with ATK equal to the damage you would have taken, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but its effects are negated.

texts.name: Meteor Wave
texts.desc: Target 1 Synchro Monster you control; until the End Phase, it gains 300 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

texts.name: Necro Sacrifice
texts.desc: Target 1 Level 5 or higher monster in your hand; Special Summon monsters from your Graveyard to your opponent's side of the field equal to the number of Tributes required to Normal Summon that monster. (Your opponent chooses the battle position(s) of the Summoned monster(s).) During this turn, you can Normal Summon the targeted monster without Tributing.

texts.name: Vision
texts.desc: Draw 1 card and reveal it. Then, shuffle it into your Deck. Once during this Duel, if that card or a card with the same name is played, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Performapal Camelump (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, during your Battle Phase: You can target 1 monster you control; if it targets an opponent's monster for an attack, that monster loses 800 DEF, also if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. These effects last until the end of the Battle Phase.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is destroyed by battle: You can target the monster that destroyed it; that target loses 800 ATK.

texts.name: Guard Off
texts.desc: The DEF of all monsters currently on the field becomes 0, then inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each monster you control that has 0 DEF.

texts.name: Trick Buster
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control no monsters: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed.

texts.name: Shark Spark
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card: Negate that activation and if you do, destroy that card.

texts.name: Fish Spawn
texts.desc: Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 2 "Fish Spawn Tokens" (Fish-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).

texts.name: Fish Spawn Token
texts.desc: Special Summoned by the effect of "Fish Spawn"

texts.name: Sea King's Verdict
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card during the Battle Phase: Negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Overlay Connection
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control that has no Xyz Material; attach this card to it as an Xyz Material. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard because it was sent there to activate the target's effect: You can pay 1000 LP; attach this card to that target as an Xyz Material.

texts.name: Edict of Atlantis
texts.desc: During the turn this card was activated, each time a WATER monster(s) is Summoned, you can increase the Level of those WATER monsters by 2.

texts.name: Shark Lair
texts.desc: Activate by sending 1 Fish-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Monsters your opponent controls with less ATK than the sent monster's ATK cannot attack.

texts.name: Plate Salvage
texts.desc: Until the End Phase of the 2nd turn after this card's activation, negate the effects of all Field Spells on the field.

texts.name: Deep Sea Attack
texts.desc: Send 1 WATER monster with 2000 or more ATK from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 1 monster you control; it can attack directly this turn.

texts.name: Underwater Snow Prison
texts.desc: Target 1 monster on the field; banish it, and if you do, take 1000 damage if it was a WATER monster.

texts.name: Upswell
texts.desc: If an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle: Target 1 WATER monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target, but reduce its original ATK by 1000.

texts.name: Break Stream
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control; this turn, if it attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. Also, this turn, each time it destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it.

texts.name: Aqua Mirage
texts.desc: Equip only to a WATER monster. If the equipped monster is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, you can treat this card as an Xyz Material for that Summon, with the same Level as the equipped monster. You can only use 1 "Aqua Mirage" per Xyz Summon.
texts.str1: Xyz Summon using this monster as 2 Xyz Materials

texts.name: Cross Draw of Destiny
texts.desc: Both players draw 1 card and reveal it, then if either of those cards was a monster, each player Special Summons their monster to their opponent's side of the field in face-up Defense Position, and if either player does, the Summoning player(s) gains LP equal to the ATK of the monster they Summoned.

texts.name: Infinity Tooth
texts.desc: Send 1 card from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard for each Xyz Material currently attached to a monster your opponent controls, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: Rank-Up Rising
texts.desc: When a WATER monster you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Depth Gardna
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if you would take battle damage from a direct attack: That damage becomes 0, then Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Fish-Type/WATER/Level 5/ATK ?/DEF ?). (This card is also still a Trap.) This card's ATK/DEF become equal to the amount of battle damage you would have taken at the activation of this card.

texts.name: Duo of the Seven Emperors
texts.desc: When you take battle damage from an attack involving a "Number C" monster your opponent controls: Special Summon 1 "Number C102: Archfiend Seraph" and 1 "Number C103: Ragnafinity" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) Their effects are negated.

texts.name: Damage Rebound
texts.desc: When an effect that would inflict damage to a player(s) is activated: That damage becomes 0, and if it does, your opponent shuffles 1 face-up card they control into the Deck, then, if that card was a monster on the field, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK on the field.

texts.name: Neutrino Dowsing
texts.desc: When an Xyz Monster is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field: Detach 1 Xyz Material from a "Galaxy-Eyes" Xyz Monster you control; send 1 Normal Spell from your Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, you can activate the effect of the card sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

texts.name: Tachyon Refresh
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control; banish it, then return it to the field.

texts.name: Jelly Rain
texts.desc: The Attribute of all face-up monsters currently on the field become WATER.

texts.name: Celestial Rage
texts.desc:
Destroy 1 LIGHT monster you control. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; 1 monster you control gains 2000 ATK, also all battle damage your opponent takes from attacks involving that monster is also inflicted to you. These changes last until the End Phase of this turn.

(This card is never treated as a "Celestial" card.)

texts.name: Contract with Don Thousand (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying 2000 of your opponent's LP; each player draws 1 card. Each time a player(s) draws a card(s), that player must reveal it, and if it is a Spell, they cannot Normal Summon for the rest of this turn.

texts.name: Chaos Caller
texts.desc: If you control a "Number C" monster: Send 1 "Contract with Don Thousand" you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 3 Xyz Monsters from your Extra Deck with "Number C101" through "Number C107" in its name, ignoring their Summoning conditions, but their effects are negated.

texts.name: Galaxy Rebirth
texts.desc: Target 1 "Galaxy" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. Its ATK is halved. During your End Phase, if the equipped monster did not inflict battle damage to your opponent this turn: Destroy it. If the equipped monster is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, you can treat this card as a monster with a Level equal to the equipped monster's Level and use it as an Xyz Material for that Xyz Summon.

texts.name: Chaos Tempest Draw
texts.desc: If you control both a "C" Xyz Monster and a card in your Spell & Trap Zone: Destroy all Spells/Traps on the field, and if you do, draw 1 card for each card destroyed. Cards drawn by this effect cannot be activated this turn.

texts.name: Dragonroid
texts.desc: While this card is in the Graveyard, it is treated as a Dragon-Type monster.

texts.name: Extra Hundred
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: Target the attack target; that target cannot be destroyed by battle. During this turn, if an opponent's monster battles with that target, it can attack once again, and when that target is targeted for an attack: Its ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the attacking monster +100.

texts.name: Cyber Repairer
texts.desc: Your opponent draws 1 card. During this turn, Machine-Type monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Desperado Battle
texts.desc: During your Battle Phase: Target 1 face-up monster you control; It loses 1000 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase, and can attack twice during this turn.

texts.name: Magical Tomb
texts.desc: Choose 1 card from your opponent's Deck and place it underneath this card, then shuffle your opponent's Deck. During the End Phase of the turn this card leaves the field, add the card that was underneath this card to your opponent's hand.

texts.name: Umbral Horror Refresh
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster whose current ATK is different than its original ATK; its ATK becomes its original ATK, and if it does, gain LP equal to the change in ATK.

texts.name: Umbral Horror Retaliation
texts.desc: When an "Umbral Horror" monster you control is destroyed by battle: Destroy the monster that destroyed it.

texts.name: Jelly Bind
texts.desc: If you control a WATER monster: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its effect(s) are negated, also it cannot attack. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Deep Current
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: Negate the attack, and if you do, end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Receding Tide
texts.desc: When a monster is Set: Change that monster to face-up Defense Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

texts.name: Full Armored Xyz
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Xyz Monster that you own; Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster, and if you do, equip that target to the Xyz Monster you Xyz Summoned by this effect. The equipped monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, you can send the monster equipped to it with this effect to the Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Trap Trip
texts.desc: Target 1 Trap Card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Supersonic Skull Flame (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Skull Flame" in your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each "Burning Skull Head" in your Graveyard.

texts.name: Slime Ball
texts.desc: When a monster is Special Summoned: Destroy that monster, and gain LP equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Great Sword
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK, and can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Warrior-Type monster.

texts.name: Acid Slime
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Clone Slime
texts.desc: When this face-up card is targeted for an attack: You can send this card to the Graveyard to target 1 "Slime" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that monster in the same Battle Position as this card, and switch the attack target to that monster.

texts.name: Draw Slime
texts.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Multiple Slime
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon 3 "Slime Tokens" (Aqua-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) in Attack Position.

texts.name: Slime Base
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 "Slime" monster from your hand.

texts.name: Jammer Slime
texts.desc: When an opponent's Spell/Trap Card is activated: Discard 1 "Slime" monster; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Chthonian Soldier (Anime)
texts.desc: When this monster is destroyed by battle: Your opponent takes any battle damage you took from that battle.

texts.name: Discord (Anime)
texts.desc: Neither player can Synchro Summon.

texts.name: Lock Dragon
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) when a Counter Trap Card you control negates the activation of an opponent's card(s) or effect(s) and cannot Special Summoned by other ways. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, neither player can Special Summon.

texts.name: Despised Reality
texts.desc: Activate only during your opponent's turn. This turn, your opponent can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from their Deck. If they do, draw 2 cards. If not, you take 1000 damage during the End Phase.

texts.name: Potatoman
texts.desc: A man potato. He is friend of Carrotman and Onionman.

texts.name: Carrotman
texts.desc: A man carrot. He is friend of Potatoman and Onionman.

texts.name: Onionman
texts.desc: A man onion. He is friend of Carrotman and Potatoman.

texts.name: Curry Fiend Roo
texts.desc: This card gains 200 ATK for each "Spice" card in your Graveyard and 300 ATK for each banished monster.

texts.name: Curry Pot
texts.desc: Any monster sent to the Graveyard is banished instead. If "Carrotman", "Potatoman" and "Onionman" that you own are currently banished by this effect (Quick Effect): You can banish all monsters on the field; Special Summon 1 "Curry Fiend Roo" from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Mix Spice Garamasala
texts.desc: Add 3 "Spell Spice" cards from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Spell Spice Caraway
texts.desc: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent and gain 200 LP.

texts.name: Red Pepper Spice
texts.desc:
Target 1 monster you control; it gains 300 ATK until the End Phase. After this effect resolves, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 300 ATK until the End Phase.

(This card is always treated as an "Spell Spice" card.)

texts.name: Spell Spice Cinnamon
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Attack Position monster you control and 1 face-up Defense Position monster your opponent controls; Change your monster to face-up Defense Position, and change your opponent's monster to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Counter Spice Cumin
texts.desc: When a monster you control is destroyed: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand in Attack Position.

texts.name: Xyz Crown
texts.desc: Equip only to an Xyz Monster. Its Rank is treated as its Level instead. If the equipped monster is used as an Xyz Material, you can treat it as 2 monsters.

texts.name: Skull Base
texts.desc: If this card is Tributed for a Tribute Summon: you can draw 1 card.

texts.name: Guardraw
texts.desc: Change 1 face-up Attack Position monster you control to face-up Defense Position, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: Fife and Drum Corps
texts.desc: Double the ATK of all monsters you control with 1000 or less ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Eucalyptus Mole
texts.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Koala" monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Demand Man
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your opponent's Main Phase: you can target 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls; change it to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Schrdinger's Cat
texts.desc:
When you draw a card(s) except during your Draw Phase or by the effect of "Schrdinger's Cat", you can reveal the drawn card(s), then return them into your Deck. Then, draw cards equal to the number of returned cards.

(This card is always treated as a "Neko" card and it is never a "Cat" card.)

texts.name: Singularity Fiend
texts.desc: When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can send this card and 1 Spell from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the Special Summon, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Battle Constant
texts.desc: Banish 1 monster, Continuous Spell, and Continuous Trap you control; Special Summon 1 "Brain Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Brain Dragon
texts.desc: During your Draw Phase, you can draw 2 more cards in addition to your normal draw. Then, place 2 cards from your hand on the top of your Deck in any order.

texts.name: Monster Register
texts.desc: Activate only by paying 1000 LP. If a monster(s) is Summoned: Its controller sends cards from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard equal to the Level(s) of the Summoned monster(s).

texts.name: Fake Life
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: Target that monster; negate the attack and gain LP equal to its ATK.

texts.name: Split Defender
texts.desc: If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters and you control no monsters: Take control of the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the highest DEF (your opponent's choice, if tied).

texts.name: Damage Reactor
texts.desc: If you would take damage from a card effect: That damage becomes 0, also 1 face-up monster you control gains 800 ATK.

texts.name: Upshift
texts.desc: Target the 1 face-up monster you control with the highest Level; the Levels of all other face-up monsters you currently control become the current Level of that monster, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Life Regeneration
texts.desc: During your turn, when you would take damage from a card effect: Gain an equal amount of LP, instead.

texts.name: Final Offering
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Target 1 card in your hand; add it to another player's hand, then end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Xyz Trip
texts.desc: When an opponent's Xyz Monster declares an attack: Pay LP equal to the ATK of the attacking monster; end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Armor Ninjitsu Art Of Revival
texts.desc: Target 1 "Ninja" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

texts.name: Iron Draw (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control exactly 2 Machine-Type monsters: Draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Armor Ninjitsu Art of Teleportation
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up "Ninja" monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Ninja" monster from your hand whose ATK is less than or equal to the ATK of the target. During this turn, the target and the monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot declare an attack.

texts.name: Galaxy Stealth Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 Dragon-Type monsters
You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand.

texts.name: Ghost Salvage
texts.desc: When a WATER Xyz Monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon that monster and all the monsters (max. 2) that were used for its Xyz Summon from your Graveyard. Their effects are negated.

texts.name: Gagaga X Gagaga
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 "Gagaga" monster you control; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster with the same name, Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target. (This card is also still a Spell.) When that target leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Surging Erosion
texts.desc: Destroy 1 face-up Field Spell on the field, and if you do, all WATER monsters currently on the field gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Toon Kingdom (VG)
texts.desc: When you activate this card: banish the top 5 cards of your Deck. This face-up card's name is treated as "Toon World". If a Toon monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can banish the top card of your Deck instead.
texts.str1: Use the effect of "Toon Kingdom" to avoid destruction?

texts.name: Performapal Drummerilla (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when a monster you control battles a monster: You can target your battling monster; it gains 600 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If neither player controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand), but its Level is reduced by 1. Once per turn, when a monster you control battles a monster: You can target your battling monster; it gains 600 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Pianissimo (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; that target's ATK becomes 100 until the end of this turn, but it cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Performapal Curtain Call
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control; until the end of this turn, it gains 600 ATK for each "Performapal" monster that was destroyed this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects, also if it attacks, negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls.

texts.name: Danger Draw (ARC-V)
texts.desc: Send 1 Spell from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 1 card, and if it was a monster, you take damage equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Slow Tempo
texts.desc: Monsters cannot attack during the turn they are Normal Summoned/Set.

texts.name: Musical Mayhem
texts.desc:
Inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each "Melodious" monster you control.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" and a "Melodious" card.)

texts.name: Fusion Cycle
texts.desc: Target 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard that was used as a Fusion Material this turn; Special Summon it to your side of the field in Attack Position. It cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Pendulumstatue Black Sun
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
All DARK monsters you control gain 300 ATK.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Pendulum Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can add 1 "Pendulumstatue" monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Adversity
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack, if it has less ATK than the attacking monster: That monster cannot be destroyed by this battle, you take no battle damage from this battle, also it gains 1000 ATK.

texts.name: Minute Meal
texts.desc: Special Summon as many "Royal Cookpal" monsters as possible from your hand whose Levels are less than or equal to the total Levels of all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Metabolic Storm
texts.desc: If a monster(s) was destroyed by the effect of a "Royal Cookpal" monster this turn: Inflict damage to their controllers equal to the total ATK of their monsters that were destroyed by the effect of a "Royal Cookpal" monster.

texts.name: Monster Pie
texts.desc: If an opponent's monster(s) leaves the field while you control a "Cookpal" monster: Special Summon 1 "Monster Pie Token" (Spellcaster-Type/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponent's side of the field for each of those monsters. When a "Monster Pie Token" is destroyed, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Monster Pie Token
texts.desc: Summoned by the effect of "Monster Pie".

texts.name: Rose Curse
texts.desc: Activate only if the ATK of a monster your opponent controls changes. Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the difference between that monster's previous ATK and current ATK.

texts.name: Sacred Arrow
texts.desc: During each player's End Phase: Each player takes 400 damage for each of their monsters that were destroyed and sent to the Graveyard this turn.

texts.name: Rank Wall
texts.desc: When an opponent's Xyz Monster targets a face-up Xyz Monster you control for an attack, if the Rank of your Xyz Monster is higher than your opponent's monster: Negate the attack, and if you do, end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Reincarnation Ring
texts.desc: Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard whose Level is equal to double the Tributed monster's, and if you do, equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster. When the equipped monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

texts.name: Unfinished Time Box
texts.desc: Activate only if a monster you control is destroyed by battle. Banish the monster that battled it, and draw 1 card. When this card leaves the field, Special Summon the monster banished by this effect to your opponent's side of the field.

texts.name: Amber Pitfall
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, change that target to Defense Position and it cannot change its battle position while this card is face-up on the field.

texts.name: Soul Arena
texts.desc: When a Rank 8 or higher "Number" monster is destroyed: You can discard your entire hand; Special Summon as many "Number" monsters from your Extra Deck as possible.

texts.name: Damage Capture
texts.desc: Activate only when you take damage from an opponent's card effect: Target 1 face-up monster you control; It gains ATK equal to the damage you took, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 1000 ATK. During the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because it was destroyed and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon as many monsters from your Graveyard as possible that were destroyed during this turn, except "Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark". If the total ATK of all monsters your opponent controls is at least double the total ATK of all monsters you control: You can Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. If Summoned this way: Target 1 "Number" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Blood Mefist (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card they control. If your opponent Sets a Spell/Trap: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 8 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When your opponent activates a Spell effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then banish that Spell and this card. If this card banished by this effect is Special Summoned: Attach the Spell banished by this card's effect to this card as an Xyz Material. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; change the attack target to this card. When an Xyz Monster you control is destroyed: This card gains ATK equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK. When this card is destroyed: Target 1 Xyz Monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the ATK this card had on the field.

texts.name: Speedroid Menko (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, change all monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position.

texts.name: Synchro Cracker (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 Synchro Monster you control; return that target to the Extra Deck, then destroy all monsters on the field with ATK less than the returned monster's.

texts.name: Fluffal Wings (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is in your Graveyard and you control "Toy Vendor": You can target 2 "Fluffal Wing" in your Graveyard; banish them, and if you do, draw 2 cards, and if you do that, you can Tribute 1 "Toy Vendor" and draw 1 more card.

texts.name: Card of Endurance
texts.desc: When you would take damage: Increase that damage by 1000, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: Level Thunder
texts.desc: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x100.

texts.name: The Phantom Knights of Ancient Cloak (Anime)
texts.desc: You can change this card to Defense Position. If you do: You can target 1 "The Phantom Knights" monster you control; it gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Booby Trap E (Anime)
texts.desc: Reveal 1 Set Continuous Trap Card in your Spell & Trap Zone and return it face-down; this card's effect becomes the revealed card's effect.

texts.name: Phantom Knights' Fog Blade (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 opponent's attacking monster; negate the attack. Its effects are negated, it cannot attack, also you cannot target it for attacks.

texts.name: Lunalight Blue Cat (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Lunalight" monster you control; double its ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Lunar Eclipse
texts.desc: If you control a "Lunalight" monster: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, "Lunalight" monsters you control are unaffected by, and cannot be targeted by, your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.

texts.name: Lunalight Cat Dancer (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 "Lunalight" monsters
You can Tribute 1 "Lunalight" monster; this turn, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls twice each, but they cannot be destroyed by the first battle with this card.

texts.name: Lunalight Purple Butterfly (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Fusion Monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK.

texts.name: Lunalight White Rabbit (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; return it to the hand.

texts.name: Lunalight Dance
texts.desc: If a "Lunalight" monster you control attacked, after damage calculation: Change the battle position of all monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, halve their ATK and DEF until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Granite Battleguard
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Boulder Battleguard" from your hand.

texts.name: Boulder Battleguard
texts.desc: Once per Battle Phase, when a "Battleguard" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack.

texts.name: Shaman Battleguard
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters, including at least 1 "Battleguard" monster. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it. (You can only control 1 monster at a time with this effect.) When your opponent Summons a monster(s) with a higher ATK than the monster you are controlling with this effect: You can target 1 of those monsters and the monster you are controlling with this effect; switch control of both monsters. While you control a monster with this card's effects, your opponent cannot target this card for an attack.

texts.name: Battleguard Magic
texts.desc: When a monster is returned to the hand: Gain LP equal to half its ATK.

texts.name: Battleguard Sorcery
texts.desc: If you control a "Battleguard" monster and your opponent controls 2 or more monsters: Target 1 of those monsters; take control of that target.

texts.name: Monk Halberd
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 500 ATK until the End Phase. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead. When this card is destroyed by this effect: inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Respect Synchron
texts.desc: Activate only when a Synchro Monster your opponent controls is sent to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect: Special Summon that monster to your side of the field, ignoring its Summoning conditions, even if it was not properly Special Summoned first. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card. When this card leaves the the field, destroy that monster.

texts.name: Gadget Box
texts.desc: Once per turn: you can Special Summon 1 "Gadget Token" (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). It cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. After you use this effect 3 times, destroy this card.

texts.name: Gadget Token
texts.desc: Summoned with the effect of "Gadget Box". This token cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

texts.name: Infestation
texts.desc: All face-up monsters lose 100 ATK. Then, each player takes 100 damage for each monster they control.

texts.name: Level Mirroring
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control; Its Level becomes the same as 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Seal of Serket
texts.desc: When you activate this card, it stays face-up on the field. Only once, if you also control a "Cup of Sealed Soul" and "Temple of the Kings": You can Special Summon 1 "Mystical Beast of Serket" ignoring its Summoning Conditions. "Mystical Beast of Serket" cannot be destroyed by card effects while this card and "Cup of Sealed Soul" are face-up on the field.

texts.name: Cup of Sealed Soul
texts.desc: When you activate this card, it stays face-up on the field. Only once, if you also control a "Seal of Serket" and "Temple of the Kings": You can Special Summon 1 "Mystical Beast of Serket" ignoring its Summoning Conditions. "Mystical Beast of Serket" cannot be destroyed by card effects while this card and "Seal of Serket" are face-up on the field.

texts.name: Energy Drain (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Draw 1 card. That monster's ATK becomes 0.

texts.name: Lev. 2 Power Boost
texts.desc: Equip only to an Insect-Type monster. It gains 1200 ATK and 200 DEF.

texts.name: Judgment Blaster
texts.desc: Discard 5 cards from your hand; destroy all monsters on the field.

texts.name: Reckless Parasite
texts.desc: If this card is activated: Special Summon 1 "Parasite Paracide" from your opponent's Deck to their side of the field in Attack Position. Monsters currently on the field, and monsters those Summoned while this card is on the field are equipped with a "Parasite Token". While a "Parasite Paracide" and "Reckless Parasite" are on the field, monsters equipped with a "Parasite Token" are treated as Insect-Type and cannot be Tributed.

texts.name: Angel O1 (Manga)
texts.desc: (This card is never treated as a "Angel" card.)

texts.name: Attrition
texts.desc: Each time an opponent's monster is not destroyed by battle: the opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the damage took by either player.

texts.name: Ninja Smoke Ball
texts.desc: During your opponent's Battle Phase: End the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Mask of Impregnability
texts.desc: You take no damage during an opponent's monster's attack this turn.

texts.name: Kunoichi Ayame the Ninja Girl
texts.desc: Dazzles with swift movements, a subordinate of the Shogun.

texts.name: Ninja Soldier Katana
texts.desc: One of several ninjas which is subordinate of the Shogun.

texts.name: Ninja Commando Kabuki
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned in face-up Attack Position: you can Special Summon 1 "Kunoichi Ayame the Ninja Girl" from your hand in face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Ninja Commander Ikusa
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned in face-up Attack Position: you can Special Summon 1 "Ninja Soldier Katana" from your hand in face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Ninja Master Shogun
texts.desc: This card can only be Summoned while a "Ninja Commander Ikusa" and a "Ninja Soldier Katana" is in your Graveyard. When this card is Summoned: you can Special Summon 1 "Ninja Soldier Katana" and 1 "Ninja Commando Kabuki" from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Great Kite of Ninja
texts.desc:
Equip only to "Ninja Master Shogun". Negate other Spell/Trap effects that target the equipped monster. It cannot be targeted for an attack. You can Tribute 1 monster, except the equipped monster; the equipped monster can attack directly this turn.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card and it is never a "Ninja" card.)

texts.name: Ocean of Regeneration
texts.desc: Once per turn: you can target 1 Aqua-Type monster with 1000 or less ATK in your Graveyard; Special Summon it. That monster is destroyed at the end of this turn. You cannot Normal Summon/Set during the turn you activate this effect.

texts.name: Rare Metal Soul
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Fusion Monster you control; It gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Anti Emptiness
texts.desc:
When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card that would destroy a Spell/Trap on the field: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, also, the ATK of 1 Attack Position monster you control becomes 0 until the End Phase.

(This card is never treated as a "Anti" card.)

texts.name: Frog Resurrection
texts.desc: Discard 1 WATER monster to target 1 WATER monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that monster.

texts.name: Flute of Hamelin
texts.desc: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard that was sent to the Graveyard this turn; Both players must send all cards from their hands and Decks with the same name as it to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Claret Note
texts.desc: Activate by targeting a face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon a number of "Plasma Token" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) equal to that monster's Level divided by 4.

texts.name: Plasma Token
texts.desc: Summoned with the effect of "Claret Note".

texts.name: Secret Mission
texts.desc: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. You can either have your opponent target 1 random monster you control; the attacking monster must attack it, OR end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Invincible Hero
texts.desc: Monsters you control that are attacked cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Fusion Shot
texts.desc: Equip only to a Fusion Monster. Once per turn: you can banish 1 monster with 1000 or less ATK from your Graveyard that was used in the equipped monster's Fusion Summon; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the banished monster's ATK.

texts.name: Double Fusion
texts.desc: Pay 500 LP; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials. You can apply this effect twice.

texts.name: Mirror Damage
texts.desc: Equip this card to a monster you control. If you would take damage equal to the equipped monster's original ATK by a Spell effect: Your opponent takes that effect damage instead. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster.

texts.name: Number 4: Stealth Kragen
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 WATER monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 WATER monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to the controller equal to its ATK on the field. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon a number of "Number 4: Stealth Kragen" or "Kragen Spawn" from your Extra Deck or Graveyard, except this card, equal to the number of Xyz Materials that were attached to this card, then attach each of the Xyz Materials in your Graveyard that were attached to this card to each of the Special Summoned monster(s) as Xyz Materials.

texts.name: Kragen Spawn
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 WATER monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 WATER monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to the controller equal to its ATK on the field. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon a number of "Number 4: Stealth Kragen" or "Kragen Spawn" from your Extra Deck or Graveyard, except this card, equal to the number of Xyz Materials that were attached to this card, then attach each of the Xyz Materials in your Graveyard that were attached to this card to each of the Special Summoned monster(s) as Xyz Materials.

texts.name: Number 1: Infection Buzz King
texts.desc:
3 Level 8 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can choose 1 monster in your opponent's Extra Deck and send it to the Graveyard. Once per turn: You can attach 1 "Number" monster from your opponent's Graveyard to this card as an Xyz Material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card to target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target, and if you do, if that card was a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK on the field.

texts.name: Number 2: Ninja Shadow Mosquito
texts.desc:
3 Level 2 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle, except with a "Number" monster. When this card is targeted for an attack: You can activate 1 of these effects:
 Detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card cannot be destroyed by that battle, you take no battle damage from that battle, also place 1 Hallucination Counter on 1 face-up monster on the field. The effects of monsters with a Hallucination Counter are negated.
 If this card is targeted for an attack by a monster with a Hallucination Counter, this card cannot be destroyed by that battle, also your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from that battle.

(This card is never treated as a "Mosquito" card.)

texts.name: Galaxy Wrath
texts.desc: During your Main Phase 1: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Dragon-Type monster from your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: One Two Jump
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase, if a monster you control has destroyed 2 of your opponent's monsters by battle during this Battle Phase: Target that monster; halve the ATK of 1 monster your opponent controls during the Battle Phase only, and if you do, that target can attack that opponent's monster.

texts.name: Desperate Maneuver
texts.desc: Pay 800 LP; halve the original ATK of 1 opponent's monster.

texts.name: Regen Warrior
texts.desc: When this card is sent from your hand to the Graveyard by a card effect: You can Special Summon it.

texts.name: Retribution of the Ant Lion
texts.desc:
When a monster(s) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 800 damage to its controller.

(This card is always treated as an "Earth" card.)

texts.name: Synchron Believer
texts.desc: When a face-up Synchro Monster you control is targeted for an attack: you can Special Summon this card from your hand and negate the attack.

texts.name: Raptor's Storm
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card while you control a "Raidraptor" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Unfair Judge
texts.desc: Activate only at the end of a Battle Phase in which an attack from a face-up monster you control was negated: Pay 800 LP, then target 1 monster you control whose ATK is less than both the total ATK of all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls and the total DEF of all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls; you may conduct a second Battle Phase this turn. During that Battle Phase, only that monster can attack and can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

texts.name: Jewel Sword
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK. When this equipped card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: draw 1 card.

texts.name: Icicle Sacrifice
texts.desc: Choose 1 of your unused Monster Zones; Special Summon 1 "Icicle Token" (Aqua-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). That chosen Monster Zone cannot be used for the entire Duel. The "Icicle Token" can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a monster.

texts.name: Icicle Token
texts.desc: Summoned with the effect of "Icicle Sacrifice". This Token can be treated as 2 Tributes for a Tribute Summon.

texts.name: Magical Longicorn
texts.desc: While this card is in face-up Attack Position, negate the activations of your Spell Cards.

texts.name: Insect Garden
texts.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent takes control of all face-up Level 4 or lower Insect-Type monsters you control.

texts.name: Wild Half
texts.desc: If you control an "Elemental Hero Wildheart": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; halve its original ATK/DEF, then, Special Summon 1 "Half Token" to your opponent's side of the field with the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, DEF and effect(s) as the targeted monster.

texts.name: Half Token
texts.desc: Special Summoned by the effect of "Wild Half". It has the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, DEF and effect(s) as the monster targeted by the effect of "Wild Half".

texts.name: Relationship
texts.desc: Activate only if a monster you controlled was destroyed this turn: Special Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" monster with an ATK equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Hero's Guild
texts.desc:
Once per turn: You can have both players send the top card of their Decks to the Graveyard, then if a Warrior-Type monster is sent to the Graveyard this way, the player who sent it can add it to their hand. If a card is added to a player's hand by this effect, destroy this card.

(This card is always treated as a "Rose" card.)

texts.name: Remove Bomb
texts.desc: Banish the top 5 cards of your Deck; Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster banished this way.

texts.name: Crazy Summon Gear
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 monster in your Graveyard with 1500 or less ATK; Your opponent must Special Summon up to 2 monsters from their Deck with the same Type and Level as their targeted monster. You must Special Summon your targeted monster and all other monsters with the same name from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

texts.name: Tri-Slice
texts.desc:
Tribute 1 Level 6, Level 9, or Level 12 Fish-Type monster; Special Summon 3 WATER monsters from your Deck, depending on the Level of the Tributed monster.
 Level 12: Level 4 monsters.
 Level 9: Level 3 monsters.
 Level 6: Level 2 monsters.

texts.name: Tidal Advantage
texts.desc: If an opponent's monster battles a WATER monster you control: Halve your opponent's monster's ATK during the Battle Phase only. WATER monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Sacred Shield
texts.desc: When a Trap effect that would inflict damage to a player(s) is activated: That damage becomes 0, and if it does, 1 Fairy-Type monster on the field gains ATK equal to the total amount of damage that player(s) would have taken. During the End Phase, you take damage equal to the total amount of damage that player(s) would have taken at the activation of this card.

texts.name: Card of the Dragon King
texts.desc: Tribute all Dragon-Type monsters you control, and if you do, you take damage equal to the combined ATK of those monsters, also draw 1 card for each monster Tributed this way.

texts.name: CXyz Barian Hope (Anime)
texts.desc:
3+ Level 7 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using all Xyz Monsters on the field with "Number C101" through "Number C107" in its name as Xyz Materials. (Transfer its Xyz Materials to this card.) This card's ATK is equal to the number of Xyz Materials attached to it x1000. During your turn: You can target 1 Xyz Material attached to this card, then either detach that Xyz Material OR pay 400 LP; activate 1 of that target's original effects that is activated by detaching its own Xyz Material(s), also that Xyz Material cannot be targeted again by this effect for the rest of this turn.

texts.name: Power Collapse
texts.desc: Activate only during your Battle Phase when a monster you control destroyed an opponent's monster by battle: Target the monster you control; Until the End Phase, it loses ATK equal to the destroyed monster's ATK. Also, it can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

texts.name: Star Level Shuffle
texts.desc: Send 1 monster you control to your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard with the same Level as the monster you sent to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Comparable Level
texts.desc: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons exactly 1 monster: Pay half your LP; Special Summon monster(s) from your hand whose total Levels equal the Level of your opponent's monster.

texts.name: Intruder Alarm - Yellow Alert (Manga)
texts.desc: Activate only when your opponent declares an attack: Special Summon 1 monster from your hand. If it is still on the field at the end of the Battle Phase, return it to your hand.

texts.name: Junk Dealer (Manga)
texts.desc: When your opponent Fusion Summons a monster: All the Fusion Materials that were sent to the Graveyard for that Fusion Summon are Special Summoned to your side of the field.

texts.name: Number C40: Gimmick Puppet of Dark Strings (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 9 DARK monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. If this card destroys a monsters by battle or by its own effect: Draw 1 card. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 40: Gimmick Puppet of Strings", it gains these effects.
 Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; place 1 String Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
 Once per turn: Destroy the monsters with String Counters, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined original ATK of the destroyed monster(s).
texts.str3: Destroy all monsters with a String Counter

texts.name: Number C88: Gimmick Puppet Disaster Leo (Anime)
texts.desc:
4 Level 9 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Unaffected by other monster effects. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 88: Gimmick Puppet of Leo", it gains these effects.
 Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; inflict 4000 damage to your opponent. At the end of the turn, if this card has no Xyz Materials, you win the Duel.

texts.name: Overlay Satellite
texts.desc: If the equipped monster is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, you can treat it as 2 monsters. If the equipped monster is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon: Attach this card to the Summoned monster as an Xyz Material. If you do, it cannot attack this turn.

texts.name: Number 8: Heraldic King Genom-Heritage (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 "Heraldic Beast" monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects.
 If this card battles 1 of your opponent's monsters, that monster's ATK becomes 0 and this card's ATK becomes that monster's original ATK.
 Negate the attack of 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls and this card gains that monster's original effects.
 When an opponent's monster declares an attack, that monster's name becomes "Unknown" and this card gains that monster's original name.

texts.name: D/D/D Duo-Dawn King Kali Yuga (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 8 "D/D" monsters
This card's effects cannot be negated. If this card is Special Summoned: Negate the effects of all other face-up cards currently on the field, until the end of this turn. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy all Spells/Traps on the field. If a card(s) were destroyed by this effect: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; return all cards that were destroyed on your side of the field to the same zone and postion they were in when they were destroyed.

texts.name: Ring of Fiendish Power
texts.desc: Your opponent can only attack the face-up Fiend-Type monster you control with the highest original ATK. If a Fiend-Type monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's DEF. If you control no face-up Fiend-Type monsters, destroy this card.

texts.name: Power Annihilator
texts.desc: If this card battles a monster with higher ATK than this card, it gains 1000 ATK during the Damage Step. If this card battles a monster with less ATK than this card, it loses 1000 ATK during the Damage Step.

texts.name: Power Bombard
texts.desc: If the ATK of a "Power Annihilator" you control changes: destroy this card and inflict 1800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Explosion Fuse
texts.desc: Activate only when an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Power Bombard" from your hand or Deck in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card. During the Standby Phase of your next turn: destroy that "Power Bombard" and inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Infernal Blasthound
texts.desc: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Destroy 1 random card in your opponent's hand. When this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Infernal Blasthound" from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Lure Phantom
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: you can return this card and the attacking monster to the hand.

texts.name: Psychic Cyclone
texts.desc: Target 1 face-down Spell/Trap your opponent controls; declare if it is a Spell or Trap, and destroy it, and if you do, if you were right, draw 1 card, otherwise, your opponent draws 1 card.

texts.name: Blaster Cartridge
texts.desc: Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, draw 1 card, then place this card on top of your Deck. If you draw this card placed on top of your Deck by this effect, send it to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Anchor Knight
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card in face-up Defense Position. Up to thrice per turn: You can discard 1 card; inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Violent Salvage
texts.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Anchor Knight": Add the top 3 cards of your Graveyard to your hand. Those cards cannot be Summoned or activated.

texts.name: Soul Anchor
texts.desc: Equip this card to a monster on the field. The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle. Also, it cannot change its battle position.

texts.name: Mad Profiler
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to target 1 card on the field of the same card type as the card you sent; banish it.

texts.name: Crime and Punishment
texts.desc: When you take battle damage from a direct attack: Destroy 1 monster on the field, also, at the end of the Battle Phase, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

texts.name: Pinpoint Shot
texts.desc: Declare 1 card name; If that card is in your opponent's hand, send 1 of those card(s) to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Yubel (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle. Your opponent takes all battle damage from battles involving this face-up Attack Position card. Once per turn, during your End Phase, Tribute 1 monster or destroy this card. If this card is destroyed, except by its own effect: Special Summon 1 "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

texts.name: Yubel - Terror Incarnate (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Yubel", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving this face-up Attack Position card. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Destroy all other monsters you control, then destroy monsters your opponent controls equal to the number of your monsters destroyed by this effect. When this card leaves the field: Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

texts.name: Scab Scream
texts.desc: When a "Scab Scar-Knight" you control is targeted for an attack by a monster with 2000 or more ATK: Destroy the attacking monster, then, send the attacked "Scab Scar-Knight" to the Graveyard, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Scar-Knight" from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Scar-Knight
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Scab Scream", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During your End Phase: You can Tribute this card; destroy all monsters on the field, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to both players for each monster destroyed.

texts.name: Ape Magician (Anime)
texts.desc: This card is also treated as a Spellcaster-Type monster. Once per turn, if this card is in face-up Attack Position: you can discard 1 card to target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of it. You cannot change the battle position of that monster.

texts.name: Ape Fighter (Anime)
texts.desc: This card is also treated as Warrior-Type. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: this card gains 400 ATK. If this card did not attack during your turn, its ATK becomes its original ATK during the End Phase.

texts.name: Unequal Treaty
texts.desc: Activate only when a monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack. Each time your opponent draws a card(s): Gain 100 LP and inflict 100 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Forced March
texts.desc: Halve the ATK of all monsters you currently control, then, those monster(s) can attack directly this turn.

texts.name: Toy Cannon
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls; Change it to Defense Position, and inflict 400 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Animal Trail
texts.desc: Activate only if a monster you control is destroyed by battle: Add 1 Beast-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Koala March

3 Level 5 monsters

texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) during the turn you activated a Normal Spell Card.

texts.name: Destruction Reward
texts.desc:
When exactly 1 monster your opponent controls is destroyed: You can activate the following effect.
 If the destroyed monster is Level 5 or 6: Draw 1 card.
 If the destroyed monster is Level 7 or higher: Draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Forced Release
texts.desc: Target 1 Xyz Monster on the field; detach all of its Xyz Materials.

texts.name: Xyz Gift (Anime)

texts.str2: Affected by "Cardcar D (Anime)": Cannot Special Summon

texts.name: Guardian Eatos (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Summoned if you control no "Celestial Sword - Eatos". If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can destroy a "Celestial Sword - Eatos" equipped to this card; banish monsters from the top of your opponent's Graveyard until a non-monster or a monster with 0 ATK is on top of their Graveyard, then have this card gain ATK equal to the combined ATK of the monsters banished.

texts.name: Xyz Strike
texts.desc: During the Battle Step, if an Xyz Monster you control battles an Xyz Monster your opponent controls, when an opponent's Trap Card is activated (Quick Effect): Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then draw 1 card and reveal it. If that card is a monster, switch the ATK of the battling monsters until the end of the Battle Phase, then your opponent's battling monster's ATK becomes 0. If not, double any battle damage you take from that battle. Then, send the drawn card to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Explosive Breakout
texts.desc: When the only monster you control destroyed an opponent's Level 8 or higher monster by battle, and sends it to the Graveyard: Your monster loses 800 ATK and can attack once again in a row.

texts.name: Summon Pass
texts.desc: When a Level 4 or lower monster is Normal Summoned: its controller's opponent draws 1 card. Then, the monster's controller must guess the type of card the drawn card is (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If they call it wrong, destroy the Summoned monster.

texts.name: Hologram Projection
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster on the field; Special Summon this card with the same name, Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target. (This card is also still a Spell.) Cannot attack. When this card is targeted for an attack or card effect (Quick Effect): Destroy this card.

texts.name: Number 43: Manipulator of Souls (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 2 DARK monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 "Number" monster in your Graveyard; equip that target to this card. Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while equipped with a "Number" monster. When you gain LP: You can have this card gain ATK equal to the amount of LP gained. If you do: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the same amount. When a card effect is activated that targets a card(s) equipped to this card (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate that effect.

texts.name: Number C43: High Manipulator of Chaos (Anime)
texts.desc:
4 Level 3 DARK monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 43: Manipulator of Souls", it gains these effects.
 Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster whose ATK is higher than their LP: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Manipulator Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK ?/DEF ?). (When Summoned, its ATK/DEF become equal to your opponent's current LP.)
 "Manipulator Token" cannot be destroyed by battle, you take no battle damage from attacks involving that Token, also this card gains ATK equal to the battle damage you would have taken from those battles.
 During each Battle Phase, "Manipulator Token" can attack up to the number of Xyz Materials attached to this card.

texts.name: Shark Caesar (Anime)
texts.desc:
4 Level 3 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card gains ATK equal to the original number of Xyz Materials used to Xyz Summon this card minus the number of Xyz Materials currently attached to this card x1000.

texts.name: Number 19: Freezadon (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 5 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; if the Xyz Materials that were used for the Xyz Summon of 1 other Xyz Monster on the field are in the Graveyard, return those Materials to that monster as Xyz Materials.

texts.name: Ascension Sky Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
This card's ATK is equal to the number of cards in your hand x1000. If this card would be destroyed, return it to the Extra Deck and Special Summon all monsters that were used in its Synchro Summon that are in your hand, Graveyard or is banished, if any.

texts.name: Number C6: Chronomaly Chaos Atlandis (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 7 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 6: Chronomlay Atlandis", it gains these effects.
 Once per turn: You can target 1 "Number" monster on the field; equip it to this card. After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can equip that monster to this card. This card gains ATK equal to the number of monsters equipped to it by the effect(s) of this card x 1000.
 When a card effect that targets this face-up card on the field is activated (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card equipped to this card to the Graveyard; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card.
 You can detach 3 Xyz Materials from this card; your opponent's LP become 1. You cannot declare an attack during the turn you activate this effect.
 During your Standby Phase, if this card has no Xyz Materials: You can Special Summon 1 "Number 6: Chronomaly Atlandis" from your Graveyard by using this card as the Xyz Material. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon).

texts.name: Power Pickaxe (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: you can target 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard whose Level is less than or equal to the equipped monster's; banish it. Then, if the equipped monster battles during the same turn that this effect was used, it gains ATK equal to half of the banished monster's ATK, during the Damage Step only.

----------------------------------------

2 Level 7 Dragon-Type monsters

Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card can attack a number of times each Battle Phase this turn, up to the current number of monsters that were destroyed while in your opponent's possession this turn. If this card leaves the field: You can destroy as many cards in your Pendulum Zones as possible (min. 1), and if you do, place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

If you did not send any Xyz Material to the Graveyard by this effect, the ATK/DEF of the monster Special Summoned by this effect become 0, also its effects are negated.

texts.name: Quiz Monkey
texts.desc:
Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles during your opponent's turn: Your opponent must answer the following question. At the end of the Battle Phase, apply the appropriate effect, based on the answer.
(Question: How many face-up "Quiz" monsters will be on my side of the field at the end of the Battle Phase?)
 Correct answer: Your opponent gains 1000 LP.
 Incorrect answer: Special Summon this card from your Graveyard, also, after that, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, and if you do, this card's ATK/DEF becomes equal to the destroyed monster's ATK/DEF.
texts.str1: How many face-up "Quiz" monsters will be on my side of the field at the end of the Battle Phase?

texts.name: Quiz Sphinx
texts.desc:
When a "Quiz" monster inflicts battle damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you control another "Quiz" monster, your opponent cannot target this card for an attack. Once per turn, when a "Quiz" monster is targeted for an attack: Choose 1 of the following questions:
 What is the highest Level monster in both player's hand and Deck?
 What is the highest Level monster in both player's Extra Deck?
 What is the highest Rank monster in both player's Extra Deck?
Your opponent must answer that question. Then, apply the appropriate effect, based on the answer.
 Correct answer: Destroy the monster on the field with the highest Level (your choice, if tied), and if you do, the controller takes damage equal to the destroyed monster's ATK.
 Incorrect answer: End the Battle Phase.
texts.str1: What is the highest Level monster in both player's hand and Deck?
texts.str2: What is the highest Level monster in both player's Extra Deck?
texts.str3: What is the highest Rank monster in both player's Extra Deck?

texts.name: Double it!!

texts.name: Final Question
texts.desc:
During your opponent's turn: Your opponent must answer the following question. Apply the appropriate effect, based on the answer. If they skip this turn's Battle Phase, destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
(Question: How many face-up monsters will be on the field at the start of this turn's Battle Phase?)
 Correct answer: Destroy all monsters you control.
 Incorrect answer: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
texts.str1: How many face-up monsters will be on the field at the start of this turn's Battle Phase?
texts.str2: Skip this turn's Battle Phase, destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Battle Rush
texts.desc: When a monster you control battles an opponent's monster: Your monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, also your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from that battle.

texts.name: Unknown Synchron (Anime)
texts.desc: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

texts.name: Steam Synchron (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster is Special Summoned, except "Steam Synchron": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your opponent's Main Phase: You can Synchro Summon using this face-up card you control as a Synchro Material.

texts.name: Clockwork
texts.desc: While you control a face-up "Clock Knight" monster: Special Summon 1 "Clock Knight" monster from your hand with a lower Level than a face-up "Clock Knight" monster you control.

texts.name: Switch Off
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Continuous Spell/Trap your opponent controls; its effect(s) are negated until the End Phase, then, change 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls to Attack Position.

texts.name: Buster Trap
texts.desc: When a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field during the Battle Phase: Destroy that monster(s) and end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Rainbow Blessing (GX)
texts.desc: Pay any multiple of 1000 LP; Place 1 Crystal Counter on a "Crystal Tree" you control for each multiple of 1000 paid.

texts.name: The One to be Protected
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster attacks another monster: Send 1 monster from your Deck with an ATK higher than the attacking monster's to the Graveyard; during damage calculation, the attack target cannot be destroyed by battle, and its controller take no battle damage. After damage calculation, you take damage equal to the ATK of the monster you sent to the Graveyard with this card's effect.

texts.name: Thousand Strings

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card.)

texts.name: Shizuka the Heavenly Dancer

When this card is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: Gain 600 LP.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card.)

 When it is Xyz Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 800 ATK.

OR

A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above Fusion Materials. Cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish 1 "Destiny HERO" card in your Graveyard; Special Summon this card.

Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters, including at least 1 "Destiny HERO" monster, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase: Halve your opponent's LP. This card must be face-up to activate and resolve this effect.

texts.name: Hope 1
texts.desc: If your LP would become 0: Send 1 "Utopia" monster you control to the Graveyard; your LP become 1 instead.

texts.name: Puppet King (Manga)
texts.desc: You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Puppet Queen".

texts.name: Shed the Situation
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 Level 8 or higher monster with an even Level from your hand. Its Level and ATK are halved, also if it is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, you can treat it as 2 monsters.

texts.name: Conquest of the Supreme Ruler
texts.desc: When a Synchro Monster you control destroys a Synchro Monster your opponent controls by battle: you can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Until the End Phase, the Normal and Special Summons of your opponent's monsters are negated.

texts.name: Compulsory Circulation Device
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Detach any number of Xyz Materials attached to an Xyz Monster(s) you control; banish 1 monster your opponent controls for each Xyz Material detached. Monsters banished by this effect return to the field at the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Hell Gift
texts.desc: While this card is the only card in your hand: Draw 3 cards. If you do not Summon a "Hell" monster this turn, take 3000 damage.

texts.name: Comics Hero King Arthur (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 Warrior-Type monsters
When this card's ATK is changed: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the change in ATK.

texts.name: Gimmick Puppet Gear Changer (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 other "Gimmick Puppet" monster you control; this card's Level becomes the current Level of that monster, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Gimmick Puppet Magnet Doll (Anime)

texts.name: Radius, the Half-Moon Dragon (Anime)

texts.name: Heliosphere Dragon (Anime)

texts.name: Silent Space
texts.desc: During your opponent's turn, while "Silent Pain" is in your Graveyard: You can activate this card from your hand by banishing this card to target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.

texts.name: Silent Torment

texts.name: Number 66: Master Key Beetle (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 DARK monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 card you control; that card(s) cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card would be destroyed, you can send one of its targets to the Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Synchro Material (Anime)

texts.name: Xyz Xtreme !! (Anime)

At the end of the Battle Phase, destroy those monsters.

texts.name: Release & Reverse

2 Level 4 Warrior-Type monsters

3 Level 4 monsters

2 Level 4 monsters
