texts.desc: Reveal 1 Level 4 or lower "Windwitch" monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name from your Deck.

texts.name: Call of the Windwitch
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Target 1 "Windwitch" monster you control; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand with a Level less than or equal to that monster's, but it cannot attack.

texts.name: Electromagnetic Turtle (Anime)
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase of a turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: you can end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Pair Cycroid (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Cycroid" + "Cycroid"
This card can attack your opponent directly, but when it does so using this effect, it loses 500 ATK during damage calculation only.

texts.name: Super Vehicroid - Stealth Union (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Truckroid" + "Expressroid" + "Drillroid" + "Stealthroid"
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field, except a Machine-Type monster; equip it to this card. While equipped by this effect, this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If this card attacks with this effect, its original ATK is halved until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Noble Knight Joan (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card attacks, it loses 300 ATK during the Damage Step only. When this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can target 1 Spell in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Fusion Parasite (Anime)
texts.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, you can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials, including this card, then equip this card from the Graveyard to the Fusion Summoned monster. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

texts.name: Amazoness Empress (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Amazoness Queen" + 1 "Amazoness" monster
"Amazoness" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If an "Amazoness" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

texts.name: Amazoness Pet Liger (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Amazoness Tiger" + 1 "Amazoness" monster
If this card attacks, this card gains 500 ATK during the Damage Step only. When an opponent's monster declares an attack, except on this card, you can negate the attack. If an "Amazoness" monster you control attacks an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 800 ATK.

texts.name: Amazoness Hall
texts.desc: If you control no "Amazoness" monsters, destroy this card. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can gain LP equal to the total ATK of those monsters.

texts.name: Amazoness Substitution
texts.desc: If an "Amazoness" monster you control is targeted for an attack: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Amazoness" monster from your hand, then change the attack target to that monster.

texts.name: Amazoness Hot Spring
texts.desc: If you control no "Amazoness" monsters, destroy this card. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can gain LP equal to an instance of battle damage you took this turn.

texts.name: Amazoness Curse Mirror
texts.desc: Activate this card during the End Phase of the turn in which you took battle damage. Once per turn, you can reduce the battle damage you would take to 0.

texts.name: Amazoness Magic Mirror
texts.desc: If you control no "Amazoness" monsters, destroy this card. If you would take damage by an opponent's card effect (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; your opponent takes the effect damage from that effect, instead.

texts.name: Quiet Life (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card if you control no monsters. Neither player can Special Summon during the turn they Normal Summoned/Set, also neither player can Normal Summon/Set during the turn they Special Summoned.

texts.name: Fellow's Gift
texts.desc:
If you control exactly 1 monster: Target that monster; give control of it to your opponent.

(This card is always treated as a "Rose" card.)

texts.name: Gladiator Beast's Assault Fort
texts.desc:
Activate this card when you take battle damage from an attack involving a "Gladiator Beast" monster. Destroy all cards you control, except "Gladiator Beast" cards. All other face-up "Gladiator Beast" cards in your Spell & Trap Zone become Continuous Spell Cards named "Gladiator Beast's Assault Fort" with the effect listed below. (The original effects of those cards are negated.) Then, choose a number of "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck equal to the number of other "Gladiator Beast's Assault Fort" you control and place 1 of them underneath each other "Gladiator Beast's Assault Fort". If this card is destroyed: You can destroy as many cards you control as possible, and if you do, activate 1 "Gladiator Beast's Great Fortress" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

Effect of the Continuous Spell Card "Gladiator Beast's Assault Fort"
Once per turn: You can shuffle 1 card underneath this card into the Deck; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Once per turn, if this card has no cards underneath it: You can place 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck underneath this card. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can target 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster you control, then activate 1 of these effects;
 If the targeted monster battles: It cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle.
 If the targeted monster is targeted by a card effect: It cannot be destroyed by that effect.

texts.name: Gladiator Beast Fort
Gladiator Beast Great Fortress
texts.desc: If this card is activated: You can place all "Gladiator Beast" monsters in your Graveyard underneath this card, and if you do, negate the effects of all face-up monsters on the field. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from underneath this card, but its effects are negated, then change the attack target to it and perform damage calculation. Its ATK becomes 1000 plus the number of monsters underneath this card x1000, during that damage calculation only. If a monster(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard, its owner takes 500 damage for each monster destroyed and sent to the Graveyard. At the end of the Battle Phase: Place all "Gladiator Beast" monsters you control that were Special Summoned by this card's effect underneath this card.

texts.name: Crystal Rose (Anime)
texts.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, you can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material.

texts.name: Cemetery Change
texts.desc: Pay 1000 LP; destroy all monsters on the field, then switch Graveyards with your opponent.

texts.name: Earthbound Beginnings
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while you have 3000 or less LP: Halve the battle damage you take from this battle, and if you do, activate 1 Field Spell from your Deck.

texts.name: Pendulum Fusion (Anime)
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck, using cards in the Pendulum Zones as Fusion Materials.

texts.name: Inspection (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: During your opponent's Standby Phase: You can pay 500 LP; randomly choose 1 card in your opponent's hand and look at it.

texts.name: Recycle (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: During your Standby Phase: You can pay 300 LP, then target 1 non-monster in your Graveyard; return it to the bottom of your Deck.

texts.name: Chaos Form (Anime)
texts.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Chaos" or "Black Luster Soldier" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field, whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the "Chaos" or "Black Luster Soldier" Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If you have a "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" or "Dark Magician" in your Graveyard, you do not need to Tribute any monsters.

texts.name: Tyr of the Nordic Champions (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control no face-up Divine-Beast-Type monsters, destroy this card. You can Tribute this card; the effects of Divine-Beast-Type monsters cannot be negated this turn.

texts.name: Earthbound Prison
texts.desc: Negate any effect that would change the ATK of a face-up monster(s) on the field. If this card in the Field Zone is destroyed: Halve the LP of the player that destroyed it, and if you do, negate the effects of all face-up monsters they control.

texts.name: Earthbound Prisoner Ground Keeper
texts.desc: Each turn, the first "Earthbound" monster you control that would be destroyed, is not destroyed.

texts.name: Divine Relic Mjollnir (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Divine-Beast-Type monster you control; It can attack twice during each Battle Phase this turn. Each time that monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle this turn: inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Wicked Rebirth (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP to target 1 Synchro Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position and equip it with this card, but it cannot attack this turn. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. During the End Phase of the turn it was destroyed by another card effect: Special Summon that monster.

texts.name: Dark Sacrifice (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card that would destroy a monster(s) on the field: Send 1 Level 3 or lower DARK monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, negate the activation.

texts.name: Cyber Blader (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc:
"Etoile Cyber" + "Blader Skater"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above Fusion Materials. Apply these effects, depending on the number of monsters your opponent controls;  1: Cannot be destroyed by battle.  2: Double this card's ATK.  3: Negate all cards and effects your opponent controls.

texts.name: Rescue Cat (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: You can send this card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters from your Deck, but destroy them during the End Phase.

texts.name: Brionac, Dragon of the Ice Barrier (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can discard any number of cards, then target an equal number of cards on the field; return them to the hand.

texts.name: Goyo Guardian (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field in Defense Position.

texts.name: Brain Control (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Pay 800 LP, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

texts.name: Imperial Order (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Negate all Spell effects on the field. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 700 LP or destroy this card.

texts.name: Future Fusion (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and send the Fusion Materials from your Deck to the Graveyard for that Fusion Monster. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card's activation, Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster of the same name from your Extra Deck and target it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

texts.name: Necrovalley (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: All "Gravekeeper's" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF. Cards in the Graveyard cannot be banished. Negate any card effect that would move a card in the Graveyard, other than itself, to a different place.

texts.name: Data Brain
texts.desc: Equip only to "Psychic Armor Head". If the equipped monster is destroyed by an opponent's Spell effect, during your next turn: You can activate this card from your Graveyard as that Spell, and its effect is the same as that Spell's. If this card is activated this way, destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Pendulum Xyz (Manga)
texts.desc: Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster using cards in your Pendulum Zones. Also, 1 of the cards' Level is treated as the Level of the other card for that Xyz Summon.

texts.name: Triangle Evolution
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster you control; during this turn, if that target is used for an Xyz Summon, you can treat it as 3 monsters. An Xyz Monster Summoned using that target as Xyz Material loses 1000 ATK.

texts.name: Dis-swing Fusion
texts.desc: When an opponent's Pendulum Monster declares an attack: Target that monster; negate the attack, and if you do, take control of it, then you can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, ignoring any 1 of the Fusion Materials and using monsters from your hand or field as the remaining ones. The monster you took control by this card's effect cannot be destroyed by card effects, also its original controller takes any battle damage you would have taken from attacks involving that monster.

texts.name: Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Rock-Type "Gem-Knight" monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that can use that monster on the field as a Fusion Material, using it as the Fusion Material.

texts.name: Frightfur March (Anime)
texts.desc: When exactly 1 "Frightfur" monster you control is targeted by an opponent's monster effect: Target that "Frightfur" monster; negate that effect, then send 1 "Frightfur" monster with same Level as that target from your Extra Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Frightfur" monster from your Extra Deck that lists that target as a Fusion Material. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

texts.name: Overdoom Line (Anime)
texts.desc: Monsters you control that were Special Summoned from the Graveyard gain 1000 ATK. Destroy this card during the End Phase of your 2nd turn after activation.

texts.name: Gilasaurus (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When you do: Your opponent can target 1 monster in their Graveyard; your opponent Special Summons that target to their side of the field.

texts.name: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc:
FLIP: Apply these effects in sequence.
 You can target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.
 Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Swords of Concealing Light (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: When this card resolves: Change all monsters your opponent controlled when this card was activated to face-down Defense Position. Monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions. Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

texts.name: Ultimate Tyranno (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: If this card is in face-up Attack Position at the start of your Battle Phase, it must attack first, and attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

texts.name: Super Polymerization (Anime)
texts.desc: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using 1 monster you control and 1 card on the field as Fusion Materials. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this card's activation and that monster's Special Summon.

texts.name: Charisma Token
texts.desc:
If you use this card as a Token, you should consider using other Token Cards instead.


Charisma-Type and LAUGH Attribute don't exist in the Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG's rules.

texts.name: Witch of the Black Forest (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Dragon Seeker (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: When a "Dragon Seeker" is changed to Attack Position: You can target 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster on the field; destroy it.

texts.name: Mind Master (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: You can pay 800 LP and Tribute 1 Psychic-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Psychic-Type monster from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Wulf, Lightsworn Beast (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard: Special Summon it.

texts.name: Spiritual Energy Settle Machine (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Spirit monsters do not return to the hand during to the hand during the End Phase. Once per turn, during your End Phase, discard 1 card or destroy this card.

texts.name: Stronghold the Moving Fortress (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 2000). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) While you control "Green Gadget", "Red Gadget", and "Yellow Gadget", this card's ATK becomes 3000.

texts.name: Ultimate Offering (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: You can pay 500 LP; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

texts.name: Copy Plant (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has a Level; this card's Level becomes that monster's current Level, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Mind Crush (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card and look at your opponent's hand.

texts.name: Emissary of the Afterlife (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Each player adds 1 Level 3 or lower Normal Monster from their Deck to their hand. Each player who didn't add a monster to their hand must reveal their Deck to their opponent.

texts.name: Darkness Approaches (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Discard 2 cards, then target 1 face-up monster; change that target to face-down in the same position.

texts.name: Final Fusion (VG)
texts.desc: During damage calculation, when a face-up Fusion Monster you control battles an opponent's Fusion Monster: Each player takes damage equal to the combined ATK of the battling monsters.

texts.name: Ultimate Full Burst
texts.desc: During your Battle Phase, if you Xyz Summon an Xyz Monster by a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell effect: Target that monster; you can activate that monster's effect that is activated by detaching its own Xyz Material(s), then that monster must attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each, during each Battle Phase this turn. During the End Phase, destroy that monster.

texts.name: Xyz Remora (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by detaching all Xyz Materials from an Xyz Monster you control. If this card was Special Summoned this way and is used for the Xyz Summon of a WATER monster, you can reduce the number of required Xyz Materials by the number of Xyz Materials detached for this card's Summon.

texts.name: Token
texts.desc:
This card can be used as any Token.


Yami Yugi: "Can you surpass me... partner?!!"
Yugi Muto: "I'll surpass you! My other self...!!"

texts.name: Performapal Odd-Eyes Synchron (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when a Tuner you control battles, during damage calculation, or when a card or effect is activated that would destroy a Tuner(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; that Tuner cannot be destroyed by that battle or effect.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
During your Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster, using only this card you control and 1 card in your Pendulum Zone.

texts.name: Vision Synchro
texts.desc: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters in your hand as Materials, but return it to the Extra Deck at the end of this turn.

texts.name: Crystal Wing Synchro Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters, including at least 1 Level 5 or higher Synchro Monster
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field that activated its effect in this Chain; negate its effects, and if you do, destroy it, then this card gains ATK equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field until the end of the turn. If this card battles a Level 5 or higher monster your opponent controls, during damage calculation: This card gains ATK equal to the current ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling during that damage calculation only.

texts.name: Destiny Activator
texts.desc: When you activate this card: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. When your opponent draws a card(s) during their Draw Phase: Check the card your opponent draws. If it was a card of the same type of the card you sent to the Graveyard (Monster, Spell or Trap), destroy this card and halve your opponent's LP.

texts.name: Scrap-Iron Barricade
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the Graveyard. Also, that monster cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

texts.name: C/C Critical Eye
texts.desc: If this card is used as a Material for a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Summon, the other Material(s) cannot be a monster you control.

texts.name: Critical Overlay
texts.desc:
If you control "C/C Critical Eye": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; that target's Level becomes the following Level until the End Phase of this turn.
 Level 1-4: Level 4.
 Level 5-6: Level 6.
 Level 7 or higher: Level 8. 
Then, until the End Phase, treat this card and 1 "C/C Critical Eye" you control as a monster with the same Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target, but its effects are negated. Then, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster, using the "C/C Critical Eye" you control and this card only, but it is destroyed during the End Phase.

texts.name: Critical Tuning
texts.desc:
If you control "C/C Critical Eye": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; that target's Level becomes the following Level until the End Phase of this turn.
 Level 1-4: Level 1.
 Level 5-6: Level 3.
 Level 7 or higher: Level 5.
Then, treat this card as a monster with the same Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target, also 1 "C/C Critical Eye" you control is treated as a Tuner monster, but its effects are negated. Then, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster, using the "C/C Critical Eye" that was treated as a Tuner monster and this card only, but it is destroyed during the End Phase.

texts.name: Nightmare Critical Loop
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster. During the Main Phase or Battle Phase, if this effect was activated this turn: You can Tribute 1 monster that was Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Summoned using "C/C Critical Eye" as Material; Special Summon 1 "C/C Critical Eye" from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Splendid Venus (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: All monsters, except Fairy-Type monsters, lose 500 ATK/DEF. The activation and effects of Spell/Trap Cards you control cannot be negated.

texts.name: Armored Cybern (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "Cyber Dragon" you control, or 1 Fusion Monster you control that lists "Cyber Dragon" as a Fusion Material; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position. Once per turn, while equipped to a monster by this effect: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; the equipped monster loses exactly 1000 ATK, and if it does, destroy that target. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.)

texts.name: Drillago (Anime)
texts.desc: A fighting machine with drills equipped. Its drills can pierce through any enemies.

texts.name: Goblin Zombie (Anime)
texts.desc: A goblin revived by magic. It's now somewhat stronger than when it was alive.

texts.name: Panther Warrior (Manga)
texts.desc: A feline warrior that attacks faster than sweeping winds. Its Speed easily tops 60mph.

texts.name: Little D (Anime)
texts.desc: A baby tyrannosaurus with a vicious little temper.

texts.name: Alligator's Sword (Anime)
texts.desc: This lizard man can swing a sword at velocities that exceed the speed of sound.

texts.name: Grandsoil the Elemental Lord (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having exactly 5 EARTH monsters in your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon that target to your side of the field. If this card leaves the field, skip the Battle Phase of your next turn.

texts.name: Meotoko (Anime)
texts.desc: This enormous monster attacks by shooting a beam from his single eye.

texts.name: Skull Stalker (Anime)
texts.desc: Swift and deadly, this monster grabs victims with its claws and attacks with a poison stinger.

texts.name: Wolf (Anime)
texts.desc: An unusual breed of wolf that is rarely seen anymore. It uses its powerful sense of smell to seek out prey.

texts.name: Kageningen (Anime)
texts.desc: Uses both physical and shadow forms to attack, making it a difficult monster to overcome.

texts.name: Stone Armadiller (Anime)
texts.desc: With a body armored by rock-hard fur, this monster features excellent defense capabilities.

texts.name: Hero of the East (Anime)
texts.desc: A sword-swinging samurai of the Far East.

texts.name: Anthrosaurus (Anime)
texts.desc: Man-like dinosaur with a high I.Q. that is lacking in strength.

texts.name: Luminous Dragon Ritual (Anime)
texts.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Photon Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more.

texts.name: Mermail Abyssteus (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: You can discard 1 other WATER monster to the Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Mermail" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Mermail Abyssteus" once per turn.

texts.name: King's Synchro (Anime)
texts.desc: If a Synchro Monster you control is targeted for an attack: Target that Synchro Monster and 1 Tuner in your Graveyard; negate the attack, and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster, using those targets only. These Synchro Materials are banished.

texts.name: Battlin' Boxing Spirits (Anime)
texts.desc: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard, then, if that card was a "Battlin' Boxer" monster, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Battlin' Boxer" monster from your Graveyard, except the card sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

texts.name: Overlay Sentinel (Anime)
texts.desc: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 Xyz Monster you control; one of your opponent's monsters loses 500 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to your targeted monster.

texts.name: Nuvia the Wicked (Manga)
texts.desc: A dark fiend that had once been a woman fixated on revenge. She changed to this form by selling her soul to a dark entity.

texts.name: Soul Connection
texts.desc: Add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Endless Decay (Manga)
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) while you have less than 1000 LP. This card's ATK is equal to your opponent's LP -100.

texts.name: Ebon Sun
texts.desc: If a monster is destroyed: Gain LP equal to its ATK. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from your Graveyard: They gain 1000 ATK.

texts.name: The Golden Apples (Anime)
texts.desc: When you take battle damage while you control no monsters: Gain LP equal to the combined battle damage you took this turn, then Special Summon 1 "Malus Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK ?/DEF ?), and if you do, its ATK/DEF are each equal to the amount of LP you gained by this effect.

texts.name: Dimension Wanderer (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster you control is banished by a card effect: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 2 banished monsters; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the total ATK of those targets.

texts.name: Level Denial
texts.desc: Monsters with a Level cannot attack.

texts.name: Scrap-Iron Pitfall
texts.desc: When your opponent Special Summons exactly 1 monster: Return that monster to your opponent's hand and Set this card face-down again instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Draw of Fate (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate the attack, and if you do, each player draws 1 card. During this turn's End Phase, if a player(s) did not use their drawn card, that player(s) loses the Duel.

texts.name: Circle of Life
texts.desc: Once per turn: The turn player can discard 1 Spell. Otherwise, they cannot activate Spells from their hand (or the turn they are set) during that turn.

texts.name: Xyz Colosseum
texts.desc: Xyz Monsters on the field gain 200 ATK. Monsters, except Xyz Monsters, cannot attack.

texts.name: Fiery Fervor (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster gains ATK: Target 1 monster you control; equip this card to that target. The ATK of the equipped monster is doubled. If this card leaves the field, destroy that target.

texts.name: Battlin' Boxer Rib Gardna (Anime)
texts.desc: Before damage calculation, if this card is being attacked, and was in face-down Defense Position at the start of the Damage Step: You can target 1 other monster you control; the attacking monster attacks it instead, and you proceed to damage calculation, and if you do, if the attacking monster is an Xyz Monster, you can send all of its Xyz Materials to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Umbral Horror Ghost (Anime)
texts.desc: If you have this card and another "Umbral Horror Ghost" in your hand: You can Special Summon this card and 1 "Umbral Horror Ghost" from your hand.

texts.name: Sauropod Brachion (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster(s) is Summoned to your opponent's side of the field: Change this Attack Position monster to Defense Position.

texts.name: Ogre Head Zombie
texts.desc: It has great power, but the heaviness of its head is breaking its rotten bones.

texts.name: Burning Phoenix
texts.desc: Flames emmanate from its body, its flames cannot be extinguished.

texts.name: Emperor of Flames
texts.desc: It's said that he left his country when he learned to control the power of fire.

texts.name: Soul Scissors
texts.desc: A wandering demon possessed this scissors and turned them into a monster.

texts.name: Owl Hermit of the Black Forest
texts.desc: There is no place in the area of the woods that is unknown to the elder of the forest.

texts.name: Southern Ocean Diabolos
texts.desc: A legendary sea serpent that dwells in the southern seas, which is the originator of tsunamis.

texts.name: Rough Missile Launcher
texts.desc: When it gets angry, it starts shooting missiles recklessly and endlessly.

texts.name: Dragon Pirate Soldier
texts.desc: By joining a pirate crew, it became a dragon soldier.

texts.name: Captain Leo
texts.desc: As the captain of a pirate ship, he is familiar with the whereabouts of the land and the sea.

texts.name: Spectre
texts.desc: Without making any sound, it creeps and leaps to the neck of its prey.

texts.name: Spirit of the Gems - Hassan
texts.desc: It protects hidden treasures by shooting a beam from its jewels.

texts.name: Legend Nymph
texts.desc: An illusory winged dolphin that dwells in the heavens, swimming in the seas of clouds.

texts.name: Boomerang Boy
texts.desc: A boomerang-wielding puppet originating from a fairytale. It makes a living from the hunt.

texts.name: Beauty Lip
texts.desc: If you happen to see a nice, beautiful mouth between the darkness, perhaps it is Beauty Lip.

texts.name: Mechanical Ninja - Raikoh
texts.desc: A mechanical ninja powered by electric energy with impressive thunder attacks.

texts.name: Lightning Wallaby
texts.desc: This wallaby learned the legendary Thunder Punch technique, which is powerful and destructive.

texts.name: Iron Face
texts.desc: His face is covered with an iron mask and if it is taken off, he loses his fighting spirit.

texts.name: Umbrella Chimera
texts.desc: When you're about to take a nap, this creature might appear in your room and will never leave.

texts.name: Soulicer Snow Crystal
texts.desc: It is as cold as the snow that comes with a blizzard, it is as hard as a crystal.

texts.name: Red Mane and Blue Briquets
texts.desc: With the weapons it wields in both hands, it can rip in half its preys.

texts.name: Longnose Blue Mammoth
texts.desc: A mammoth with thick fur, it attacks and hits by swinging its long nose.

texts.name: Angler Fat Fish
texts.desc: As its body becomes fatter, it loses the ability to make fast moves.

texts.name: Light Law Medium
texts.desc: By shooting a beam of dazzling light from her hands, she can blind her pursuers.

texts.name: Root Dragonwood
texts.desc: When this dragon shoots its flame, its body results burned as well.

texts.name: Blackwing - Pinaki the Waxing Moon (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Blackwing" card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Disk Commander (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: If this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard: Draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Doppler Demon Dowsing
texts.desc: Once per turn, if a Fusion, Synchro or Xyz monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck, with the same name as a Fiend Pendulum monster you control. If you control 2 Fiend Pendulum Monsters with the same name: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as those monsters from your Deck.

texts.name: Arcana Force EX - The Light Ruler (Anime)
texts.desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "The Sky Lord", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect.
Heads: When an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 card in your Graveyard; add that target, but it cannot be activated this turn.
Tails: When a card or effect that targets this card is activated (Quick Effect): This card loses exactly 1000 ATK and your opponent draws 1 card, then you negate the effect of that card, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Heraldic Beast Basilik (Anime)
texts.desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can destroy both monsters (without damage calculation).

texts.name: Heraldic Beast Unicorn (Anime)
texts.desc: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 Xyz Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. Its effects are negated.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Xyz monster from GY

texts.name: Empress's Crown (Anime)
texts.desc: Draw 2 cards for each Synchro Monster your opponent controls. When a Synchro Monster is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field, you can activate this card from your hand.

texts.name: Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 monsters with 2000 or more ATK. During the Battle Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can target that opponent's monster; banish both this card from the field and that target, and if the other monster was an Xyz Monster, send all Xyz Materials from that monster to the Graveyard. Special Summon those banished monsters at the end of the Battle Phase, and this card gains 500 ATK for each Xyz Material sent to the Graveyard with this effect.

texts.name: Vorticular Drumgon (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 DARK Dragon monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Vorticular Drumgon" once per turn. If this effect resolves, monsters cannot be Normal or Special Summoned to the zones this card points to for the rest of this turn.

texts.name: Hyper-Ancient Shark Megalodon (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card by Tributing 1 WATER monster. When this card would inflict battle damage to your opponent, you can destroy all monsters your opponent controls whose ATK is equal to or less than that amount of battle damage, instead.

texts.name: Ido The Supreme Magical Force (Anime)
texts.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, destroy all other monsters you control. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was destroyed this turn: You can Special Summon this card.

texts.name: Zero Potential
texts.desc: Activate this card if you would take battle damage from an opponent's monster. Both players draw 1 card and reveal it, then if you drew a "D/D/D" monster by this effect, you take no damage from that battle.

texts.name: Toy Parade
texts.desc:
Target 1 "Toy" monster you control that is equipped with an Equip Card(s); this turn, it can attack a number of times equal to the number of Equip Cards equipped to it.

(All "Frightfur" cards are always treated as "Toy" cards)

texts.name: Infernity Knight (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can discard your entire hand (min. 1); Special Summon this card from the Graveyard.

texts.name: Destiny Draw (Rule)
texts.desc: At the start of the Duel, you can choose up to 5 cards in your hand/Deck. (You can only choose 1 card per original card name.) Once per Duel, If your opponent's LP is twice or more than your LP and you control no monsters while your opponent controls at least 1 monster, before you conduct your normal draw, randomly pick 1 of the cards you chose, that is in your Deck, and place it on top of your Deck.
texts.str1: Do you want to use Destiny Draw?

texts.name: Speed Duel
texts.desc:
Remove this card from the Duel immediately, and if you do, if all cards you now own compose an invalid Deck, your opponent can make you lose the Duel. Otherwise, draw 1 card if this card was in your hand. If both players agree, apply the following rules.
 Halve the LP of both players.
 Return all cards in both players' hand to the Deck.
 Each player removes cards from their Main Deck from the Duel until they have 20-30 cards in their Deck.
 Each player removes 10-15 cards from their Extra Deck from the Duel or until there are 5 or less card(s) total.
 Each player draws 1 less card for each 5 cards from the starting hand.
 2 Monster Card zones and 2 Spell/Trap zones in each player field cannot be used during the Duel.
 Skip both player's Main Phase 2.

texts.name: Deja Vu
texts.desc: Return all monsters on the field to the same position and location they occupied last turn, then each player Special Summon all monsters ignoring their Summoning conditions in the same Monster Zone and position they were on their field the previous turn.

texts.name: Magical Dimension (Manga)
texts.desc: If you control a Spellcaster-Type monster: Tribute 2 other monsters you control; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand, then, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls by battle. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Return the monster Special Summoned by this effect to hand.

texts.name: Dark Necrofear (Manga)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. You can banish 3 monsters in your Graveyard that were destroyed in Attack Position within the last 5 turns; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, or while this card is in your Graveyard, at the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, choose 1 monster your opponent controls. If your opponent declares an attack with the chosen monster, negate the attack, and if you do, gain LP equal to half of its ATK and inflict damage to your opponent by the same amount.

texts.name: Toon World (Pre-Errata)
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying 1000 LP. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Gain LP equal to the LP paid for this card's maintenance cost.

texts.name: Spiritual Fusion
texts.desc: During the turn you activate this card, if your opponent conducts a Fusion Summon, you can choose the Fusion Materials used for the Fusion Summon.

texts.name: Battle City
texts.desc:
Remove this card from the Duel immediately, and if you do, if all cards you now own compose an invalid Deck, your opponent can make you lose the Duel. Otherwise, draw 1 card if this card was in your hand. If both players agree, apply the following rules.
 Level 10 or higher monsters require 3 Tributes to Normal Summon/Set.
 Monster Cards can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.
 Monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck can be treated as tributes for a Tribute Summon up to the number of Material(s) used for their Summon.
 Monsters cannot attack the turn they were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. Divine Monsters cannot attack on the turn they are Special Summoned from the Graveyard.
 All Spells can be used as Quick-Play Spells during the Battle Phase. All Set Spells can be used as Quick-Play Spells during your opponent's turn.
 When an activated Spell/Trap is destroyed by a card effect, the effect of the Spell/Trap destroyed is also negated.
 Card(s) sent from the field to the Graveyard are sent to its controller's Graveyard.
 If a monster declares an attack and loses its attack target, then that attack is negated. If a monster(s) is Summoned to the attacked player's field when an attack is declared, the Summoning player can change the attack target to 1 of the Summoned monsters.
 If a monster(s) is Summoned just before the resolution of an effect that targets exactly 1 monster on the same side of the field, the Summoning player can change the effect target to 1 of the Summoned monsters.
 If both players agree to apply Manga Rules: Monster Cards cannot be Set or flipped face-down. All Traps can be activated the turn they are Set. Each player can have up to 7 cards in their hands. The total number of cards that each player can have on the field is 5. Each player can only activate 1 Spell from their hand, set 1 Spell and 1 Trap per turn.

texts.name: Catapult Turtle (Anime)
texts.desc:
Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects.
 Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.
 Tribute 1 monster; destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap card your opponent controls and then inflict damage equal to half the Tributed monster's original ATK to that monster's original owner.
 Target 1 face-up monster you control; increase its ATK by 600. Then Tribute that monster; destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the monster tributed and then inflict damage equal to half the Tributed monster's original ATK to that monster's original owner.

texts.name: Quick Attack
texts.desc: 1 Fusion Monster you control can attack the turn it is Fusion Summoned, ignoring the Battle City Rules.
texts.str1: Can attack, ignoring the Battle City Rules

texts.name: Zombie Heart
texts.desc: Equip only to a Zombie-Type monster. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if the equipped monster battled a monster with higher ATK than the equipped monster this turn, OR if a card or effect that would destroy the equipped monster was activated this turn: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the equipped monster's ATK.

texts.name: Xyz Reborn Plus
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 Xyz Monster from your Graveyard, and if you do, attach this card to it as an Xyz Material. The Xyz Monster with this card attached to it, gains this effect: You can detach this card; Draw 2 cards.
texts.str2: Detach Xyz Reborn Plus and Draw 2 cards

texts.name: Xyz Move
texts.desc: During your opponent's Battle Phase: Target 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control; give control of that target to your opponent, then end the Battle Phase.
texts.str1: Change Control and skip Battle Phase

texts.name: Xyz Coat
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up Xyz Monster on the field; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects.

texts.name: Xyz Battle Chain
texts.desc: When a Spell/Trap Card that targets a face-up Xyz Monster(s) on the field is activated, if both players control a face-up Xyz Monster: Target 1 Xyz Monster you control; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then if this card was activated during an opponent's turn that had no Battle Phase, 1 Xyz Monster your opponent controls must attack the monster you targeted this turn.

texts.name: Bomb Token
texts.desc: Summoned by the effect of "Volcanic Mine".

texts.name: Wonderbeat Elf
texts.desc: During each Battle Phase, this card can attack a number of times up to the number of other "Elf" and "Celtic Guard" monsters you control +1. While your opponent controls a monster this card can attack, it must attack, if able.

texts.name: Wild Tornado (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 card in the Spell & Trap Zone; destroy it, then, its controller can Set 1 Spell/Trap from their hand.
texts.str1: Do you want Set 1 Spell/Trap card?

texts.name: Warrior Defense
texts.desc: When a "Warrior" monster is destroyed: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to that monster's ATK. Also, monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Voltage Summon
texts.desc: Tribute all "Kurivolt Tokens" on your field, then Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Deck for each Token Tributed. Their effects are negated, and their original ATK and DEF become 0.

texts.name: Volcanic Mine
texts.desc: Special Summon as many "Bomb Tokens" (Pyro-Type/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) as possible to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position. Until the End Phase, your opponent's monsters cannot change their battle positions, and their effects are negated. During the End Phase, destroy all "Bomb Tokens".

texts.name: Vaccination
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster and equip this card to it, then place 1 Vaccine Counter on the equipped face-up monster, Monster(s) with Vaccine Counters are unaffected by "Virus" card effects. When that equipped monster is Tributed for a Tribute Summon, or is sent to the Graveyard for a Fusion Summon, you may equip this card to the monster that was Tribute Summoned or Fusion Summoned and place 1 Vaccine Counter on it.
texts.str1: Do you want to Equip to a card?

texts.name: Utopian Hope
texts.desc: This turn, "Utopi" monsters on the field cannot be targeted by your opponent's Spell, Trap, or monster effects. If a "Utopi" monster on the field is currently targeted by an opponent's card effect(s), negate those effects, and if you do, destroy those cards.

texts.name: Utopia's Last Line of Defense
texts.desc: When a "Utopia" monster is targeted for an attack: Change it to Defense Position.

texts.name: Utopia Rising
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 "Number 39: Utopia" from your Graveyard and equip it with this card. While equipped by this effect, "Number 39: Utopia" gains the effects of all Xyz Monsters you control that are activated by detaching their own Xyz Material(s). When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster.

texts.name: Ultimate Xyz
texts.desc: Detach all Xyz Materials from 1 Xyz Monster you control, then target 1 monster your opponent controls whose ATK is less than the combined ATK of the detached monsters; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK.

texts.name: Kurivolt Token
texts.desc: Summoned by the effect of "Kurivolt (Anime)".

texts.name: Kurivolt (Anime)
texts.desc: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from a monster, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Kurivolt Token" (Thunder-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 200).

texts.name: Concentration Duel
texts.desc:
The activation and effect of this card cannot be negated. Banish this card face-up at the start of the Duel. Return all cards in each Player's hand to the Deck. Neither Player has a Draw Phase. Once per turn, during either Player's turn: A Player can choose 1 card face-down in their Deck and call the type of the card (Monster, Spell, or Trap)'; reveal that card and if they call it right, activate one of the following effects.
*If that card is a Monster Card and it can be Normal/Special Summoned or Set: Summon/Set that Monster to your side of the field, otherwise return it to Deck in the same position.
*If the revealed card is a Spell Card: Activate that Spell Card. If the cost cannot be paid, return it to the Deck in the same position.
*If the revealed card is a Trap Card and its activation timing is correct: Activate the effect of that Trap Card, otherwise return it to the Deck in the same position.

texts.name: E'Rah Monster
texts.desc: This isn't a physical card, but the "shadow" of a monster created by the effects of "Strain Spore" and "Strain Element".

texts.name: Strain Desmosome
texts.desc: This card's ATK is equal to half of your opponent's LP.

texts.name: Substitute Pain
texts.desc: Once per turn: Inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each card you control with a Prey Counter(s).

texts.name: Hunting Net
texts.desc: If a monster would return to the hand: Place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, instead. Then, place 1 Prey Counter on it.

texts.name: Golem's Clap
texts.desc: If you control a "Gogogo Dexia": Special Summon 1 "Gogogo Aristera" from your hand.

texts.name: Half Shield
texts.desc: Halve the battle and effect damage from 1 opponent's monster.

texts.name: Capture Snare
texts.desc: When your opponent declares an attack while you control a card with at least 1 Prey Counter on it: Negate the attack, then place the attacking monster face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, and place 1 Prey Counter on it.

texts.name: Dark Auction
texts.desc: Target 1 monster on the field with a Prey Counter; return it to the hand, then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Decoy Baby
texts.desc: Target 1 monster in your Spell & Trap Zone with a Prey Counter; place 1 monster your opponent controls with the same Type as that monster face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, and place 1 Prey Counter on it.

texts.name: Strain Element
texts.desc: Equip only to an opponent's monster. When this card is equipped, Special Summon 1 "E'Rah Monster" to your side of the field. Its ATK is equal to the ATK of the equipped monster + 500.

texts.name: Negate Attack (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate the attack, and end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Spirit Battle
texts.desc: Each Player Special Summons 1 monster from their Graveyard that was destroyed this turn; conduct battle between them. Neither Player takes battle damage involving these cards. Inflict damage equal to the ATK of the monster destroyed in this battle to the monster's owner.

texts.name: Parasite Token
texts.desc: Equipped by "Reckless Parasite".

texts.name: Potential Yell
texts.desc: Unleash the power of 1 monster.

texts.name: Vanilla Mode
texts.desc: The activation and effects of this card cannot be negated. Banish this card at the start of the Duel. Monster effects cannot be activated and the effects of all monsters in in the Duel are negated. If "Ability Yell" is activated, this card's effect is negated for the remainder of the Duel.

texts.name: Ability Yell
texts.desc: Negate the effect of all cards on the field that prevent the activation of monster effects.

texts.name: Speedroid Shuriken Hurricane
texts.desc: Once per turn, if a card or effect that would inflict damage to you is activated: You can make your opponent take that effect damage, instead. Once per turn, if the ATK of a monster on the field is changed: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to that change. If you control no "Speedroid" monsters, destroy this card.

texts.name: Extra Shave Reborn
texts.desc: If a monster you control that was originally in the Extra Deck is destroyed: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard that was originally in the Extra Deck and has a lower Level than the destroyed monster; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Performance Exchange
texts.desc: Target 1 "Performapal" monster you control; give control to your opponent of as many monsters you control as possible whose Levels are lower than the targeted monster, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Twin Big Shields
texts.desc: If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects twice per turn. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Dreamer (Anime)
texts.desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if a "Destiny HERO" monster you control battles an opponent's monster while this card is in your Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can target that opponent's battling monster; that battling "Destiny HERO" monster you control cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle, then Special Summon this card in Attack Position. After that, that target can make another attack this turn. If this card Special Summoned by its own effect leaves the field, banish it.

texts.name: Predaprouting
texts.desc:
Activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously).
 When a DARK monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: That monster you control cannot be destroyed by that battle, also destroy the opponent's attacking monster.
 Special Summon 3 "Predaplant Tokens" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).
texts.str1: When a DARK monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster

texts.name: Destruction Fruit
texts.desc: Activate this card by sending 1 face-up Continuous Spell on the field to the Graveyard. If a monster(s) you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 of those monsters, then reduce by 3000 the ATK of 1 monster you control with 3000 or more ATK; Special Summon that target. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Target 1 other Continuous Spell you control; send it to the Graveyard or take 3000 damage.

texts.name: Destruction Flower
texts.desc: Activate this card by sending 1 face-up Continuous Spell on the field to the Graveyard. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field: You can target 1 monster you control with ATK less than its own original ATK, and 1 monster your opponent controls; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the difference between the ATK and original ATK of that monster you control, and if you do, that monster your opponent controls loses that much ATK. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Target 1 other Continuous Spell you control; send it to the Graveyard or take 1000 damage.

texts.name: Photo Frame
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; this card is treated as having the same name and card type (Spell/Trap) as that target, also replace this effect with that card's effects.

texts.name: Predaplant Stapeliaworm
texts.desc: Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated that would change the ATK of a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

texts.name: Cross Xyz
texts.desc: Target 1 Xyz Monster and 1 monster you control with the same Level as that Xyz Monster's Rank; immediately after this effect resolves, treat that Xyz Monster's Rank as if it was a Level and Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster using those 2 monsters only.

texts.name: Admiration of the Keepers
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 2 "Keeper Shield Tokens" (Warrior-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). The targeted monster's effects are negated, also it can attack all "Keeper Shield Tokens" once each. If the targeted monster did not attack all "Keeper Shield Tokens" during the Battle Phase, destroy it at the end of the Battle Phase. If the targeted monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: D-Doom Dance
texts.desc: If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field during the Battle Phase: Target 1 of those monsters and banish 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your Graveyard; it loses ATK equal to the banished monster's. If this effect was applied during your Battle Phase in which a "Destiny HERO" monster(s) you control attacked, 1 of those "Destiny HERO" monsters can make a second attack on that target.

texts.name: Performapal Guard Dance
texts.desc: This turn, "Performapal" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving them. At the end of the Battle Phase: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; switch control of all "Performapal" monsters you control that battled this turn with monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Acrobatic Tower
texts.desc:
If you take battle damage: Tribute 1 "Performapal" monster; each player draws 2 cards until they draw a monster, and they send all of them to the Graveyard. Compare the total Levels of all monsters each player drew and apply this effect.
 If the total Levels of your monsters is greater than or equal to your opponent's, you take damage equal to the total number of monsters on the field and in the Graveyards x 200.
 If the total Levels of your monsters is lower than your opponent's, your opponent takes damage equal to the total number of monsters on the field and in the Graveyards x 200.

texts.name: Time Chain
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: Activate this card by targeting those monsters; monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle. At the end of the Damage Step, those 2 monsters are treated as though they are not face-up on the field until their controller's 2nd Standby Phase. (They cannot attack or use their effects, also they cannot be targeted for attacks or card effects.) Destroy this card during your opponent's 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

texts.name: Performapal Nightmare Knight
texts.desc: During your Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your Graveyard; inflict 1000 damage to the player(s) who took battle damage this turn.

texts.name: Miracle Rocket Show
texts.desc: Monsters your opponent controls cannot be destroyed by battle, also your opponent takes no battle damage. At the end of the Battle Phase: Destroy this card, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the battle damage that was originally lost by this effect.

texts.name: Rank-Up-Magic Cipher Shock
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Target 1 battling "Cipher" Xyz Monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by that battle, also negate the effects of all monsters that were on the field when this card was activated, until the end of this turn. After damage calculation, if the targeted monster battled, end the Battle Phase, then Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Cipher" Xyz Monster that is 1 Rank higher than that target, by using it as the Xyz Material. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its Xyz Materials to the Summoned monster.)

texts.name: Predaplant Tokens
texts.desc:
This card can be used as a "Predator Gemination".

If used for another Token, apply that Token's Type/Attribute/Level/ATK/DEF.
texts.str1: When a DARK monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster
texts.str4: Send a Continuous spell to grave?

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Phantasma Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
-n/a-
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When there is a monster in your Pendulum Zone and an "Odd-Eyes" in your Extra Deck, you can Pendulum Summon this card regardless of your Pendulum Scales. If this card attacks an opponent's monster, during damage calculation: You can make that opponent's monster lose 1000 ATK for each face-up Pendulum Monster in your Extra Deck, during that damage calculation only.

texts.name: Supreme Faceoff
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your opponent's Battle Phase, if you control a "Supreme King" monster: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; that target must attack this turn, if able. If it has already attacked this turn, it must attack again, if able. Once per turn, if a "Supreme King" monster you control battles, during damage calculation, or when a card or effect is activated that would destroy a "Supreme King" card(s) you control: That "Supreme King" card(s) cannot be destroyed by that battle or effect. During your opponent's Battle Phase: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; all monsters your opponent controls that did not attack this turn must attack, if able. If they do, this card's controller chooses the attack targets for those attacks.

texts.name: Rank-Up Gravity
texts.desc: While you control an Xyz Monster Special Summoned with a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell, monsters your opponent controls cannot attack, except to attack those Xyz Monsters. Monsters your opponent controls that did not attack are banished at the end of the Battle Phase. If you do not control an Xyz Monster Special Summoned with a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell, destroy this card, and if it was destroyed during the Battle Phase by this effect, end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Overlay Burst Armor
texts.desc: If a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster you control would be destroyed by battle: Detach all Xyz Materials from that Xyz Monster; that Xyz Monster is not destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Black Feather Reversal
texts.desc: If a monster battles, during damage calculation, or when a card or effect is activated that would inflict damage to a player(s): Make the damage from that battle or effect 0, then Special Summon 1 "Blackwing" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck with the same ATK as the original damage.

texts.name: Synchro Panic
texts.desc: When a Synchro Monster has been destroyed, Special Summon that monster's Synchro Materials from the Graveyard in Attack Position. This turn, the Summoned monsters cannot be destroyed. Until the end of the third turn after this card is activated, neither player can Synchro Summon. At the end of the third turn after this card is activated, it is destroyed.

texts.name: Abyss Improv
texts.desc: When a monster on the field battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation: Target 1 Level 4 or lower "Abyss Actor" monster you control, except the battling monsters; any battle damage inflicted from that battle is increased by the targeted monster's ATK.

texts.name: Dragon's Shadow Performance
texts.desc: If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 "Performapal" monster you control; cards you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects for the rest of this turn, also equip 1 other monster you control to the targeted monster. The targeted monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. During the End Phase, Special Summon the monster that is equipped to the targeted monster by this card's effect.

texts.name: Exchanging Notes
texts.desc: If you control a "Guts Master" monster: Draw 2 cards, and if you do, add them to your opponent's hand, then look at your opponent's hand and add 2 cards from their hand to your hand. If a monster(s) was exchanged by this effect, they cannot be Normal or Special Summoned this turn, also skip this turn's Battle Phase. Cards exchanged by this effect are returned to their owner's hand during the End Phase of this turn.

texts.name: Pendulum Illusion
texts.desc: While this card is on the field, you can skip your Draw Phase. If you do not, destroy this card. When a Pendulum Monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand to the Graveyard; that opponent's monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, its ATK/DEF become half its current ATK/DEF during that Battle Phase only, also if a Pendulum Monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster during that battle, inflict piercing battle damage.

texts.name: Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Main Phase or either player's Battle Phase: You can target 3 "Cubic Seed" monsters you control; stack those monsters and Special Summon this card from your hand on top of them. If this card is Special Summoned: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent. This card gains 800 original ATK for each monster underneath this card. If this card is destroyed: Return this card to your hand, and if you do, Special Summon all the "Cubic Seed" monsters that were underneath this card.

texts.name: Cubic Rebirth (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 direct attacking monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "Cubic" monster from your hand, also, Special Summon 2 monsters with the same name as the targeted monster from your opponent's hand, Deck, and/or Graveyard to your opponent's side of the field. The ATK of the targeted monster and all monsters with the same name become 0, and place 1 Cubic Counter on each of them. A monster with Cubic Counter has its effects negated, and it cannot attack.

texts.name: Dark Garnex the Cubic Beast (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon this card by stacking it on top of 1 "Cubic Seed" monster you control. This card gains 1000 original ATK for each monster stacked underneath it. If this card destroys a monster by battle, you can return this card to your Deck to add 1 "Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast" from your Deck to your hand. In addition, Special Summon the "Cubic Seed" monsters underneath this card to your field.

texts.name: Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Main Phase or the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): Target 2 "Cubic Seed" monsters you control; stack them on top of each other, and stack this card on top of them, Special Summon this card. Gains 1000 original ATK for each monster stacked underneath it. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can return this card to your Deck; add 1 "Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth" from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, Special Summon "Cubic Seed" monsters underneath this card to your field.

texts.name: Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Main Phase, or the Battle Phase: Target 3 "Cubic Seed" monsters you control; stack them on top of each other, and stack this card on top of them, and Special Summon this card. Gains 1000 original ATK for each monster stacked underneath it. This card can attack three times during each Battle Phase. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can return this card to the hand; Special Summon "Cubic Seed" monsters underneath it to your field. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; add 1 "Vijam the Cubic Seed" from your Graveyard to your hand.

texts.name: Cubic Mandala (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon all monsters with Cubic Counters that were destroyed during this turn to your opponent's field, but their ATK become 0, and if you do, place 1 Cubic Counter on each of them. A monster with Cubic Counter has its effects negated, and it cannot attack. If a monster Special Summoned by this effect is on your opponent's field, negate all monster effects in your opponent's field, hand, and Graveyard. When all monsters Special Summoned by this card's effect leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Geira Guile the Cubic King (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon this card by stacking it on top of 1 "Cubic Seed" monster you control. When this card is Special Summoned, inflict 800 damage to your opponent. This card gains 800 original ATK for each monster stacked underneath it. After this card battled, return this card to the Deck to add 1 "Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King" from your Deck to your hand. During this time, Special Summon the "Cubic Seed" monsters stacked underneath this card to your field.

texts.name: Cubic Karma (Anime)
texts.desc: Stack all "Vijam the Cubic Seed" from your hand underneath a "Cubic" monster you control. When a "Cubic Seed" monster is Special Summoned during your opponent's turn by the effect of a "Cubic" monster: You can send this card to the Graveyard; halve your opponent's LP.

texts.name: Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Main Phase, or the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): Target 2 "Cubic Seed" monsters you control; stack them on top of each other, and stack this card on top of them, and Special Summon this card. When this card is Special Summoned: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent. Gains 800 original ATK for each monster stacked underneath it. After damage calculation, if this card battled: Return it to the Deck; add 1 "Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor" from your Deck to your hand. During this turn: You can Special Summon the "Cubic Seed" monsters stacked underneath this card to your field.

texts.name: Cubic Wave (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 "Cubic" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; while this card is in the Spell & Trap Zone, that monster you control gains ATK equal to its original ATK, and that opponent's monster's ATK becomes half its ATK. When all the targeted monsters have left the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Performapal Signal
texts.desc: Draw 1 card, and if you do, send it to the Graveyard, then negate the attack if the sent card was a "Performapal" monster.

texts.name: Cross Damage
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Any battle damage you take from that attack is also inflicted to your opponent.

texts.name: Vijam the Cubic Seed (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card is attacked: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Spell, also, place 1 Cubic Counter on the monster that attacked. When this card is in the Spell & Trap Zone: You can move it to a Monster Zone. A monster with Cubic Counter has its effects negated, and it cannot attack.

texts.desc: If a Pendulum Monster(s) you control is destroyed: Place 1 of those Pendulum Monsters in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, you take no damage this turn.

texts.name: Cubic Defense
texts.desc: If a monster you control would be destroyed by battle: Make that monster(s) unable to be destroyed by that battle, and if you do, Special Summon 2 monsters from your hand with the same name as that monster you control.

texts.name: Dimension Drape
texts.desc: "D/D" monsters cannot be destroyed this turn.

texts.name: Dimensional U-Turn
texts.desc: Target 1 of your banished monsters; Special Summon that target. Banish it during the End Phase of this turn. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; banish 1 monster you control until the End Phase of this turn.
texts.str1: Target 1 of your banished monsters; Special Summon that target. Banish it during the End Phase of this turn.
texts.str2: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; banish 1 monster you control until the End Phase of this turn.

texts.name: Eye of Illusion
texts.desc:
Target 1 "Illusionist Faceless Mage" you control; it gains these effects.
 Once while face-up on the field, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can activate this effect; neither player takes any battle damage from that battle, also monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle.
 Once while face-up on the field (Quick Effect): Take control of the monster that battled this card when you activated this card's above effect until the End Phase.
texts.str1: Prevent battle damage and destruction with "Eye of Illusion"

texts.name: King's Camp
texts.desc: When a "King"monster is targeted for an attack: Negate that attack, and if you do, Special Summon 3 Level 4 or lower "King" monster from your Deck in Attack Position, but their effects are negated, also they are destroyed during the End Phase.

texts.name: Shogi Knight (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Destroy 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone that is adjacent to this card's column. When a Trap Card is destroyed by this card's effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 monster from your hand, except "Shogi Knight".

texts.name: Guidance to Salvation
texts.desc: When your LP are 1500 or less: Special Summon 1 Tuner with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck.

texts.name: Papa-Corn (Manga)
texts.desc: While "Corn Parade" is face-up on the field, this card gains 1000 ATK.

texts.name: Mokusatsu
texts.desc: During the Draw Phase of your opponent's turn: Declare 1 card name; if your opponent has drawn that card, they must discard that card and they cannot declare an attack this turn, otherwise, they may draw 1 card.

texts.name: Name Erasure
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can declare 1 card name for each card in your opponent's hand; your opponent discards all cards in their hand with the same name as 1 of the declared cards, also, take 1000 damage for each declared name that wasn't discarded.

texts.name: Otonari Thunder
texts.desc: If you control 4 "hunder" monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your Deck).

texts.name: Acid Hell Fly

texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack: It becomes a direct attack. After damage calculation, draw 1 card.

texts.name: Battery Unit Charge
texts.desc: Attach this card to an Xyz Monster on the field.

texts.name: Balance Blaster
texts.desc: When the ATK of a face-up monster you control would change, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the amount of ATK that would have been changed, instead.

texts.name: Incornceivable
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster with 2500 ATK or more declares an attack: Special Summon 1 "Giant Kra-Corn" from your Deck and change the attack target to that monster.

texts.name: Oopsword
