texts.name: Final Cross
texts.desc: If a Synchro Monster has been sent to the Graveyard this turn: Target 1 face-up Synchro Monster on the field that has attacked; it can attack once again this turn.

texts.name: Bond's Reward
texts.desc: Target 1 Synchro Monster you control; Banish all Synchro Monsters from your Graveyard, then increase it's ATK by the sum of their Levels x 200. During the End Phase, take damage equal to the amount of the ATK increase.

texts.name: Bonds of Hope
texts.desc: When an Xyz Monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field: Target 1 Xyz Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, then attach this card and all Xyz Materials attached to a monster you control to 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control as Xyz Materials. During the End Phase, destroy the monster Special Summoned by this effect.

texts.name: Bracer of Power
texts.desc: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK.

texts.name: Breaking the Norm
texts.desc: If you control 3 or more monsters with the same Level: Look at your opponent's Deck, then if there is a monster with the same Level as those monsters, Special Summon it to your side of the field.

texts.name: Overlay Banish
texts.desc: During your Battle Phase, when an effect is activated by detaching an Xyz Material(s): Negate that effect.

texts.name: Magic Blade - Ice Sword
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 500 ATK.

texts.name: Ojamachine Yellow
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Special Summon as many "Ojamachine Yellow Tokens" as possible, with the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, DEF and effects as this card. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. When this card is destroyed, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Ojamachine Yellow Token
texts.desc: Summoned with the effect of "Ojamachine Yellow". Any Battle Damage this card's controller takes from a battle involving this card becomes 0. When this card is destroyed, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Line World
texts.desc: All "Shogi" monsters gain 500 ATK. All destroyed cards are sent to the Graveyard of the player who destroyed them.

texts.name: Line World Revival
texts.desc: If "Line World" is face-up on the field, Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Double Buster Swords
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It can attack twice during each Battle Phase, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Destroy the equipped monster during the End Phase.

texts.name: Synchro Overlimit
texts.desc: When a Synchro Monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It can attack once again this turn, but if it does, destroy it after damage calculation.

texts.name: Synchro Rivalry
texts.desc: When your opponent Summons a Synchro monster: Monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Surprise Inspection
texts.desc: Target 1 face-down Defense Position monster on the field; change it to face-up Defense Position.

texts.name: Traplin
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 Continuous Trap Card you control.

texts.name: Hundred-Footed Horror (Manga)
texts.desc:
If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.

(This card is always treated as a "Hell" card.)

texts.name: Eternal Bond (Manga)
texts.desc: Special Summon from your Graveyard as many "Photon" monsters as possible, and if you do, if there are more of those monsters than the number of "Photon" monsters your opponent controls, take control of 1 "Photon" monster your opponent controls, also, 1 "Photon" monster on the field gains the combined ATK of all other "Photon" monsters on the field.

texts.name: Giant Kra-Corn
texts.desc: While you control other Plant-Type monsters, face-up Attack Position Plant-Type monsters you control gain ATK equal to each other's original ATK.

texts.name: Galactic Fury
texts.desc: During a turn you take damage: Special Summon 1 "Galaxy" monster from your Graveyard whose DEF is equal to or less than the damage you took.

texts.name: Final Prophecy
texts.desc: When an opponent's Trap Card is activated: You can flip this card face-up and destroy 1 Equip Card you control; negate the effect of that Trap Card, and if you do, destroy it. During your next Standby Phase: Inflict damage to both players equal to the change in ATK of the equipped monster when the Equip Card was destroyed to activate this card, then destroy this card.

texts.name: Final Life Gardna
texts.desc: If you would take battle damage that would reduce your LP to 0: Your LP become 100 instead, then end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Spell Summon Stopper
texts.desc: During the next turn, your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon, or Set, any monsters, using a Spell effect.

texts.name: Phantom Scales
texts.desc: Target 1 Insect-Type monster you control; Special Summon a monster with the same name as that target from your Deck.

texts.name: Galaxy Shot
texts.desc: Equip only to a "Galaxy-Eyes" monster. When the equipped monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Tribute it; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.

texts.name: Prediction
texts.desc: During your opponent's Standby Phase, predict one action. The opponent's predicted action will be negated.

texts.name: Flattery
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster's ATK changes during the Battle Phase: Target 1 face-up monster you control; It gains ATK equal to the change, until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Reservation Reward
texts.desc: If a monster you control that has been targeted by a Quick-Play Spell attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. Once per turn: You can reveal 1 Quick-Play Spell in your hand, then Set it. That card can be activated during the turn it was Set, also the ATK of a monster targeted by that card is doubled during the Battle Phase only.

texts.name: Remember Attack
texts.desc: Target 1 Spell in your Graveyard which was negated during your last turn; activate it.

texts.name: Muscle Gardna
texts.desc: If you control another monster, this card cannot declare an attack.

texts.name: Overlay Marker
texts.desc: When 2 monsters battle and an Xyz Monster activates its effect by detaching its own Xyz Material(s), if that monster has no Xyz Materials: Negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that monster, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the total ATK of the battling monsters.

texts.name: Master Magician's Incantation
texts.desc: You can activate 1 face-down Spell Card or 1 Spell Card from your hand as if it were a Quick-Play Spell Card.

texts.name: Hat Token

texts.name: Sealed Duel
texts.desc:
If both players agree, apply the following rules.
 All monsters are treated as all Types in all locations.
 Anime Cards are allowed in Battle Packs.
Remove all cards from the Duel. Then, the turn player chooses any number of Battle Pack Sets, and if they do, each player opens 9 random Battle Packs from those Sets and add them to their Decks (Each Pack contains 3 Commons, 1 Rare and 1 Starfoil Rare). Then, each player can remove any number of cards from their Deck and/or Extra Deck from the Duel, but must still have 20 cards or more in their Deck. Then, each player can return all cards they drew to the bottom of the Deck, then draw that same number of cards.

texts.name: Booster Draft Duel
texts.desc:
Remove this card from the Duel immediately, and if you do, if all cards you now own compose an invalid Deck, your opponent can make you lose the Duel. Otherwise, draw 1 card if this card was in your hand. If both players agree, apply the following rules.
 All monsters are treated as all Types in all locations.
 More than 3 copies of cards with the same name in a Deck is allowed.
 Remove all cards from the Duel. Then, the turn player opens 3 random "Battle Pack 3: Monster League" packs and adds 1 card from them to their Deck. Then, the next player adds 1 card from the remaining cards to their Deck. Repeat this until each player has at least 45 cards in their Deck. (If the card pool is empty, the player who would add 1 card to their Deck opens 3 new packs.) Then, each player shuffles their Deck and draws cards equal to the number of cards in their starting hand.

texts.desc: When a monster(s) is Special Summoned during the Battle Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During the turn this card is Special Summoned by this effect, your opponent takes any effect damage you would have taken from their card effects.

texts.name: Exploder Dragonwing (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a monster whose ATK is equal to or less than the ATK of this card: You can destroy that monster, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Invalidate
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy a monster(s): You can activate this effect; this turn, monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects. If a monster battles, during damage calculation: You can send this card to the Graveyard; halve any battle damage from that battle. During the End Phase, destroy this card.

texts.name: King Scarlet (Anime)
texts.desc: If a "Red" monster you control would be destroyed by battle: Make that monster you control unable to be destroyed by that battle, then Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Fiend-Type/Tuner/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). (This card is also still a Trap Card.)

texts.name: Doggy Diver (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a Level 4 monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

texts.name: Meteor Flare  (Anime)
texts.desc: Discard 2 cards; inflict 2000 damage to your opponent. During your Draw Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard, instead of conducting your normal draw: You can add this card from your Graveyard to your hand.

texts.name: Crane Crane (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 3 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

texts.name: Magnum Shield (Anime)
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. While the equipped monster is in Attack Position, it gains ATK equal to its DEF. While the equipped monster is in Defense Position, it gains DEF equal to its ATK.

texts.name: Magicians' Defense (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Spellcaster-Type monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponents monster: Halve that battle damage, also, end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Photon Veil (Anime)
texts.desc: Shuffle 3 LIGHT monsters from your hand into the Deck, then add 3 LIGHT monsters from your Deck to the hand.

texts.name: Release Restraint Wave (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 Equip Spell you control; destroy it and all Spells/Traps your opponent controls.

texts.name: Shining Silver Force (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card that inflicts damage: Negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it and all Spells/Traps your opponent controls.

texts.name: Level Eater (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is in the Graveyard: You can target 1 Level 5 or higher monster you control; reduce that monster's Level by 1, also, Special Summon this card from the Graveyard.
texts.str2: Select 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster

texts.name: Five-Headed Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Dragon Revival Ritual". When this card is Summoned: Destroy all cards your opponent controls. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Cannot be destroyed by battle with a DARK, EARTH, WATER, FIRE, or WIND monster.

texts.name: Blue-Eyes Chaos MAX Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Chaos Form". If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage.

texts.name: Krystal Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, when this card attacked: You can add 1 Dragon-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Dark Bribe (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card: Negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it. Also, your opponent draws 1 card.

texts.name: Trap Jammer (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card: Discard 1 card; negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Earthbound Wave (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card while you control a face-up Field Spell: Negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it.

texts.name: Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) if "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" is in your hand. This card's name becomes "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" while it is on the field.

texts.name: Gagaga Caesar (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your Graveyard that has a Level; banish that target, and if you do, the Levels of all face-up monsters you currently control become the Level of that monster.

texts.name: Gogogo Giant (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Gogogo Golem" from your Graveyard in Defense Position, then change this card to Defense Position if you activated this effect.

texts.name: Blackwing - Hurricane the Tornado (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up Synchro Monster on the field; this card's ATK becomes the same as the targeted monster's, if any.

texts.name: Bacon Saver (Anime)
texts.desc: If a monster you control attacks or is attacked: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; that monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, and you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Galaxy Knight (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a face-up "Galaxy Knight", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If you control another card with the same name, this card cannot declare an attack.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Decider (Anime)
texts.desc: Level 6 or higher monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for attacks. If a card or effect is activated that would inflict damage to you during the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can make that effect damage to you 0, then add this card from your Graveyard to your hand.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Dynatag (Anime)
texts.desc: During the Damage Step, when a monster you control battles and your LP is lower than your opponent's (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; you take no battle damage from that battle, and if you do, each player takes 1000 damage.

texts.name: Black Garden (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster is Normal or Special Summoned, except by the effect of "Black Garden": halve its ATK and Special Summon 1 "Rose Token" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 2/ATK 800/DEF 800) in Attack Position to its controller's opponent's side of the field. "Rose Tokens" cannot be destroyed by battle or declare an attack. You can destroy this card and all face-up Plant-Type monsters on the field; Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard whose ATK is equal to or less than the total ATK of those monsters.

texts.name: Dark Tinker (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: its controller can draw 1 card.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Lancer Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: If an "Odd-Eyes" monster(s) you control is destroyed: You can Tribute 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster or 2 other monsters; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; it has its effects negated. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. During damage calculation, if a monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can return 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster you control to the hand; that monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle. During damage calculation, if a monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can send 2 "Odd-Eyes" monsters from your hand to the Graveyard; that monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, any battle damage you take from that battle becomes halved, also inflict damage to your opponent equal to the damage you took from that battle.

texts.name: D/D/D Fusion
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "D/D/D" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials. If Summoning this way using "D/D/D Doom King Armageddon" as a normal Fusion Material, this card can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material listed on the Fusion Monster Card.
texts.str1: Use "D/D/D Doom King Armageddon" as material?

texts.name: D/D/D Xyz
texts.desc: Target any number of "D/D/D" Pendulum Monsters in your Graveyard and/or face-up in your Extra Deck; Special Summon them, but they have their effects negated (if any), and if you do, immediately after this card resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster using only those monsters. If using "D/D/D Doom King Armageddon" as Xyz Material this way, you can use 1 less Material than required.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Fusiongate
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up "Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon" in your Extra Deck and 1 Fusion Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon them, but they have their effects negated (if any), then Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, using only the Summoned monsters as Fusion Materials. This card remains on the field as long as a monster Fusion Summoned by this card's effect is on the field. If the monster Fusion Summoned by this card with the above effect is destroyed: You can send this card to the Graveyard, and if you do, add 1 "Odd-Eyes Synchrogate" from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Pendulum Summon the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Synchrogate
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up "Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon" in your Extra Deck and 1 Synchro Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon them, but they have their effects negated (if any), also that "Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon" is treated as a Level 1 Tuner, then immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, using only the Summoned monsters as Materials. This card remains on the field as long as a monster Synchro Summoned by this card's effect is on the field. If the monster Synchro Summoned by this card with the above effect is destroyed: You can send this card to the Graveyard, and if you do, add 1 "Odd-Eyes Xyzgate" from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Pendulum Summon the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Xyzgate
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up "Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon" in your Extra Deck and 1 Xyz Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon them, but they have their effects negated (if any), also that Xyz Monster is treated as a Level 7 monster, then immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, using only the Summoned monsters as Materials. This card remains on the field as long as a monster Xyz Summoned by this card's effect is on the field. During your Battle Phase: You can banish this card you control, and 1 "Odd-Eyes Fusiongate" and 1 "Odd-Eyes Synchrogate" from your Graveyard; until the end of the Battle Phase, the monster Xyz Summoned by this card with the above effect gains 1000 ATK, also it can make a second attack. You cannot Pendulum Summon the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: D/D/D Synchro
texts.desc: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters you control. If Synchro Summoning a "D/D/D" Synchro Monster, you can also use monsters in your hand as Synchro Material. If you use "D/D/D Doom King Armageddon" as Synchro Material, you can treat this card as a Level 2 Tuner.
texts.str1: Use this card as a Tuner with "D/D/D Doom King Armageddon"?

texts.name: Superheavy Samurai Helper (Anime)
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if a player would take battle damage from an attack involving a Defense Position monster while you have no Spells/Traps in your Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; that Defense Position monster gains DEF equal to the DEF of 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster you control, during that damage calculation only.

texts.name: Cipher Deterrent
texts.desc: During your opponent's Main Phase 1: Target 1 "Cipher" monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn, also if it battles this turn, double its ATK during the End Phase.

texts.name: Battleguard Rage (Anime)
texts.desc: When you take battle damage: Activate this card by targeting 1 "Battleguard" monster you control. It gains 2000 ATK. Monsters destroyed by battle with it are returned to the hand instead of going to the Graveyard. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Constellar Tempest (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate only if you control 2 "Constellar" Xyz Monsters. During the End Phase, halve your opponent's LP. When a "Constellar" monster you control leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Performapal Odd-Eyes Dissolver (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can destroy this card in your Pendulum Zone; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as Fusion Materials.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
During damage calculation, when a monster you control battles while this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; that monster you control cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle, then Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, that target has its effects negated, also this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn. During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using this card you control and 1 card in your Pendulum Zone as Fusion Materials.

texts.name: Montage Fusion
texts.desc: Once per turn, if each player controls 1 or more Fusion Materials listed on a Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that lists those Fusion Materials, using only the monsters you control as Fusion Materials, but destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Gagaga Head (Manga)
texts.desc: If you have 2 or more monsters in your Graveyard, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon as many "Gagaga" monsters as possible from your Graveyard. During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Number" Xyz Monster from your Graveyard by using all "Gagaga" monsters you control as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.). If this card is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, draw cards equal to the number of "Gagaga" monsters used as Xyz Materials for that Xyz Summon.

texts.name: Commander Covington (Manga)
texts.desc: You can stack all "Machina" monsters you control on top of each other (min. 2); Special Summon 1 "Machina Force" from your Extra Deck and stack it on top of them. If this card leaves the field or this card's effects are negated: Destroy the monster(s) Summoned by this card's effect and Special Summon the monsters undernath it.

texts.name: Machina Force (Manga)
texts.desc:
2+ "Machina" monsters
Must be Special Summoned with "Commander Covington", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You must pay 1000 LP to declare an attack with this card. This card's original ATK/DEF becomes equal to the total ATK/DEF of the "Machina" monsters undernath it. This effect cannot be negated.

texts.name: Armoroid (Manga)
texts.desc:
3 "roid" monsters
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by equipping the above monsters you control to this card as Equip Spells, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card destroys a Defense Position monster by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half this card's ATK. If a "roid" monster equpped to this card by this card's procedure is destroyed: This card loses 600 ATK. If there are no "roid" monsters equipped to this card, destroy this card.

texts.name: Number 48: Shadow Lich (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 3 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When this card would be destroyed or banished by an opponent's card: Special Summon as many "Phantom Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Rank 3/ATK 500/DEF 500) as possible instead, then, until the End Phase, hide this card among them, with the same name, ATK/DEF as them. You take no battle damage from battles involving a "Phantom Token". When a "Phantom Token" is destroyed: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK. Once per turn: You can activate this effect; this card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all "Phantom Tokens" you currently control, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Junk Meister
texts.desc: When this card is attacked: You can activate 1 "Junk" Spell/Trap from your Deck.

texts.name: Junk Anchor (Manga)
texts.desc: You can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to Synchro Summon a monster from your Extra Deck using only this card and a "Junk" monster in your Graveyard as materials.

texts.name: Stronghold the Moving Fortress (Manga)
texts.desc: If an opponent's monster declares a direct attack, you can negate it, then Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 2000). While you control "Green Gadget", "Red Gadget", and "Yellow Gadget", this card gains 3000 ATK.

texts.name: Phantom Effect
texts.desc: If you would take damage from a Spell/Trap effect: That damage becomes 0, then Special Summon 1 "Phantom Token" (Zombie-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK ?/DEF 0) with ATK equal to the amount of damage you would have taken. That "Phantom Token" can attack directly.

texts.name: Phantom Token
texts.desc: Summoned by the effect of "Phantom Effect".

texts.name: Seven Swords Warrior (Manga)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When an Equip Card is equipped to this card: Inflict 700 damage to your opponent. When Equip Cards leave the Field: Target an equal number of monsters on the Field; destroy them.

texts.name: Trick Buster (Manga)
texts.desc: If your attack target changes: destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Pendulum Transfer (Manga)
texts.desc:
Place 2 monsters you control in your Pendulum Zone.
(The Pendulum Scales of the monster with a lower Level become equal to the combined Level of both monsters +1; the Pendulum Scales of the monster with a higher Level become equal to the difference in Levels between the 2 monsters.)

texts.name: Helpoemer (Manga)
texts.desc: If this card in Attack Position would be sent to your Graveyard, it is sent to your opponent's Graveyard, instead. At the end of your Battle Phase, if this card in your Graveyard was controlled by your opponent: Discard 1 random card. This card must be in the Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Neo Bubbleman (Anime)
texts.desc: Must be Special Summoned with the effect of "Metamorphosis", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's name is treated as "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" while it is face-up on the field. Destroy an opponent's monster that battles this card at the end of the Damage Step.

texts.name: Number 72: Shogi Rook (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 6 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy all cards your opponent controls in the same column as this card, and if this card is affected by "Line Promotion", destroy 2 cards in your opponent's Monster Zones that are adjacent to this card's column as well.

texts.name: Line Promotion
texts.desc: When "Line World" is on the field, this trap amplifies the effects of any of your Line Monsters that have destroyed one of your opponent's monsters.

texts.name: Doll House
texts.desc: During the next Standby Phase after 2 or more "Doll Monster" monsters you control were destroyed: Special Summon "Doll Monster" monsters from your Deck equal to the number of destroyed monsters - 1, whose Levels are equal to the destroyed monsters' Levels + 2.

texts.name: Number 13: Embodiment of Crime (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 1 monsters
When your opponent has "Number 31: Embodiment of Punishment" in their Extra Deck, and both players' LP become half the starting LP, Special Summon this card, and if you do, destroy all monsters you control and your LP becomes 1000. If this card would be destroyed while "Number 31: Embodiment of Punishment" is on the field, inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK instead.

texts.name: Number 31: Embodiment of Punishment (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 Level 1 monsters
When your opponent has "Number 13: Embodiment of Crime" in their Extra Deck, and both players' LP become half the starting LP, Special Summon this card, and if you do, destroy all monsters you control and your LP becomes 1000. If this card would be destroyed while "Number 13: Embodiment of Crime" is on the field, inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK instead.

texts.name: Rank-Up-Magic Admiration of the Thousands (Anime)
texts.desc: Target any number of "Number C" Xyz Monsters with the same Rank on the field and/or in either player's Graveyard; treat them as having a Level that is 1 higher than their Rank. Immediately after this card resolves, Xyz Summon, from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C" Xyz Monster using those monsters. The Summoned monster can activate the effect(s) it would gain if it is Xyz Summoned by Rank-Up.
texts.str1: Affected by "Rank-Up-Magic Admiration of the Thousands (Anime)"

texts.name: Arcana Force VII - The Chariot (Anime)
texts.desc:
When this card is Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect.
 Heads: When an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.
 Tails: When this card is destroyed by battle: Special Summon this card to your opponent's side of the field.

texts.name: Reversal of Fate (Anime)
texts.desc: The effect of all "Arcana Force" monsters on the field are now treated as the opposite coin toss result.

texts.name: Arcana Force 0 - The Fool (Anime)
texts.desc:
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Cannot be changed to Defense Position. When your opponent activates a card or effect that would toss a coin, they can choose which effect to apply without tossing a coin. When this card is Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect.
 Heads: Cannot be targeted and is unaffected by your card effects.
 Tails: Cannot be targeted and is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.

texts.name: Magical Stone Excavation (Anime)
texts.desc: Discard 2 cards, then add 1 Spell in your Graveyard to your hand, but you cannot use that card this turn.

texts.name: Battlin' Boxer Headgeared (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Ultra Polymerization (Anime)
texts.desc:
Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this card's activation. Pay 1000 LP, then target 2 Fusion Materials you control that are listed on a Fusion Monster; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using those 2 monsters you control as Fusion Materials, then Special Summon the targeted monsters in Attack Position, but their ATK becomes 0, then you can apply 1 of these effects.
 The targeted monsters become Level 4 until the end of this turn.
 1 of the targeted monsters is treated as a Tuner until the end of this turn.
During the End Phase, if this card was activated this turn and you did not use the monsters Special Summoned by this card's effect as Synchro or Xyz Materials for a Summon: Destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to their combined ATK.

texts.name: Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
Once per Duel: You can reveal 1 "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon" in your Extra Deck; this card can attack 3 times during each Battle Phase. If you do, destroy this card at the end of the Battle Phase. While this card is in your Graveyard, "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon" you control cannot be targeted and is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.

texts.name: Burning Sonic
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack: Activate this card by targeting that monster; negate the attack. While this card is in the Spell & Trap Zone, that monster gains 500 ATK. If that monster would be targeted by a Spell/Trap Card or effect, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Attack Reversal
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; switch the ATK of those targets until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Raidraptor - Risky Flight
texts.desc: If an Attack Position Level 4 or lower "Raidraptor" monster you control is targeted for an attack: That monster you control cannot be destroyed by that battle, also any battle damage you take from that battle becomes halved, then end the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Speedroid Terrortop (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control no monsters.

texts.name: Vision HERO Trinity (Manga)
texts.desc:
2 or 3 "Vision HERO" monsters
When this card is Fusion Summoned using 3 monsters as Fusion Materials, double this card's ATK.

texts.name: Red-Eyes Spirit (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes" monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed and sent there this turn, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

texts.name: Backlash
texts.desc: Activate only when a monster battles a Defense Position monster you control, but is not destroyed by that battle. Inflict 800 damage to your opponent and draw 1 card.

texts.name: Winged Kuriboh LV9 (Manga)
texts.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Alchemical Experiment", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's ATK/DEF are equal to the combined ATK/DEF of the monster's banished with "Alchemical Experiment". Once per turn, during End Phase of the turn it was Summoned: Destroy this card.

texts.name: Clear Kuriboh (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a monster effect that would inflict damage (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate the activation. When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; draw 1 card, if it is a monster, you can Special Summon it, and if you do, the opponent's monster must attack that monster, if able.

texts.name: Junkuriboh (Manga)
texts.desc: If you would take damage that would make your LP 0: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; You take no damage from that card or effect, and destroy it.

texts.name: Magic Barrier
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it is unaffected by card effects this turn.

texts.name: Multiplication of Ants (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control "Soldier Ari" in face-up Attack Position: Place as many "Army Ants" to your side of the field. These "Army Ants" cannot attack. Destroy them during the End Phase.

texts.name: Red Armor
texts.desc: When a "Red" monster(s) you control is targeted by a card effect: This turn, "Red" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 "Red" monster you control; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Predaplant Drosophyllum Hydra (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Predaplant" monster from your Graveyard, then target 1 monster on the field; it loses 500 ATK. If you would take battle damage while this card is in the Graveyard: You banish 1 "Predaplant" monster from your Graveyard, and if you do, return 1 of your banished monsters to the Graveyard, then halve that battle damage you would take.

texts.name: Duel
texts.desc: Both players increase their hands to six.

texts.name: Gagaga Child (Anime)
texts.desc: You can target 1 Level 4 or higher "Gagaga" monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand, then this card's Level becomes the current Level of that target. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as Xyz Material cannot attack during the turn it is Xyz Summoned.

texts.name: Gagaga Girl (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon with another "Gagaga" monster: You can reduce the ATK of 1 face-up Xyz Monster your opponent controls to 0.

texts.name: Dark Contract with Underworld Insurance
texts.desc: Activate only during your Main Phase 2. If a monster you control battled an opponent's monster, but the opponent's monster was not destroyed by the battle: Draw cards equal to the number of opponent's monsters that were not destroyed.

texts.name: Dark Contract with the Gate (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phases: Take 1000 damage. Once per turn: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "D/D" monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Performapal Pinch Helper (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card when an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: Negate the attack, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Performapal" monster with 800 or less ATK from your Deck, but its effects are negated. When a monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can send this face-up card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the Graveyard; halve any battle damage either player takes from this battle.

texts.name: Sunlight Unicorn (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Spell, add it to your hand, otherwise, place it at the bottom of your Deck.

texts.name: Reinforce Truth (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Standby Phase: Special Summon 1 monster with 1000 ATK or less from your Deck. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: Amphibian Angel - Frog-Hael (Anime)
texts.desc:
You can Tribute up to 3 "Frog" monsters to Tribute Summon this card. This card gains effects based on the number of "Frog" monsters used in its Tribute Summon:
 1+: This card cannot be targeted for an attack.
 2+: When this card is Tribute Summoned: Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards on the field.
 3+: When this card is Tribute Summoned: Special Summon as many "Frog" monsters from your Graveyard as possible that were Summoned during this Duel.

texts.name: Performapal Kuribohble (Manga)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you would take battle damage, gain the same amount of LP instead.

texts.name: Sonic Cyclone
texts.desc: Destroy a number of Spells/Traps on the field equal to the number of monsters destroyed this turn.

texts.name: Winged Kuriboh (Anime)
texts.desc: On the turn which this card is destroyed, you take no Battle Damage.

texts.name: Dragon's Orb
texts.desc: This turn, the effects of Dragon-Type monsters you control cannot be negated.

texts.name: Timegazer Magician (Pre-Pendulum)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control; it cannot be destroyed by card effects.

texts.name: Stargazer Magician (Pre-Pendulum)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Fusion Destruction
texts.desc: Activate this card by sending 1 "Polymerization" from your hand to the Graveyard; look at your opponent's Deck, also banish up to 3 "Polymerization" Spells/Traps and/or "Fusion" Spells/Traps from their Deck, then inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card banished. When your opponent activates a "Polymerization" Spell/Trap or "Fusion" Spell/Trap (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Captain Tenacious (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster in your Graveyard that was destroyed by battle the previous turn; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Flame Wingman (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Avian" + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix"
This monster can only be Special Summoned by Fusion Summon. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

texts.name: Bachibachibachi (Anime)
texts.desc: If an Xyz Monster that has this card as Xyz Material attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Kaiser Vorse Raider (Anime)
texts.desc: When you control no monsters, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing monsters. When this card destroys a monster by battle, this card gains 500 ATK until the next Standby Phase. A monster that destroyed this monster by battle loses 500 ATK.

texts.name: Gorgon
texts.desc:
"Yellow Hecate" + "Red Hecate" + "Violet Hecate"
Must first be summoned by Sending the above cards you control to the GY.

texts.name: G Golem Crystal Heart
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 EARTH Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your field so it is co-linked to this card, also, after that, place 1 G Golem Counter on this card. EARTH monsters this card points to gain 600 ATK for each G Golem Counter on this card. While 2 or more G Golem Counters are on this card, monsters co-linked to this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

texts.name: Love Gravity
texts.desc: Target 1 EARTH Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone a Link Monster points to.

texts.name: Gravity Fluctuation
texts.desc: Target 1 EARTH monster you control; destroy it, then your opponent destroys 1 monster they control with ATK less than or equal to the targeted monster's ATK.

texts.name: Raidraptor - Retrofit Lanius
texts.desc: If this card is in your hand or on your field: You can target 1 "Raidraptor" monster you control; this card's Level and name become the same as that monster until the end of this turn. If this card is used for the Xyz Summon of a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster, you can treat it as 2 monsters.

texts.name: Rank-Up-Magic Cipher Pursuit
texts.desc: If the difference between your LP and your opponent's is at least 2000: Target 1 "Cipher" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Cipher" Xyz Monster that is 1 Rank higher than that target, by using it as the Xyz Material, and if you do, you can activate that Xyz Monster's effect that is activated by detaching its own Xyz Material(s). (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its Xyz Materials to the Summoned monster.)

texts.name: Cipher Chain
texts.desc: If you take battle damage: Activate this card by targeting all monsters on the field. When 1 of those monsters is destroyed, destroy all the other monsters, and if you do, inflict damage to both players equal to the total ATK of those destroyed monsters.

texts.name: Y-Dragon Head (Manga)
texts.desc: A combative machine that can combine with one or two other specific machines on the own field to form a new monster.

texts.name: Z-Metal Tank (Manga)
texts.desc: A combative machine that can combine with one or two other specific machines on the own field to form a new monster.

texts.name: Raidraptor - Revolution Falcon (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 6 Winged Beast-Type monsters
At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a face-up Special Summoned monster your opponent controls: You can make that monster's ATK/DEF become 0. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. If this card is Xyz Summoned by using a Rank 5 or lower "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster as Xyz Material: You can target 1 Special Summoned monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the destroyed monster's ATK.

texts.name: Silent Doom (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard in face-up Defense Position, but it cannot attack.

texts.name: Hi-Speedroid Chanbara (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this card battles, during damage calculation: It gains 100 ATK.

texts.name: Performapal Springoose (Anime)
texts.desc: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 2 cards you control; return them to the hand.

texts.name: Gagaga Mancer (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Gagaga" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; if 1 "Gagaga" monster you control attacks an opponent's monster this turn, it gains 500 ATK during damage calculation only.

texts.name: Puppet Ritual (Anime)
texts.desc: If you have 2000 or less LP: You can target 1 "Gimmick Puppet" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target, but it cannot attack this turn.

texts.name: Jinzo - Returner (Anime)
texts.desc: This card can attack directly. When this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Jinzo" from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Hidden Soldiers (Manga)
texts.desc: When your opponent Summons a monster: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

texts.name: Rope of Life (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster you control is sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon that monster and it gains 800 ATK.

texts.name: Rainbow Kuriboh (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's Xyz Monster declares an attack: You can equip this monster from your hand to that monster. It cannot attack. When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. If Summoned this way, banish this card when it is destroyed.

texts.name: Chronomaly Cabrera Trebuchet (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is in face-up Attack Position: You can Tribute 1 other monster you control to target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change this card to Defense Position, and that target's ATK becomes 0 until the End Phase.

texts.name: Reflect Bounder (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster attacks this face-up Attack Position monster, its controller takes battle damage equal to that monster's attack instead. After damage calculation, if this face-up Attack Position card is attacked: Destroy this card.

texts.name: Fortune Lady Light (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Increase its Level by 1 (max. 12). This card's ATK/DEF are equal to its Level x 200. When this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Fortune Lady" monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Deep Diver (Anime)
texts.desc: At the end of this Battle Phase, if this card was destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Choose 1 card in your Deck and place it on top of your Deck.

texts.name: Ivy Shackles (Anime)
texts.desc: During your turn, face-up monsters your opponent controls become Plant-Type monsters. When this face-up card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Scarred Warrior (Manga)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Monsters your opponent controls must attack this card, if able. Once, while this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Thunder Short (Anime)
texts.desc: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

texts.name: Shark Stickers (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Fish-Type monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your side of the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.

texts.name: Honest (Anime)
texts.desc: During your Main Phase: You can return this face-up card from the field to its owner's hand. You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 1 Level 7 or higher Warrior-Type monster; when it battles this turn, it gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster your opponent controls it is battling.

texts.name: Barrier Gum
texts.desc: When a monster would be destroyed by battle: It is not destroyed by that battle.

texts.name: Meteor of Destruction (Anime)
texts.desc: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Violet Witch (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card you control is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 Plant-Type monster with 1500 DEF or less from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Overlay Booster (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a monster with 2000 or more ATK, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control; it gains 500 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to it.

texts.name: Dino Deceit
texts.desc:
When your opponent activates the effect of a Link Monster whose Link Rating is higher than or equal to the Link Rating of a "Dinowrestler" Link Monster you control: Negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand. If this effect was activated during your opponent's turn, add this additional effect.
 Your opponent must conduct their Battle Phase this turn.
texts.str1: Do you want to Set a Spell/Trap?

texts.name: Dino Domain
texts.desc: While you control a monster in the Extra Monster Zone, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Dinowrestler" monster you control; return it to the hand, then all face-up monsters you control are unaffected by the effects of monsters your opponent controls until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Dino Sense
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card while you control a "Dinowrestler" Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card, then inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster you control.

texts.name: One-Eyed Skill Gainer (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 4 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card to target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; this card gains the same effect(s) as that target, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Chronomaly Aztec Mask Golem (Anime)
texts.desc: During your turn, if you have activated a Spell Card this turn, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

texts.name: Chronomaly Colossal Head (Anime)
texts.desc: (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 Attack Position monster you control; change that target to Defense Position.

texts.name: Infernity Destroyer (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card destroys a monster by battle while you have no cards in your hand: You can inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Darkbright (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Necroshade"
Must be Fusion Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battles: You can change its battle position. If this card is destroyed: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Magma Neos (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab" + "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by returning the above cards you control to your Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) This card gains 400 ATK for each card on the field. During the End Phase: Return this card to the Extra Deck.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Storm Neos (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird" + "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by returning the above cards you control to your Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn: You can destroy all Spells/Traps on the field. During the End Phase: Return this card to the Extra Deck.

texts.name: Cyclone Boomerang (Anime)
texts.desc: Equip only to "Elemental HERO Wildheart". It gains 500 ATK. If the equipped monster is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy all Spells/Traps on the field, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Spell/Trap destroyed.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Aqua Neos (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; randomly choose 2 cards from your opponent's hand and destroy them. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Return this card to the Extra Deck.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Absolute Zero (Manga)
texts.desc:
1 "HERO" monster + 1 WATER monster
This card gains 500 ATK for each other WATER monster on the field.

texts.name: Umbral Horror Will o' the Wisp (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up monster you control that has a Level; this card's Level becomes the current Level of that monster.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Terra Firma (Manga)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Ocean" + "Elemental HERO Woodsman"
You can Tribute 1 "Elemental HERO" monster you control; "Elemental HERO Terra Firmas" on the field gains ATK/DEF equal to the Tributed monster's ATK/DEF, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Necroshade (Anime)
texts.desc: Once, while this card is in your Graveyard, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" monster from your hand without Tributing.

texts.name: Evil HERO Infernal Sniper (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Clayman" + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix"
Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn, if this card is in Defense Position: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Cannot be destroyed by Spell cards or effects.

texts.name: Dotedotengu (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 card you control; return it to the hand.

texts.name: Wroughtweiler (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Target 1 "Elemental HERO" card and 1 "Polymerization" in your Graveyard; add both those targets to your hand.
texts.str1: Add 1 "Elemental Hero" card and 1 "Polymerization" from your Graveyard to your hand

texts.name: Performapal Turn Toad (Anime)
texts.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 3 
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 Pendulum Monster on the field; switch its current ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
During the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control; change it to Attack Position. This turn, that target gains ATK equal to half its current DEF.
texts.str2: Target 1 faceup Defense Positon monster you control

texts.name: Pinpoint Guard (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position, but its effects are negated.

texts.name: Xyz Shift (Anime)
texts.desc: Send 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Rank as the sent monster, then attach this card to it as an Xyz Material.

texts.name: Spell Calling (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is destroyed by the effect of a Spell/Trap; Set 2 Spells from your Deck.

texts.name: Numbers Overlay Boost (Anime)
texts.desc: Attach up to 2 cards from your hand to a "Number" Xyz Monster you control with no materials, as materials.

texts.name: Ancient Gear Explosive (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up "Ancient Gear" monster you control; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half its original ATK.

texts.name: Evil HERO Infernal Prodigy (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Tributed for a Tribute Summon: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo (Anime)
texts.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: change this card to Defense Position, then, it gains DEF equal to the DEF of the destroyed monster until the End Phase of your opponent's turn.

texts.name: Tindangle Acute Cerberus (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 "Tindangle" monsters
Gains 1500 ATK for each "Tindangle Hound" and "Tindangle Angel" in your Graveyard. Gains 500 ATK for each "Tindangle" monster it points to. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card declared an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "Tindangle Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).

texts.name: Scan Doll
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Trap in your opponent's Graveyard; activate it on your opponent's field. You can Tribute this card, then target 1 monster you control; it can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.
texts.str1: Target 1 Trap card in your opponent's GY

texts.name: Flick Clown (Anime)
texts.desc: If you have no cards in your hand: You can pay 1000 LP; draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Flick Clown" once per Duel.

texts.name: Destiny HERO - Blade Master (Anime)
texts.desc: During either player's Battle Phase: You can discard this card; all face-up "Destiny HERO" monsters you control gain 800 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Perfectron Hydradrive Dragon
texts.desc:
1+ Link Monsters
If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck to your field: You can place 5 Hydradrive Counters on this card. Gains 1000 ATK for each Hydradrive Counter on it. While this card has a Hydradrive Counter, you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. If this card would be destroyed, you can remove 1 Hydradrive Counter from this card instead. After damage calculation, if this card battled: Destroy as many monsters your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each "Hydradrive" Link Monster in your GY.

texts.name: Sunavalon Melias (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ Plant monsters, including a Link Monster
Cannot be used as Link Material the turn it is Link Summoned. If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 Plant monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position to your zone this card points to. Cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly. At the start of your Battle Phase: You can target 1 "Sunvine" Link Monster this card points to; during this Battle Phase, it can attack up to the number of "Sunavalon" Link Monsters you control.

texts.name: Card of Pandora
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets exactly 1 card in your Spell & Trap Zone (and no other cards) that could have targeted this card: That card/effect now targets this card, then draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Card of Pandora" per turn.

texts.name: Sunseed Shadow (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a Plant Normal Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Extra Linked Link-2 or lower Plant Link Monster; Special Summon 1 Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same name to your field so it is co-linked. You can only use each effect of "Sunseed Shadow" once per turn.

texts.name: Hydradrive Element
texts.desc: If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field and declare 1 Attribute; it becomes that Attribute until the End Phase.

texts.name: Hydradrive Tolerance
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 "Hydradrive" Link Monster in your GY that was destroyed and sent there this turn; reduce any battle damage you would take from that battle by that monster's Link Rating x 300, also you take no further battle or effect damage until the End Phase.

texts.name: Borrel Ring
texts.desc: Activate this card by Tributing 1 "Borrel" Link Monster; place counters on this card equal to the Tributed monster's Link Rating. Once per attack, when your monster is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: You can remove 1 counter from this card; your monster cannot be destroyed by that battle, also that opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the number of counters on this card x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. If the last counter(s) is removed from this card, destroy it.

texts.name: Hydradrive Gravity
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control a Link Monster in the Extra Monster Zone: Target that opponent's monster; move it to your opponent's Main Monster Zone your Link Monster in the Extra Monster Zone points to. If you would target a monster whose current ATK is higher than its original ATK with this card, you can activate this card from your hand.

texts.name: Alteration Hydradrive
texts.desc:
1 "Hydradrive" monster
Cannot be used as material for the Link Summon of a Link-1 Link Monster. If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Hydradrive" Link Monster you control; Special Summon from your GY as many "Hydradrive" Link Monsters as possible with a lower Link Rating than the targeted monster to your Main Monster Zones the targeted monster points to, but negate their effects (if any), then destroy the targeted monster. You can only use this effect of "Alteration Hydradrive" once per turn.

texts.name: Paradox Hydradrive Atlas
texts.desc:
2+ "Hydradrive" monsters, including a Level 5 or higher Effect Monster
This card's activated effects cannot be negated. If this card is Special Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die, and this card becomes the Attribute that corresponds to the result.
 1: EARTH  2: WATER  3: FIRE  4: WIND  5: LIGHT  6: DARK
During your Main Phase: You can roll a six-sided die, and Special Summon 1 "Hydradrive" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating as the result, to your zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of "Paradox Hydradrive Atlas" once per turn. Monsters this card points to become the same Attribute as this card. While another monster with the same Attribute as this card is on the field, this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects, also it cannot be targeted for attacks.

texts.name: Sunseed Twin (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned, and you control a "Sunavalon" monster: You can target 1 Plant Normal Monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If you have 2 or more Link Monsters in your GY with the same name: You can banish this card from your GY and 1 Link Monster you control, then target 1 of those Link Monsters in your GY with the same name; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Sunvine Plunder
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 face-up Spell your opponent controls; take control of that target. When this card leaves the field, return that card to its owner. When that card leaves the field, destroy this card. While you control a "Sunavalon" monster, your opponent cannot target this card or that card with card effects.

texts.name: Hydradrive Readvent
texts.desc: Target 1 Link Monster in your GY with less ATK than the monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK; Special Summon it, but negate its effects, also destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Borrel Buster Barrier
Overfloater
texts.desc: After damage calculation, if this card was destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster: You can target that opponent's monster; negate its effects. You cannot use the following effect of "Overfloater" the turn you apply this effect of "Overfloater". When an opponent's monster declares an attack while your opponent controls more monsters than you do: You can banish this card from your GY, then target that attacking monster; negate the effects of all monsters your opponent controls with original ATK less than or equal to the targeted monster's original ATK.

texts.name: Borrel Half Replace
texts.desc: Target 1 "Borrel" Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon 1 "Borrel" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating as that monster, but a different name, and if you do, its ATK becomes halved, its effects are negated, also it is destroyed during the End Phase. You can banish this card and 2 "Rokket" monsters from your GY; Special Summon 1 Link-2 DARK Link Monster from your Extra Deck to your zone a "Borrel" Link Monster points to. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) You can only use each effect of "Borrel Half Replace" once per turn.
texts.str2: Special Summon 1 Link-2 DARK Link Monster

texts.name: Vain Betrayer (Anime)
texts.desc: When a "V" monster declares an attack: Send all "V" cards from your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, gain 500 Life Points for each card sent, then shuffle your opponent's Deck, then send 5 more cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard for each card sent to the Graveyard by this effect. While this card is face-up on the field, the effects of all "V" monsters are negated, also they cannot attack.
texts.str1: Discard all "V" cards to the GY.

texts.name: Interference Canceller
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 co-linked Link Monster you control. If your opponent activates a card or effect that would inflict damage to you: Make that effect damage to you 0. You can only use this effect a number of times per turn up to the targeted monster's Link Rating. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was activated this turn: Set this card to your Spell & Trap Zone.

texts.name: Dice Logic
texts.desc:
Once per attack, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can target that attacking monster; roll a six-sided die and apply the result. Once per turn, if you activate this effect during a turn in which you applied another effect that rolls a die and the result of this effect is 5 or lower, you can apply this effect as the result +1.

Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can target 1 Link-1 "Appliancer" Link Monster in your Main Monster Zone; move it to another of your Main Monster Zones. You can only activate 1 "Appliancer Electrilyrical World" per turn.

texts.name: Appliancer Copybokkle (Anime)
texts.desc: You can target 1 "Appliancer" monster you control, except "Appliancer Copybokkle"; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, its name, Type, and Attribute become the same as that monster's, until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Appliancer Copybokkle" once per turn.

texts.name: Appliancer Kappa Scale (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Level 1 "Appliancer" monster

If this card is not co-linked: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Level 4 or lower "Appliancer" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Appliancer Kappa Scale" once per turn.

If an "Appliancer" Link Monster(s) you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: You can target 1 of your destroyed Link Monsters and 1 Link-1 Link Monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon your monster to your field so it is co-linked, and if you do, banish that opponent's monster, then banish this card.

During damage calculation, if an opponent's monster attacks: You can banish this card from your GY; any battle damage you take from that battle is halved. You can only activate 1 "Appliancer Reduction" per turn.

texts.name: Appliancer Recycling
texts.desc: If an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of a card effect: Target 1 Link-1 Link Monster in each GY; banish them, then Special Summon 1 "Appliancer" monster from your GY, and if you do, your opponent Special Summons 1 of their banished Link Monsters. These Special Summoned monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. You can only activate 1 "Appliancer Recycling" per turn.

texts.desc:

Once per turn, when this card that is not co-linked is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack.

Once per turn, while this card is in the Spell & Trap Zone by this effect: You can return 1 Link Monster from your GY to the Extra Deck, then Special Summon 1 "Armatos Legio" Link Monster from your GY to your zone this card points to.

You can target 1 Monster Card you control that is treated as a Continuous Spell; while it is in the Spell & Trap Zone, the name, Type, Attribute, Level, and ATK/DEF of this card become the same as that card's, but destroy this card when that card leaves the field.

texts.name: 3D Bio Scanner
texts.desc: Reveal 3 Machine monsters with the same name in your hand; Special Summon 1 non-Machine monster from your Deck, but it cannot attack, its effects are negated, also it is shuffled into your Deck at the end of this turn.

texts.name: Link Rush
texts.desc: Before damage calculation, when a Link Monster that was Link Summoned this turn battles a monster: Destroy the monster that Link Monster is battling.

texts.name: Poisoning Blocker
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can change this card to Defense Position, and if you do, this card gains 800 ATK/DEF.

texts.name: Zombie Prosaber
texts.desc:
1 Cyberse Normal Monster
If an opponent's monster(s) this card points to is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 of those opponent's monsters from their GY to your field, but destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Golden Allure Queen
texts.desc:
3 Spellcaster monsters
This Link Summoned card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all "Allure Queen" monsters it points to. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets an "Allure Queen" monster(s) you control, or when your "Allure Queen" monster is targeted for an attack, while "Allure Palace" is in a Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can make that monster unable to be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn, then you can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Allure Palace
texts.desc: All "Allure Queen" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF, also you can activate their effects that activate by sending themselves to the GY during your Main Phase. If an "Allure Queen" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as that monster from your Deck to your opponent's field.

texts.name: Allure Dance
texts.desc: Each "Allure Queen" monster on the field gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it by its own effect. While you control an "Allure Queen" monster, your opponent's monsters must attack, if able, also you choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks. You can send to the GY 1 Equip Card you control that was equipped by the effect of an "Allure Queen" monster; Special Summon as many "Allure Queen" monsters with different Levels from your GY as possible. You can only use this effect of "Allure Dance" once per turn.

texts.name: Stairs of Mail (Anime)
texts.desc:
During your Main Phase: You can send 1 "Tindangle" card from your hand to the GY, then apply 1 of the following effects, also you cannot send other cards with the same name to the GY by the effect of your "Stairs of Mail" for the rest of this turn.
 Change 1 face-down Defense Position monster you control to face-up Attack Position.
 Change 1 face-up Attack Position monster you control to face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: Darkness
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Destroy all cards in your Spell & Trap Zones, also, after that, Set 1 "Zero", "Infinity", "Darkness 1", "Darkness 2", and "Darkness 3" at random from your hand or Deck. You cannot look at these face-down cards. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Set all face-up Traps you control, and randomly rearrange all cards in your Spell & Trap Card Zone. If a Spell/Trap you control leaves the field, destroy all Spell/Traps you control.

texts.name: Darkness 1
texts.desc:
If this is the first card activated when "Infinity" and "Zero" are activated, it gains the following effect:
 Destroy 1 card your opponent controls, then destroy 1 card your opponent controls for each face-up "Darkness" Continuous Trap Card activated after this card.

texts.name: Darkness 2
texts.desc:
If this is the first card activated when "Infinity" and "Zero" are activated, it gains the following effect:
 Select 1 face-up monster you control. It gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase. Then 1 face-up monster you control gains 1000 ATK for each "Darkness" Continuous Trap Card activated after this card, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Darkness 3
texts.desc:
If this card is the first card activated when "Infinity" and "Zero" are activated, it gains the following effect: 
 Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent, then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each "Darkness" Continuous Trap Card activated after this card.

texts.name: Zero
texts.desc:
If you control "Darkness": apply the appropriate effect. 
 If you do not control "Infinity": Activate 1 Set card in your Spell & Trap Card Zone. 
 If you control "Infinity": Activate all Set Spell and Trap Cards you control between this card and 1 "Infinity" you control.

texts.name: Infinity
texts.desc:
If you control "Darkness": apply the appropriate effect. 
 If you do not control "Zero": Activate 1 Set card in your Spell & Trap Card Zone. 
 If you control "Zero": Activate all Set Spell and Trap Cards you control between this card and 1 "Zero" you control.

texts.name: Darkness Seed
texts.desc:
If this card is sent to the Graveyard: you can activate this effect; Special Summon this card during your second Standby Phase after activation. If this card is Special Summoned this way, it gains the following effects.
 This card cannot be destroyed by battle.
 Once per turn, during the End Phase, if you have less than 4000 LP: Your LP become 4000.

texts.name: Darkness Bramble
texts.desc: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can look at all Set Spells/Traps you control, ignoring the effects of "Darkness". Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if you have less than 4000 LP: Your LP become 4000.

texts.name: Darkness Raincrow
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can send this card from your hand and 1 "Darkness Bramble" you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Darkness Neosphere" from your Deck.

texts.name: Darkness Eye
texts.desc: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can look at all Set Spells/Traps you control, ignoring the effects of "Darkness". Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, if this card is in Attack Position: Once during this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 monster without Tributing.

texts.name: Darkness Outsider
texts.desc: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's Deck to your field, then shuffle this card into your opponent's Deck.

texts.name: Darkness Slime
texts.desc: If the total ATK of all face-up monsters you control is 0, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in Defense Position. If this card is Special Summoned this way: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; This card's ATK becomes equal to that monster's DEF, and its DEF becomes equal to that monster's ATK.

texts.name: Darkness Necroslime
texts.desc: You can send this card to the GY, then target 1 "Darkness" monster in your GY, except "Darkness Necroslime"; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Darkness Neosphere (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can look at all Set Spell/Trap Cards you control, ignoring the effects of "Darkness". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Set all Spell/Traps set by the effect of "Darkness" face-down and arrange them in any order. Once per turn: You can Set 1 face-up Spell/Trap. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if you have less than 4000 LP: Your LP become 4000.

texts.name: Stormrider Griffore
texts.desc: If your opponent controls a monster in their Monster Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is in your hand and there are no cards on the field: You can look at your opponent's hand, and if they have a Spell/Trap(s) in their hand, Set 1 of them to their field, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Stormrider Griffore" once per Duel.

texts.name: Stormrider Gargoyle
texts.desc: If your opponent activates a Field Spell Card or its effect: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; activate 1 "Stormrider Turbulence" directly from your Deck or GY. If you control a "Stormrider" Field Spell in your Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Stormrider" Field Spell you control to the GY, and if you do, take 1 "Stormrider" Field Spell from your Deck with a different name, and either activate it or add it to your hand.

texts.name: Stormrider Gulldiver
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if you would take battle damage (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; the damage you take from that battle is halved, then end the Battle Phase. You can only use this effect of "Stormrider Gulldiver" once per turn. At the start of the Main Phase 2, if this effect was applied this turn: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Stormrider" Link Monster from your GY, whose Link Rating is less than or equal to the number of your monsters destroyed by battle this turn, but its ATK becomes halved, also negate its effects.

texts.name: Stormrider Hippogriff
texts.desc: If your opponent controls a card in their Spell & Trap Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Stormrider Hippogriff" once per turn. If you use this card as material for a Link Summon while your opponent controls exactly 1 card in their Spell & Trap Zone: You can send that opponent's card to the GY, and if you do, your opponent draws 1 card.

texts.name: Stormrider Skyfisher
texts.desc: If you control no cards in your Spell & Trap Zones and Main Monster Zones: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then your opponent Sets 1 Spell/Trap from their GY to their field, but it cannot be activated. You can only use this effect of "Stormrider Skyfisher" once per turn. During your Main Phase, if you control "Stormrider Turbulence": You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand.

texts.name: Stormrider Blast
texts.desc: All "Stormrider" monsters on the field gain 400 ATK, and 300 ATK for each "Stormrider" Field Spell in your GY. While you control exactly 1 "Stormrider" Link Monster, your opponent cannot target that Link Monster with card effects, except with card effects activated on the field, also negate the effects of opponent's Link Monsters with an equal or lower Link Rating. While you control a "Stormrider" Link Monster in the Extra Monster Zone, your opponent's monsters must attack it, if able.

texts.name: Stormridership Bahamut Bomber
texts.desc:
2+ "Stormrider" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned while you control no cards in your Spell & Trap Zone: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to them. If you control no cards in your Spell & Trap Zone (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; destroy it, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to them. You can only use each effect of "Stormridership Bahamut Bomber" once per turn.

texts.name: Stormrider Harpiarm
