texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card while this card is in Attack Position (Quick Effect): You can change this card to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, destroy that card.

texts.name: Stormrider Return
texts.desc: If you control no cards in your Spell & Trap Zones: Target 1 "Stormrider" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Performapal Ignition Eagle
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During the Battle Step (Quick Effect): You can banish all cards in your Pendulum Zones and send "Performapal" monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard, equal to the number of cards in the Spell & Trap Zones, then target 1 monster you control; destroy as many cards in the Spell & Trap Zones as possible, then the targeted monster gains 500 ATK for each Pendulum Monster you currently control until the end of this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When a monster you control declares an attack: You can target that monster; Special Summon 1 card from your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, the targeted monster gains ATK equal to the Special Summoned monster's ATK, then place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

texts.name: Performapal Guitartle (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If a card is activated in your other Pendulum Zone: You can draw 1 card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; increase its Pendulum Scale by 2 until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Dimension Duel
texts.desc:
Remove this card from the Duel immediately, and if you do, if all cards you now own compose an invalid Deck, your opponent can make you lose the Duel. Otherwise, draw 1 card if this card was in your hand. If both players agree, apply the following rules.
 Both players can Normal Summon any monsters without tributing.
 If a monster(s) is Summoned, the original ATK and DEF of that monster(s) becomes 0, also, after that, the Summoning player chooses the original ATK and DEF of that monster(s) on the field by choosing a value from 0 up to the ATK/DEF written on that monster(s).
 Neither player takes any Battle Damage from battles between monsters.
 If a montser(s) is destroyed, the controller takes damage equal to either the ATK or DEF (ATK if it was in Attack Position, DEF if it was in Defense Position) of that monster(s) had on the field.

texts.name: Final Geas (Anime)
texts.desc: During the turn a highest Level monster is sent to the Graveyard from both sides of the field: Banish all monsters from the Graveyards. You can Special Summon the Spellcaster-Type monster with the highest Level that was banished from your Graveyard by this card's effect.

texts.name: Lightforce Sword (Anime)
texts.desc: Banish 1 card from your opponent's hand, face-down. During the Standby Phase of your 3rd turn after this card's activation, return that card to their hand.

texts.name: Magicians Unite (Manga)
texts.desc: If a Spellcaster-Type monster you control declares an attack while you control 2 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters, you can make that monster's ATK becomes 3000 until the end of the Damage Step, and if you do, other Spellcaster-Type monsters you currently control cannot attack for the rest of this turn and destroy them if your battling monster is destroyed by that battle. This destrution is considered by battle.

texts.name: Magicians Unite (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control 2 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters: Target 2 of them; 1 of them has its ATK becomes 3000, and the other cannot attack. When 1 of them is destroyed, destroy the other by the same reason.

texts.name: Cloning (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent Summons a monster: Special Summon a copy of that monster to your side of the field.

texts.name: Effect Cowl
texts.desc: If you control a Cyberse-Type monster: You take no effect damage this turn.

texts.name: DDoS Attack
texts.desc: Target 1 Machine-Type monster you control; send any number of "DDoS Attack" from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of "DDoS Attack" sent to the GY by this effect x the targeted monster's Level x 100.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Prisma (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 Fusion Material from your Deck to the Graveyard. If you do, this card's name becomes the sent monster's name, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Cards of Consonance (Anime)
texts.desc: Send 1 Tuner monster from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Red Resonator (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Synchro Monster on the field; gain LP equal to its ATK.

texts.name: Cyberse Annihilation
texts.desc: Equip only to a Cyberse monster. If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, the equipped monster's ATK becomes equal to the current ATK of the monster it is battling during damage calculation only. If the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle: Inflict damage to its controller equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field.

texts.name: Cyberse Cache
texts.desc: If you control a Cyberse monster whose current ATK is different from its original ATK: Draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Link Restart (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that would inflict damage to you: Negate the activation. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Linkbelt Wall Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Dragon-Type Link Monster is Special Summoned to your field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: Place 2 Wall Counters on it. If you Link Summon a Dragon-Type monster whose Link is lower than the number of Wall Counters on this card: Remove 2 Wall Counters from this card. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Place 1 Wall Counter on this card. Neither player can Summon a Link Monster whose Link is higher than the number of Wall Counters on this card. Monsters cannot attack, except Link Monsters. Monsters your opponent controls cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one.

texts.name: Fire Prison (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by other cards' effects. All Dragon monsters you control gain 300 DEF. Neither player can Link Summon a monster with a lower Link Rating than the monster on the field with the highest Link Rating. Monsters cannot declare an attack, except Link Monsters. If there are 2 or more Cyberse Link Monsters on the field: You can activate this effect; while this card is face-up on the field, negate the effects of all Cyberse monsters while they are in the hand, field, or GY, they cannot attack, they cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent a player from attacking directly, also neither player can target them with card effects. If the last Cyberse monster(s) that was on the field at activation of the above effect leaves the field: Destroy this card.

texts.name: Limit Code (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Place 1 Limit Counter on it for each Cyberse-Type Link Monster in your Graveyard, then Special Summon 1 "Code Talker" monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, equip this card to it. Once per turn, during your End Phase, remove 1 Limit Counter from this card. When the last Limit Counter is removed from this card, destroy the equipped monster. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster. While this card is on your field or in your Graveyard, "Limit Code" cannot be activated.

texts.name: Arrow Charge
texts.desc: If there are 2 Link Monsters in the Extra Monster Zones with the same number of Link Arrows: Draw 2 cards, and if you do, show them, but banish them during the End Phase of this turn if they are still in your hand.

texts.name: Dual Assembwurm (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is in your hand or Graveyard: You can banish 2 other Cyberse-Type monsters from your Graveyard; Special Summon this card, but its ATK becomes halved. You can only use this effect of "Dual Assembwurm" once per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your hand; banish 1 monster on the field with ATK less than or equal to this card's.

texts.name: Cynet Refresh (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Cyberse monster declares an attack: Destroy as many monsters in the Main Monster Zones as possible, and if you do, during the End Phase of this turn, Special Summon as many Cyberse Link Monsters among those destroyed monsters in the GY as possible to their owner's fields. When your opponent activates a monster effect: You can banish this card from your GY; Cyberse Link Monsters you control are unaffected by card effects (except their own) until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Boot Sector Launch (Anime)
texts.desc:
All "Rokket" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Revolve Boot Sector" per turn, and only once that turn.
 During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Rokket" monsters with different names from your hand in Defense Position.
 During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck, send any excavated "Rokket" cards to the Graveyard, also place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

texts.name: Battle Buffer
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of co-linked monsters you control; those monsters cannot activate their effects while you control co-linked monsters, also destroy this card during the End Phase of this turn. After damage calculation, if your Cyberse-Type Link Monster battled: Place 1 Battle Buffer Counter on this card. The ATK of all your Cyberse-Type Link Monsters become their original ATK + the number of Battle Buffer Counters on this card x 700.

texts.name: Frontline Disturbance
texts.desc:
Target 1 Level 4 or lower monster your opponent controls; if it leaves the field, place 1 Disturbance Counter on 1 monster you control, and if you do, it gains this effect as long as it has a Disturbance Counter.
 If this card with a Disturbance Counter battles: You can remove 1 Disturbance Counter from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to the combined DEF of all Defense Position monsters your opponent currently controls, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Obelisk The Progenitor
texts.desc:
(This card's base Divine Hierarchy is 2.)
Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon/Set. Your opponent cannot Tribute this card. Control of this card cannot switch. Unaffected by Spell/Trap effects that would make this card leave the field. Unaffected by other monsters' effects, except for monsters with the same or higher Divine Hierarchy. This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster with lower Divine Hierarchy, also the controller of this card takes no battle damage from that battle. If this card was Special Summoned, return this card to the location it was Special Summoned from during the End Phase. Other cards' effects are only applied on this card for 1 turn. During the Battle Phase, if this card is able to declare an attack (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 2 other monsters; this card's ATK becomes  until the end of the next Damage Step it battles, and if it does, it attacks, and perform damage calculation. If this card is able to attack: You can Tribute 2 other monsters (Quick Effect); inflict damage equal to the ATK of this card to your opponent and destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Tentacluster Nautilus
texts.desc:
3 "Tentacluster" monsters
When this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Tentacluster" monster from your hand to your zone this card points to. Once per turn: You can target all monsters this card points to; destroy them.

texts.name: Backlinker (Anime)
texts.desc: If only your opponent controls a monster in the Extra Monster Zone, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Tribute this card; send all monsters in the Extra Monster Zones to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Slime
texts.desc: When touched and damaged, this slime ball is apparently able is to split to multiply itself.

texts.name: Doppler Phase Coating
texts.desc: Target 1 Cyberse-Type monster you control; equip this card to it. The first time the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard during the Battle Phase: End the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Cynet Defrag
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Level 4 or lower Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, and if you do, equip this card to it. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. Once per Duel, if this card is in your GY, you can activate the above effect by paying half your LP.

texts.name: Magical Dimension (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control a face-up Spellcaster-Type monster: Tribute 2 monsters you control; negate the attack, also, Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand, but destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Mirage Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
-n/a-
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If a monster(s) would be destroyed by battle and battle damage would be inflicted: You can activate this effect; that monster(s) is not destroyed by that battle, also you take no damage from that battle. You can only use this effect a number of times per turn, up to the number of "Odd-Eyes" cards in your Pendulum Zones.

texts.name: Recovery Sorcerer (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse-Type monsters
Once while face-up on the field, if a co-linked Cyberse-Type Link Monster(s) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of those Link Monsters; Special Summon it, but it has its effects negated, also destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Trickstar Maribold
texts.desc: During your Main Phase, if you Link Summon: Return 1 "Trickstar" monster from your Graveyard to your hand; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Trickstar" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

texts.name: Trickstar Treat
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Place 1 Trickstar Counter on it. You can place 1 Trickstar Counter on this card and reveal 1 "Trickstar" Trap in your hand; Set that card to your Spell & Trap Zone, but destroy it during the End Phase. It can be activated this turn. (Only 1 card can be Set on the field at a time with this effect.) During the End Phase, if 2 or more Trickstar Counters are on this card, destroy it. If this card is destroyed, take 1000 damage for each Trickstar Counter that was on this card.

texts.name: Lord Gaia the Fierce Knight (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, if a monster(s) your opponent controls gains ATK (Quick Effect): This card gains 700 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Apple Magician Girl (Anime)
texts.desc:
Once per turn, if this card is targeted for an attack: You can activate 1 of these effects.
 Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is lower than this card's, and if you do, change the attack target to it, then the attacking monster's ATK becomes half its current ATK. 
 Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is higher than this card's with its effect negated, and if you do, change the attack target to it, then the attacking monster's ATK becomes half its current ATK.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is lower than this card's
texts.str2: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is higher than this card's

texts.name: Lemon Magician Girl (Anime)
texts.desc:
Once per turn, if this card is targeted for an attack: You can activate 1 of these effects.
 Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is lower than this card's, and if you do, change the attack target to it, then the attacking monster's ATK becomes half its current ATK. 
 Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is higher than this card's with its effect negated, and if you do, change the attack target to it, then the attacking monster's ATK becomes half its current ATK.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is lower than this card's
texts.str2: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand whose Level is higher than this card's

texts.name: Gandora-X the Dragon of Demolition (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can destroy as many other monsters on the field as possible, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the highest ATK on the field among those destroyed monsters (your choice, if tied). This card's ATK becomes equal to the damage inflicted to your opponent by this effect. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Halve your LP.

texts.name: Sentry Soldier of Stone (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a "Stone" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Celtic Guard of Noble Arms (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot attack while you have any cards in your hand. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Elf" monster from your hand. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can draw cards equal to the number of "Elf" monsters you control.

texts.name: Multi Sledgehammer
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse-Type monsters
While your opponent controls a monster and a Cyberse-Type monster(s) is co-linked to this card, it can attack directly. If another Cyberse-Type Link Monster you control attacks, after damage calculation: Place 1 Hammer Counter on this card. When this card declares an attack: You can remove all Hammer Counters on this card; this card gains 1000 ATK for each Hammer Counter you removed until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Talkback Lancer (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Level 2 or lower Cyberse Monster
You can Tribute 1 Cyberse monster, then target 1 "Code Talker" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone this card points to.

texts.name: Link Processing Failure
texts.desc: Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation. Activate this card by targeting 1 Link Monster you control; while this card is face-up on the field, monsters that are not Link Monsters, and Link Monsters with a Link Rating lower than or equal to that target's, cannot attack. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Link Atrocity
texts.desc: Tribute 1 Link Monster, then target 1 Link Monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the ATK the Tributed monster had on the field until the end of this turn, also if it attacks an opponent's Link Monster this turn, that opponent's monster loses 400 ATK for each Link Monster in the Graveyards until the end of the Damage Step.

texts.name: Link Surge Counter
texts.desc: When your Link Monster battles an opponent's Link Monster with a higher Link Rating, during damage calculation: Banish 2 Spells/Traps from your field and/or Graveyard; your monster's ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, during damage calculation only.

texts.name: Overload Anchor
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control 1 Link Monster (and no other monsters): You can make that monster you control unable to be destroyed by that battle, and if you do, halve any battle damage you take from that battle, then end the Battle Phase. If this effect was applied this turn: You can banish this card you control; the ATK of all Link Monsters your opponent controls become half their current ATK until your opponent's next Standby Phase.

texts.name: Archfiend of Gilfer (Manga)
texts.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard: 1 monster on the field loses 500 ATK.

texts.name: Dramatic Rescue (Manga)
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted by a Trap effect: Return that monster to your hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 other monster from your hand.

texts.name: Frightfur Sadmarine
texts.desc: If your opponent Normal Summons a monster: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Frightfur Meister (Manga)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
While there is another "Frightfur" monster on the field, this card cannot be targeted for attacks. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Frightfur", "Fluffal" or "Edge Imp" monster from your Deck, with the same name as a monster you control. Once per turn: You can Tribute any number of "Frightfur" monster; Special Summon from your Extra Deck 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster, whose Level equals to the total Levels the Tributed monsters had on the field to activate this effect, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

texts.name: Frightfur Claw Pirate
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 card in your other Pendulum Zone; Special Summon 1 "Frightfur" monster from your Graveyard in Defense Position, whose Level is lower than the targeted card's Pendulum Scale, but it has its effects negated, then destroy the targeted card.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]

texts.name: Link Protection
texts.desc: Your monsters cannot attack, except Link Monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 Link Monster you control; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle, also neither player takes any battle damage from that battle. If it attacks an opponent's Link Monster, that opponent's monster is destroyed after damage calculation. If a Link Monster(s) you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from the field and 1 of those Link Monsters; until the end of this turn, your opponent's monsters cannot attack unless your opponent controls at least as many Link Monsters as that banished monster's Link Rating.

texts.name: Triggering Wurm (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard as material for the Link Summon a DARK Link Monster: You can Special Summon this card to your zone that Link Monster points to in Attack Position. You can only use this effect of "Triggering Wurm" once per Duel. If this card is destroyed by a Link Monster's effect and sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Viser Des (Manga)
texts.desc: This card is unaffected by card effects that target this card and would make it leave the field, and it cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card until the end of 3nd turn after this card is Summoned. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; while this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed, and it loses 500 ATK. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase, except the turn you activate the above effect: That face-up monster loses 500 ATK. While that face-up monster is on the field, this card cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

texts.name: Cocoon of Evolution (Anime)
texts.desc:
You can target 1 "Larvae Moth" you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. The equipped monster is treated as "Cocoon of Evolution". The ATK/DEF of "Cocoon of Evolution" is applied to the equipped monster. While this card is equipped to a monster whose original name is "Larvae Moth", you cannot Summon, Set or activate Spells/Traps from your hand. Destroy the equipped monster during the Standby Phase on your 5th turn or later after this card was equipped to a monster whose original name is "Larvae Moth". If this card is sent to the Graveyard because the equipped monster is destroyed, applies 1 of these effects based on the number of your turns that have passed since this card was equipped to a monster whose original name is "Larvae Moth".
 1, 2: Special Summon 1 "Larvae Moth" from outside the Duel.
 3, 4: Special Summon 1 "Great Moth" from outside the Duel.
 5 or more: Special Summon 1 "Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth" from outside the Duel.

texts.name: Number S0: Utopic ZEXAL (Manga)
texts.desc:
3 "Number S" Xyz Monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. This card's Special Summon cannot be prevented or negated. When Special Summoned, your opponent's cards and effects cannot be activated. The original ATK/DEF of this card each become equal to the total Ranks of all monsters used as Xyz Material for its Summon x 500.
texts.str1: Xyz summon by using a "Utopia" monster
texts.str2: Opponent cannot activate cards or effects

texts.name: Fault Tolerlancer
texts.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Attack Position monster on the field; change it to Defense Position. While this card is in Defense Position, your Attack Position monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects.

texts.name: Trickstar Light Arena (Anime)
texts.desc: If you Link Summon a "Trickstar" monster: You can target 1 "Trickstar" monster in your Graveyard, that was used as material for that Link Summon; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Light Arena" once per turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 Set card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; while this card is in the Field Zone, that Set card cannot be activated until the End Phase, and your opponent must activate it during the End Phase or else return it to the hand. Once per turn, during damage calculation, if your "Trickstar" Link Monster battles: You can make all battle damage from that battle become 0, and if you do, gain LP equal to the original damage.

texts.name: Frightfur Bone Diver
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When this card is destroyed while you have 2000 LP or less: You can double your LP.

texts.name: Blackwing - Boreas the Sharp (Anime)
texts.desc: You can banish this card from the Graveyard, then target 1 face-up monster you control; if that monster battles this turn, you take no battle damage from that battle, it is not destroyed by that battle, also destroy the opponent's monster that it battled, after damage calculation.

texts.name: Spool Code (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while you have 3 or more Cyberse-Type monsters in your Graveyard: Negate the attack, and if you do, Special Summon up to 3 "Spool Tokens" (Cyberse-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position, but they cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

texts.name: Urgent Link
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control no monsters in the Extra Monster Zone: Halve any battle damage you take from that battle. At the end of the Battle Phase, you can Link Summon 1 Cyberse-Type Link Monster using monsters you control.

texts.name: Transcode Talker (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ Effect Monsters
This co-linked card and monsters co-linked to it gain 500 ATK, also your opponent cannot target them with card effects. You can target 1 "Code Talker" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of "Transcode Talker" once per turn.

texts.name: Hippo Carnival (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon 3 "Hippo Tokens" (Beast-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). Your opponent cannot target monsters for attacks, except "Hippo Tokens".

texts.name: Nirvana High Paladin (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can target 1 monster you control that was Pendulum Summoned this turn with the lowest Level (your choice, if tied); until the end of this turn, that monster cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving it. Also, if it battles this turn, all monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK equal to the targeted monster's ATK, after damage calculation. At the end of the Damage Step, when a monster that was targeted by this effect battled, you can activate this effect again by targeting 1 monster you control that was Pendulum Summoned this turn, whose Level is 1 higher than the previously targeted monster's.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can Special Summon this card (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing 1 Synchro Monster and any number of Pendulum Summoned Pendulum Monsters, whose total Levels exactly equal 10. (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon.) When this card on the field is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

texts.name: Performapal Recasting (Anime)
texts.desc: Reveal any number of "Performapal" monsters from your hand and shuffle them into the Deck, then draw cards equal to the number of cards you shuffled into the Deck +1.

texts.name: Link Coin
texts.desc: Send 1 Link Monster you control to the Graveyard; excavate cards from the top of your Deck, equal to the sent monster's Link Rating, add 1 excavated card to your hand, also place the remaining cards on top of your Deck in any order. During your next Standby Phase, Special Summon the Link Monster sent to the Graveyard to activate this effect.

texts.name: Pendulum Boost
texts.desc: Destroy as many cards in your Pendulum Zones as possible, and if you do, 1 monster you control gains ATK equal to the combined Levels of those destroyed monsters x 100 until the end of this turn, also it gains 1 additional attack for each destroyed card during each Battle Phase.

texts.name: Lowering D
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: This turn, each monster that conducted an direct attack loses ATK equal to their own DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: D/D/D Advance
texts.desc: Return any number of Fusion, Synchro and/or Xyz Monsters from your Graveyard to your Extra Deck; for each returned monster, Special Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck with the same Type, Attribute and Extra Deck monster card type as that returned monster.

texts.name: Trickstar Perennial
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster you control, then send 1 monster it points to or this card to the Graveyard; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Revolution Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
n/a
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Dark Rebellion Xyz Dragon", 1 "Clear Wing Synchro Dragon" and 1 "Starving Venom Fusion Dragon". The ATK and DEF of this card are each equal to your opponent's LP. You can pay half your LP; shuffle all other cards on the field and in the GYs into the Deck.

texts.name: Restoration Point Guard (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse monsters
If another Link Monster is Link Summoned: This turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If a Link Monster(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect, while this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn as material for a Link Summon: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Restoration Point Guard" once per turn.

texts.name: Rescue Interlacer (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, if an opponent's monster attacks an Attack Position Cyberse-Type monster, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this effect was activated this turn (and was not negated): You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Performapal Pendulum Conductor
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
When this card is activated: Add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up, and if you do, increase this card's Pendulum Scale to by that monster's Level. If you Pendulum Summoned this turn: You can activate this effect; the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle with a Pendulum Monster you control do not activate and are negated.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]

texts.name: Frightfur Change of Memory
texts.desc: When exactly 1 monster you control is targeted by card or effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Frightfur", "Fluffal" or "Edge Imp" Pendulum Monster from your Deck, and if you do, change the target to that monster.

texts.name: Diffusion Wave-Motion (Manga)
texts.desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Fusion" card.)
Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Spellcaster-Type monster you control; this turn, it must attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. The effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by these attacks do not activate and are negated.

texts.name: D/D Extra Surveyor
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when a card is added to the Extra Deck: You can banish both cards in your Pendulum Zones; banish a number of cards from the top of your opponent's Deck equal to the number of face-up Pendulum Monsters in your opponent's Extra Deck, and if you do, 1 "D/D/D" monster on the field gains 200 ATK for each card banished by this effect, also it can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]

texts.name: Protection Wizard
texts.desc: Link Monsters linked to this card cannot be destroyed by battle. If your Cyberse-Type Link Monster would be destroyed by battle, you can banish this card from your Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Cluster Congester (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you control no Link Monsters: You can Special Summon 1 "Congester Token" (Cyberse/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use this effect of "Cluster Congester" once per turn. Once per Battle Step, when your Link Monster is attacked (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY and that Link Monster; Special Summon "Congester Tokens", up to the number of Link Monsters your opponent controls, also monsters on the field cannot activate their effects for the rest of this turn. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: Destroy as many of these "Congester Tokens" you control as possible, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each.

texts.name: Dark Magician Girl (Manga)
texts.desc: This card gains 500 ATK for every "Dark Magician" in either player's Graveyard.

texts.name: Spam Mail
texts.desc: Equip only to an Effect Monster you control. It has its effects negated, also it is treated as a Normal Monster. If this card is sent from the hand, Deck, or field to the Graveyard by a card effect: You can draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then if your opponent controls a face-up card of that type (Monster, Spell, or Trap), they return 1 of them to the hand.

texts.name: Neo-Spacian Glow Moss (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card attacks or is attacked: Reveal the top card of your opponent's Deck, and based on its type apply this effect. Your opponent can draw 1 card, otherwise send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.  Monster: End the Battle Phase.  Spell: If this card is attacking, you can change it to a direct attack instead.  Trap: Change this card to Defense Position.

texts.name: Fiend's Sanctuary (Manga)
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 "Metal Fiend Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK ?/DEF 0). It cannot attack. When Summoned, this Token's ATK becomes equal to your opponent's LP. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving it. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 1000 LP or destroy this Token.

texts.name: Junk Gardna (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Junk Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can change the attacking monster to Defense Position. When this card is destroyed: You can change 1 monster your opponent controls to Defense Position.

texts.name: Elphase (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 3 or higher Cyberse monsters
Gains 300 ATK for each monster it points to. If this Link Summoned card leaves the field: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Elphase" once per turn.

texts.name: Dark Spell Regeneration (Manga)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can place 1 Spell from your opponent's Graveyard in the appropriate Zone on your side of the field, and as this card's effect resolution, follow its card text as if you had used it yourself. During the End Phase of this turn, send it to your opponent's Graveyard.

texts.name: Fiendish Chain (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Effect Monster on the field; negate the effects of that face-up monster while it is on the field, also that face-up monster cannot attack or be Tributed. When it is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, destroy this card. If your LP is 1000 or less, destroy this card.

texts.name: Shootingcode Talker (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ Cyberse monsters
At the start of your Battle Phase: You can activate this effect; this card can attack your opponent's monsters a number of times this Battle Phase, up to the number of monsters it points to +1, also for the rest of this turn, if your opponent controls exactly 1 monster, this card loses 400 ATK during damage calculation only. At the end of the Battle Phase: You can draw cards equal to the number of monsters this card destroyed by battle this turn.

texts.name: Break & Reuse
texts.desc: Target 1 Link Monster you control; destroy it, then Special Summon 1 monster from your GY in Attack Position with ATK less than or equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field, but it has its effects negated.

texts.name: D-Scale Battle Coela
texts.desc:
2 "D-Scale" monsters
Once per turn: You can move this card to a Main Monster Zone it points to. Once per turn: You can move this card to your Main Monster Zone a card linked to this card points to.

texts.name: D-Scale Full Metal Dunkle
texts.desc:
2+ "D-Scale" monsters
The first time this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. When this effect is used: You can move this card to a Main Monster Zone it points to. If this card is moved: You can target 1 opponent's monster in this card's column; during the End Phase of this turn, destroy it.

texts.name: D-Scale Torpedo
texts.desc: Equip only to a "D-Scale" monster. Once per turn: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of times the equipped monster was moved this turn x 800.

texts.name: Performapal Monkeyboard (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Performapal" monster from your Deck to your hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects.
 Increase the Level of 1 "Performapal" monster in your hand by 1 until the End Phase (even after they are Summoned/Set).
 Reduce the Level of 1 "Performapal" monster in your hand by 1 until the End Phase (even after they are Summoned/Set).

texts.name: Power Tool Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can add 1 random Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand. If this card would be destroyed while equipped with an Equip Spell Card(s), you can send 1 of those cards to the Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Magical Star Illusion (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control "Stargazer Magician": Monsters currently on the field gain ATK equal to the combined Levels of all monsters their controller currently controls x 100, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Illusion Balloons (Anime)
texts.desc: If a monster(s) was destroyed during this turn, while you controlled it: Excavate a number of cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of monsters you control that were destroyed this turn, then Special Summon the excavated "Performapal" monster with the highest Level (your choice, if tied), also shuffle the rest back into your Deck.

texts.name: Performapal Stamp Turtle (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can increase the Levels of all face-up monsters currently on the field by 1.

texts.name: Performapal Gumgumouton (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, if a monster(s) on the field would be destroyed by battle: You can activate this effect; that monster(s) cannot be destroyed by that battle.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card would be destroyed by battle, you can return 1 card in your Pendulum Zone to the hand instead, then place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

texts.name: Performapal Kaleidoscorp (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
All LIGHT monsters you control gain 300 ATK.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If your opponent controls a Pendulum Summoned monster: You can target 1 Pendulum Monster you control; this turn, it can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

texts.name: Performapal Trampolynx (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
When you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): You can target 1 card you control; return that target to the hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card you control; return that target to the hand.

texts.name: Link Short
texts.desc: If your opponent controls at least as many Link Monsters as monsters in your Main Monster Zones: Target your opponent's co-linked monsters; until the end of this turn, they cannot attack, also they have their effects negated.

texts.name: Salamangreat Jack Jaguar (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this card is in your GY and you control a "Salamangreat" monster(s) that was Link Summoned this turn: You can target 1 of those Link Monsters and 1 other "Salamangreat" monster in your GY; shuffle the second target into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card to your zone the first target points to. You can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Jack Jaguar" once per turn.

texts.name: Performapal Changeraffe (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If a monster you control is destroyed by battle: You can target that monster; destroy this card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, Special Summon that target from your Graveyard in Attack Position, and if you do that, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; while this card is face-up on the field, that face-up opponent's monster cannot attack, also negate the effects of that face-up monster while it is on the field.

texts.name: Performapal Partnaga (Anime)
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
All monsters you control gain 300 ATK for each "Performapal" monster you control.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster you control; it gains 300 ATK for each "Performapal" monster you currently control. Monsters your opponent controls whose Level is less than or equal to this card's Level cannot attack.

texts.name: Last Minute Cancel (Anime)
texts.desc: During either player's Battle Phase: Change all monsters you control to Defense Position, also, for the rest of this turn, return any face-up "Performapal" monster you control that is destroyed by battle to the hand instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Performapal Call (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: Negate the attack, then add 2 "Performapal" monsters from your Deck to your hand whose combined DEF is equal to the ATK of the monster whose attack was negated. During the turn a monster(s) added to your hand by this effect is Normal or Special Summoned, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck.

texts.name: Performapal Revival (Anime)
texts.desc: When exactly 1 monster you control leaves the field by a card effect: Special Summon 1 "Performapal" monster from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Berserker Soul (Anime)
texts.desc: Discard your entire hand (min. 1); draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then, if it is a monster, discard it to the Graveyard, and if you do that, you can choose a monster you control with 1500 or less ATK, it can attack again in a row. If the chosen card attacks, at the end of the Damage Step, draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then, if it is a monster, discard it to the Graveyard, and if you do that, the chosen card can attack again in a row. Repeat this effect until you draw a non-monster.

texts.name: Machine Angel Absolute Ritual (Anime)
texts.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Cyber Angel" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field and/or shuffle "Cyber" monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck, whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon.

texts.name: Underground Arachnid (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner
You can Synchro Summon this card if the Level of the non-Tuner Synchro Material minus the Level of the Dark Tuner Synchro Material equals to this card's Level. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip it to this card (you can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card with this effect). If this card would be destroyed, you can send the monster equipped to to it with this effect to the Graveyard instead.

texts.name: Dark Diviner (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner
You can Synchro Summon this card if the Level of the non-Tuner Synchro Material minus the Level of the Dark Tuner Synchro Material equals to this card's Level. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card declares an attack on an opponent's monster and the ATK of the attack target is higher than this card's original ATK: Send 1 card from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard for every 100 ATK deficit, then the ATK of the attack target becomes equal to this card's ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Slash Draw (Anime)
texts.desc: Send cards from the top of your Deck to the GY, equal to the number of cards on the field, then, draw 1 card and reveal it. If it was "Slash Draw", send it to the Graveyard, and if you do, destroy as many cards on the field as possible, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed and sent to the GY by this effect. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

texts.name: Rainbow Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Ultimate Crystal" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 7 "Crystal Beast" cards with different names on your field and/or GY. This card cannot activate the following effects the turn it is Special Summoned. (Quick Effect): You can send all face-up "Crystal Beast" cards you control to the GY; this card gains 1000 ATK for each monster sent to the GY. You can banish all "Crystal Beast" monsters from your GY; shuffle all cards on the field into the Deck.
texts.str1: Send all "Crystal Beast" cards you control to the Graveyard
texts.str2: Banish all "Crystal Beast" monsters in your Graveyard

texts.name: Turn Jump (Manga)
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Make each player end their next respective 3 turns and resume the Duel at that player's Battle Phase. Neither player can activate cards or effects during those of your opponent's turns. If a battle was occuring when this effect resolves, at the start of the Battle Phase, immediately after this effect resolves: The attacker of that battle attacks the attack target of that battle and perform damage calculation, if able.

texts.name: Trash Hacker
texts.desc: When an attack is declared involving your Cyberse monster and an opponent's monster: You can banish this card from your GY; negate that opponent's monster's effects, also for the rest of this turn, that opponent's monster cannot be destroyed by battle, and any battle damage your opponent takes from that battle is doubled.

texts.name: Cyberse Bridge
texts.desc: Send 1 Cyberse monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 monster you control in the Extra Monster Zone; move it to your Main Monster Zone, then draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then, if it is a monster, you can Special Summon 1 Cyberse monster from your GY with the same Level as that monster. Otherwise, send it to the GY.

texts.name: Dimension Link
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying half your LP, then target 1 Link Monster you control; banish it. If a monster is Link Summoned to your field: You can send this face-up card to the GY; Special Summon that banished monster to your zone a Link Monster points to, and if you do, it gains 600 ATK, but negate its effects, also destroy it during the End Phase.

texts.name: Cure Conversion
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack: Tribute that monster; end the Battle Phase, then draw 1 card, then, if it is a monster, gain LP equal to its ATK.

texts.name: Excess Lesser Linker
texts.desc: When your Link-2 or lower Link Monster battles, during damage calculation: Your battling monster's ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling during that damage calculation only.

texts.name: Swordstalker (Manga)
texts.desc: This card gains ATK equal to 20% of the combined ATK of all monsters in your Graveyard that were destroyed by battle.

texts.name: Byser Shock (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Return all Set cards on the field to the hand.

texts.name: Thousand Knives (Manga)
texts.desc: If you control a Spellcaster-Type monster: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Magic Formula (Manga)
texts.desc: 1 Spellcaster-Type monster on the field gains 500 ATK.

texts.name: Trickstar Birdhelm
texts.desc:
When this card is Normal Summoned: You can inflict 200 damage to your opponent, and if you do, draw 1 card. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. You can target 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, your opponent cannot target this card or the equipped monster with card effects, also the equipped monster gains this effect.
 Each time a "Trickstar" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Trickstar Fusion (Anime)
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Trickstar" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Trickstar" monster in your GY; add it to your hand, but you cannot Normal Summon/Set or Special Summon it this turn.

texts.name: Trickstar Live Stage (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Trickstar" monster from your GY to your hand. You can target 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Trickstar Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position to your zone it points to. If a Set card is in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone: You can Special Summon 1 "Trickstar Token" in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Live Stage" once per turn.

texts.name: Gate of Fire
texts.desc: Activate this card only when a card or effect that would inflict damage is activated. Neither player takes effect damage if the amount is less than or equal to 300.

texts.name: Fusion of Fire (Anime)
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or either field as Fusion Material.

texts.name: Salamangreat Violet Chimera (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Salamangreat Heatleo" + 1 Link Monster or 1 "Salamangreat" monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can make this card gain ATK equal to half the combined original ATK of the materials used to Summon it, until the end of this turn. Once per battle, during damage calculation, if this monster battles a monster whose current ATK is different from its original ATK: You can double this card's ATK during damage calculation only. If this card that was Fusion Summoned using "Salamangreat Violet Chimera" as material battles an opponent's monster, that opponent's monster's ATK becomes 0 during damage calculation only.

texts.name: Arrow Break
texts.desc: When your opponent activates a Trap Card while you control a Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If you control a Link-3 or higher Link Monster, you can activate this card the turn it was Set. If you control a Link-4 or higher Link Monster, you can activate this card from your hand.

texts.name: Link Ration
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if your Link Monster battles an opponent's Link Monster, and the combined Link Ratings of those 2 Link Monsters is 5 or more: Gain 1000 LP, also, if your Link Monster is destroyed by that battle, Special Summon 1 "Ration Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

texts.name: Ration Token
texts.desc:
This card can be used as a "Ration Token".


 If used for another Token, apply that Token's Type / Attribute / Level / ATK / DEF.

texts.name: Granadora (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Gain 1000 LP.

texts.name: XYZ Wings
texts.desc: Equip only to an Xyz Monster. You can activate the equipped monster's "once per turn" effects that are activated by detaching its own Xyz Material(s) once again per turn. When the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If this card leaves the field, for the rest of this turn, any battle damage you take becomes halved.

texts.name: Penetration Fusion
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials, including at least 1 monster you control that destroyed a monster by battle. While this card is in the Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster that was Fusion Summoned by this card's effect, and if you do, 1 Pendulum Monster you control gains 500 ATK.

texts.name: Dreamsprite (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is targeted for an attack: Target 1 other monster you control; change the attack target to your targeted monster.

texts.name: Smoke Mosquito (Manga)
texts.desc: Once per battle, during damage calculation (in either player's turn) when you would take battle damage by a direct attack: You can halve the Battle Damage you take from that battle, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, also, end the Battle Phase. Once per turn: You can make this card's Level becomes the Level of 1 other monster you control, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Mirror Coat Unit
texts.desc: Equip only to a "Drone" monster. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from attacks involving the equipped monster and their Level 4 or lower monster, instead. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead, and if you do, the equipped monster's controller takes no battle damage from that battle. When this face-up card leaves the field: You can return to the hand the monster this card was equipped to, and if you do, add 1 monster with the same name from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Drone Barricade
texts.desc: Your opponent's monsters cannot attack directly. Your opponent cannot target Spells/Traps on the field with card effects, except this one. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets this face-up card: You can banish this card; Set 1 "Drone Barricade" directly from your Deck. It can be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Drone Barricade" once per turn.

texts.name: Salamangreat Parro (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have 1000 or less LP: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Attack Position, and if you do, you can make its ATK become equal to the ATK of 1 "Salamangreat" monster in your GY. You can Tribute this card; gain 2000 LP.

texts.name: Dark Magic Veil (Anime)
texts.desc: Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your hand.

texts.name: Rising Fire (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control no monsters: Activate this card by targeting 1 FIRE monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. It gains 500 ATK. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it and as many monsters as possible from your opponent's field and GY with the same name as that monster, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of 1 of those banished monsters. You can only use this effect of "Rising Fire" once per turn.

texts.name: Tempest Fire
texts.desc: Target 1 FIRE monster you control with the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied); destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, each player takes damage equal to the targeted monster's original ATK, then destroy 1 monster your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to the targeted monster's ATK, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters.

texts.name: Salamangreat Foxer (Anime)
texts.desc: If you have 3 or more "Salamangreat" Link Monsters in your GY: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; return 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster from your GY to the Extra Deck, then destroy the targeted card. If a card(s) in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed and sent to the GY, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position.

texts.name: Clock Lizard (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse monsters
You can Tribute this card; return 1 Fusion Monster from your GY to the Extra Deck, then Fusion Summon that Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your GY. If this card is banished from your GY: You can activate this effect; this turn, if a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field, that monster(s) loses 400 ATK for each Cyberse monster in your GY, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Link Back (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 Link Monster you control in the Extra Monster Zone; move it to your Main Monster Zone it points to, then send cards from the top of your Deck to the GY equal to the targeted monster's Link Rating.

texts.name: Link Drive
texts.desc: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 Link Monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Tributed monster's Link Rating x 500.

texts.name: Sunbloom Doom
texts.desc: If you control a "Sunavalon" monster: Target 1 monster you control; gain LP equal to the total ATK of all monsters on the field with the same Type as that monster. You can banish this card from your GY; destroy as many monsters on the field as possible with a Level less than or equal to the total number of Spells/Traps in the GYs that were activated this turn, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to their controller(s) for each of their destroyed monsters.

texts.name: Morley's Shield
texts.desc: Once per turn, if a "Tindangle" monster in your Main Monster Zone battles, during damage calculation: You can activate this effect; you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Nova Portal
texts.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can destroy exactly 2 "Nova Portal" in your Pendulum Zones, and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do, end the turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
-n/a-

texts.name: Drop Frame Wedge
texts.desc: Destroy this card during your next End Phase after activation, but if 2 cards were sent from your hand to the GY with the following effect, destroy this card during your 2nd End Phase after activation instead. Activate this card if your opponent activates a card or effect that would inflict damage: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, halve that damage, then you can send 1 more card from your hand to the GY, and if you do that, halve that damage again. Monsters cannot attack. If this card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: Negate the effects of as many monsters on the field as possible, and if you do, destroy them.

texts.name: Grid Rod (Anime)
texts.desc: Equip only to a Cyberse monster. It gains 300 ATK, also it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. The first time the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. If this card is sent to the GY while equipped to a monster: You can make the monster this card was equipped to unable to be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

texts.name: Resume Mace
texts.desc: Equip only to a Level 4 or higher Cyberse monster. It loses 800 ATK. If the equipped monster attacks a monster with higher ATK, during damage calculation: You can send this card to the GY; the ATK of the monster this card was equipped to becomes double its original ATK, until the end of the Battle Phase. At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish exactly 3 cards from your GY, 1 monster and 2 Equip Spells, including this card, then you can have 1 face-up monster your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the original ATK of the monster banished by this effect, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Suspend Wand
texts.desc: Equip only to a Level 4 or higher Cyberse monster. Once per turn, when the equipped monster declares an attack: You can activate this effect; this turn, the equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle, any battle damage you take from that battle is doubled, also the equipped monster can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If the equipped monster attacks an opponent's monster, during damage calculation: You can send this card to the GY; the monster this card was equipped to gains ATK equal to the total battle damage you took this turn from battles involving the equipped monster, until the end of the opponent's turn.

texts.name: Cyberse Wicckid (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Cyberse monsters
This Link Summoned card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. Cyberse monsters this card points to are unaffected by the activated effects of your opponent's monsters. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to a zone(s) this card points to, while this monster is on the field (except during the Damage Step): You can banish 1 Cyberse monster from your GY; add 1 Cyberse Tuner from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cyberse Wickid" once per turn.

texts.name: Hydradrive Rebuild
texts.desc: Target 1 "Hydradrive" monster you control; destroy it, and if the "Hydradrive" monster destroyed by this effect activates its effect in your GY this turn, Special Summon 1 "Hydradrive" monster from your GY, but it cannot attack, its effects are negated, also it is destroyed during the End Phase.

texts.name: Hydradrive Defragment
texts.desc: If a "Hydradrive" Link Monster(s) you control was destroyed by a card effect this turn: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Hydradrive" Spell in your GY; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Property Flash
texts.desc: Activate this card when you take battle damage: Place 1 Property Counter on this card for every 1000 damage you took, then end the Battle Phase. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Hydradrive" Link Monster; place 1 Property Counter on this card. You can send this card with a Property Counter to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Hydradrive" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating as the number of Property Counters that were on this card. You can only activate 1 "Property Flash" per turn.

texts.name: Hydradrive Scabbard
texts.desc: Special Summon 1 "Hydradrive Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while this card and an EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and WIND "Hydradrive" Link Monster are in your GY: You can banish this card from your GY; halve any battle damage from that battle, also both players take any battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: G Golem Stubborn Menhir
texts.desc:
2 EARTH monsters
You can target 1 EARTH monster in your GY that can be Normal Summoned/Set; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. You can only use this effect of "G Golem Stubborn Menhir" once per turn.

texts.name: Gravity Vision
texts.desc: During the Battle Phase: Target 1 EARTH Link Monster in your GY that was destroyed by battle this turn and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "G Golem Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), and if you do, it gains DEF equal to the Link Rating of the targeted monster in the GY X 800. While that "G Golem Token" is in the Monster Zone, the targeted opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the DEF of "G Golem Token", also it cannot attack, except to attack "G Golem Token".

texts.name: Grand Hydradrive
texts.desc:
1 "Hydradrive" monster
Cannot be used as material for the Link Summon of a Link-1 Link Monster. If your opponent controls an EARTH monster, this card can attack directly. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Hydradrive Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position.

texts.name: G Golem Pebble Dog
texts.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "G Golem Pebble Dog" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the hand to the GY: You can add 1 "G Golem Pebble Dog" from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: G Golem Dignified Trilithon
texts.desc:
2+ EARTH monsters
When this card declares an attack on an opponent's monster: You can send 1 EARTH monster from your hand to the GY; until the end of this turn, that opponent's monster loses 200 ATK, also its effects are negated. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a monster(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card.

texts.name: Gravity Protection
texts.desc: Tribute 1 EARTH monster, then target 1 Link Monster you control; equip it with this card. While equipped, it gains ATK equal to half the Tributed monster's original ATK, also it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.

texts.name: Drone Asteroid
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; negate the attack, then Special Summon "Drone Tokens" (Machine/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), up to the number of monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dino Roar
texts.desc: Target 1 Dinosaur monster you control; this turn, if that target battles an opponent's monster, you can send 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls to the GY at the start of the Damage Step. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation.

texts.name: Gravity Balance
texts.desc: Target 2 EARTH monsters in your GY with the same name; Special Summon them in Defense Position, but change their ATK/DEF to 0, their effects are negated, also they are destroyed during the End Phase.

texts.name: Stormridership Rockbuster
texts.desc:
2 "Stormrider" monsters
If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone(s) this card points to while you control no cards in your Spell & Trap Zones: You can destroy 2 cards in either player's Spell & Trap Zones, also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot activate nor Set Spell/Trap Cards. If a Link-3 or higher Link Monster is Link Summoned to your opponent's field: You can target 1 Trap in your opponent's GY; Set it to your field. It can be activated this turn. You can only use 1 "Stormridership Rockbuster" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

texts.name: Stormrider Turbulence
texts.desc: All "Stormrider" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK. While you control exactly 1 "Stormrider" Link Monster, if your opponent Special Summons a Link Monster(s) whose Link Rating is equal or higher: Negate that opponent's Link Monster's effects until your opponent's next Standby Phase. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation. While you control a "Stormrider" Link Monster in the Extra Monster Zone, your opponent's monsters must attack it, if able.

texts.name: Altergeist Dragvirion (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can return 1 "Altergeist" monster you control to the hand; negate the attack. If this card is Tributed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Altergeist Dragvirion" once per turn.

texts.name: Drone Corporal
texts.desc: This card can attack directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved. Once while face-up on the field, when a card or effect is activated that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, also neither player can target this card with card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Drone Corporal" once per turn.

texts.name: Drone Force Tuning
texts.desc:
This card's activation and effect cannot be negated. Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters you control, including a "Drone" monster that did not inflict battle damage this turn, and if you do, it gains this effect.
 This card's effects cannot be negated.

texts.name: Commandrone Double Sniper
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Each time a card or effect is activated that would negate an attack or card effect, place 1 Drone Counter on this card after that effect resolves. While 1 or more Drone Counters are on this card, this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase, also it can attack directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent becomes 1000. When your opponent activates a monster effect while there are 2 Drone Counters on this card (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card, and if you do that, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Megasonic Eye (Anime)
texts.desc: Made of mysterious metal, this monster is a doomsday machine from the edge of the universe.

texts.name: Toy Soldier (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Toy Soldier" from your Deck.

texts.name: Speedroid CarTurbo (Manga)
texts.desc: If there is a "Speedroid" monster on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

texts.name: Battledrone Warrant
texts.desc:
2 "Drone" monsters, except Tokens
During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY and you control no monsters in your Main Monster Zone: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Battledrone Warrant" once per turn.

texts.name: Blitz Drone
texts.desc: If a "Drone" monster(s) is Special Summoned from your GY to your field: You can Tribute 1 of those monsters; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the Tributed monster had on the field. You can only use this effect of "Blitz Drone" once per turn.

texts.name: Scud Drone
texts.desc: If you control a "Drone" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Scud Drone" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY by the effect of a "Drone" monster: You can draw 1 card, also banish this card when it leaves the field.

texts.name: Snatch Drone
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; negate its effects, and if you do, destroy that card. Negate the effects of cards with the same name as the destroyed card while they are on the field.

texts.name: Drone Unity
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if your "Drone" monster is attacked by an opponent's monster: You can have that "Drone" monster's ATK become equal to the total ATK of all "Drone" monsters you control, during that damage calculation only. You can Tribute 1 "Drone" monster; draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Drone Unity" once per turn.

texts.name: Drone Carrier
texts.desc: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Drone" monster: You can target 1 "Drone" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Drone Force Fusion
texts.desc:
This card's activation and effect cannot be negated. Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as Fusion Material, including a "Drone" monster, and if you do, it gains this effect.
 This card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

texts.name: Fortressdrone Beehive
texts.desc:
2 or more "Drone" monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: Place Drone Counters on this card equal to the total Level of the "Drone" monsters used as this card's Fusion Material. You can remove any number of Drone Counters from this card; Special Summon an equal number of "Drone Tokens" (Machine/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). Gains 1000 ATK for each other "Drone" monster you control.

texts.name: Marincess Sea Star (Anime)
texts.desc: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 "Marincess" monster you control; it gains 800 ATK.

texts.name: Marincess Blue Slug (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Level 4 or lower "Marincess" monster
You can only Link Summon "Marincess Blue Slug(s)" once per turn. If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Marincess" monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Marincess Coral Anemone (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 WATER monsters
You can target 1 WATER monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone this card points to. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Marincess" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Marincess Coral Anemone" once per turn.

texts.name: Marincess Marbled Rock (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ WATER monsters
You can target 1 "Marincess" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Marincess Marbled Rock" once per turn. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can send 1 "Marincess" monster from your hand to the GY; your "Marincess" monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Marincess Crystal Heart (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 WATER monsters
While this card is in the Extra Monster Zone, it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. When this card, or a "Marincess" monster this card points to, is targeted for an attack: You can send 1 "Marincess" monster from your hand to the GY; that monster you control cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can activate this effect; until the end of the Damage Step, that opponent's monster is unaffected by card effects, except its own.

texts.name: Marincess Mandarin (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control 2 or more "Marincess" Link Monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY) to your zone your "Marincess" Link Monster points to, but banish it when it leaves the field.

texts.name: Marincess Crown Tail (Anime)
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if your "Marincess" monster battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand and send 1 other "Marincess" monster from your hand to the GY; the damage from that battle is halved, then Special Summon this card. You can banish this card from your GY; for the rest of this turn, you never take battle damage if the amount is less than or equal to the total Link Rating of all "Marincess" Link Monsters with different names in your GY x 1000.

texts.name: Marincess Bubble Blast
texts.desc: If your opponent controls a Link-3 or higher Link Monster: Activate this card by targeting 1 Link-2 or lower "Marincess" Link Monster you control. If a "Marincess" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone(s) the targeted monster points to: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the total Link Rating of that target and the "Marincess" Link Monsters linked to it x 500. During the End Phase, or if your opponent's LP becomes less than or equal to yours, destroy this card. You can only control 1 "Marincess Bubble Blast". You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this card.

texts.name: Bond Between Teacher and Student (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control "Dark Magician": Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your hand or Deck in Defense Position.

texts.name: Marincess Wonder Heart (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ WATER monsters, including "Marincess Crystal Heart"
During damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Marincess" Link Monster equipped to this card; this card cannot be destroyed by that battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle. After that battle, Special Summon the targeted card, but negate its effects. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 "Marincess" Link Monster that was Special Summoned by this effect; equip it to this card. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can activate this effect; until the end of the Damage Step, that opponent's monster is unaffected by card effects, except its own. When another "Marincess" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can change the attack target to this card. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Marincess Crystal Heart" from your GY.

texts.name: Marincess Battle Ocean (Anime)
texts.desc: All "Marincess" monsters you control gain 200 ATK. Monsters equipped with a "Marincess" Link Monster(s) gain ATK equal to the total Link Rating of those equipped monsters x 300. "Marincess" Link Monsters you control that were Link Summoned using "Marincess Crystal Heart" as material are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. If a "Marincess" Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned to the Extra Monster Zone: You can target 1 of those monsters; equip up to 3 "Marincess" Link Monsters with different Link Ratings from your GY to that monster.

texts.name: Marincess Cascade (Anime)
texts.desc: Banish all "Marincess" Link Monsters you control until your next Standby Phase; 1 face-up monster on the field gains ATK equal to the total Link Rating of the Link Monsters banished to activate this card x 300, until the end of this turn. If you control a "Marincess" non-Link Monster, you can activate this card from your hand.

texts.name: Codebreaker Zero Day (Anime)
texts.desc: Effects of Link Monsters linked to this card, except "Codebreaker" monsters, that add or subtract ATK or DEF are reversed. (Additions now subtract, and subtractions now add, instead. Multiplications and divisions, including halving/doubling, are not affected.) If a "Codebreaker" Link Monster(s) on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: Destroy this card.

texts.name: Codebreaker Virus Swordsman (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 "Codebreaker" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned, and is now co-linked: You can target 1 Link Monster on the field; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Codebreaker" monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position to any zone the targeted monster points to.
