At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled an opponent's monster: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 500 ATK for each "Codebreaker" monster on the field, and if it does, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK lost by this effect. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent there from your field this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Codebreaker Virus Swordsman" once per turn.

texts.name: Codebreak Backfire
texts.desc: Monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by battle with "Codebreaker" monsters. If your "Codebreaker" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent. "Codebreaker" monsters your opponent controls cannot attack, they cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, also they cannot be used as material for a Special Summon.

texts.name: Codebreaker Virus Berserker (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ monsters, including a "Codebreaker" Link Monster
If this card is Special Summoned, and is now co-linked: You can Special Summon up to 2 Level 4 or lower "Codebreaker" monsters from your hand and/or GY in Defense Position to your opponent's zone a Link Monster points to. During your Main Phase: You can destroy face-up Spell/Traps your opponent controls, up to the number of "Codebreaker" monsters they control, and if you do, inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each destroyed card. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent there from your field this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Codebreaker Virus Berserker" once per turn.

texts.name: Codebreak Bind
texts.desc: Activate only if you control a "Codebreaker" Link Monster. During your End Phase, if you control no "Codebreaker" Link Monsters, destroy this card. Your opponent's monsters that are not linked to a "Codebreaker" monster cannot attack. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, and is now linked to a "Codebreaker" monster: You can activate this effect; if that opponent's monster destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY this turn, send this card on the field to the GY, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.

texts.name: Link Cancel
texts.desc: Target 1 Link Monster on the field that was Link Summoned using only Link Monsters as material; return it to the Extra Deck, then, if all the Link Materials that were used for its Link Summon are in your GY, you can Special Summon all of them.

texts.name: Cyberse Pride
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if your Cyberse monster battles an opponent's monster: Target that Cyberse monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle this turn, also if it battles an opponent's monster with higher ATK, pay LP equal to the difference in ATK, and if you do, it gains ATK equal the LP you paid, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Link Satellite
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Link Monster you control; place Satellite Counters on this card equal to that monster's Link Rating. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card. Neither player can declare an attack. Once per turn, during your End Phase, remove 1 Satellite Counter from this card. When the last Satellite Counter(s) is removed from this card, destroy it.

texts.name: Kagetokage (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. When you Normal Summon a Level 4 monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.

texts.name: Salamangreat Pyro Phoenix (Anime)
texts.desc:
2+ FIRE Effect Monsters
If this card is Link Summoned using "Salamangreat Pyro Phoenix" as material: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. You can only use each of the following effects of "Salamangreat Pyro Phoenix" once per turn.
 You can target 1 Link Monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to their field, but change its ATK to 0.
 If a Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can target 1 of those monsters; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK.

texts.name: Salamangreat Shrine

"Salamangreat" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's FIRE monsters' effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Salamangreat Shrine" once per turn.
 If you Link Summon a "Salamangreat" Link Monster, you can use 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control with its same name as the entire material.
 You can reveal 1 "Salamangreat Sanctuary" in your hand; shuffle your entire hand into the Deck, then draw the same number of cards.

3 Level 4 monsters

 When your opponent takes battle damage: You can detach all Xyz Materials from this card; inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Xyz Material detached.

texts.desc:
"Elemental HERO Avian" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Bubbleman"
Must be Fusion Summoned. If this card would be destroyed by battle, you can send 1 other card you control to the Graveyard, instead.

texts.name: Chronomaly Technology (Anime)

You can only use this effect of "Estrangement Dragon" once per turn. While you control another monster, monsters cannot target this card for attacks.

texts.name: Scapegoat (Manga)

texts.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; reduce that target's Level by 1.

If this card in the Field Zone is destroyed by card effect: Destroy all monsters you control.

texts.name: Pikari @Ignister (Anime)

2 Level 4 monsters, including a LIGHT monster

3 Cyberse monsters, including a DARK monster

2+ monsters with 1500 or more ATK that have different Attributes

Once per turn: You can place 1 counter on this card (max. 1). While this card has a counter, it is unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can remove 1 counter from this card, then target 1 Effect Monster you control; until the end of this turn, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 other monster on the field; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "@Ignister Token" (Cyberse/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your zone this card points to.

texts.desc:
2+ Cyberse monsters, including a FIRE monster
During damage calculation, if this card attacks: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage from that battle. If this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Fire Phoenix @Ignister" once per turn. Once per turn, during the next Standby Phase after this effect was activated: You can Special Summon this card from your GY.

texts.desc: After damage calculation, if your FIRE monster was destroyed by battle: You can banish this card from your GY; destroy that monster you control.

Spell/Trap in your GY, except "A.I.dle Reborn"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "A.I.dle Reborn" once per turn.

You can only use each effect of "Hiyari @Ignister" once per turn.

texts.name: A.I. Shadow (Anime)

Once per turn, after damage calculation, if your "@Ignister" monster battled an opponent's monster: You can destroy that opponent's monster. If this face-up card leaves the field: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "A.I. Shadow" once per turn.

texts.desc:

 The damage inflicted by that effect becomes 0.
 Double the damage inflicted by that effect.
You can only use 1 "Donyoribo @Ignister" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

During your opponent's Battle Phase, if the first attack this Phase is declared involving 2 Link Monsters: You can banish this card from your GY; end the Battle Phase. You can only activate 1 "TA.I.med Technique" per turn.

texts.name: HA.I.
texts.desc: During the opponent's turn in which you took effect damage, if a monster battles another monster, during damage calculation: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to twice the difference in ATK between those 2 battling monsters, then destroy the opponent's attacking monster. You can only activate 1 "HA.I." per turn.

texts.desc: When this Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: You can change it to face-up Defense Position. If a monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. If this card is banished: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 600 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Marincess Basilalima" once per turn.

If the equipped monster is a "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control that was Link Summoned using a monster with its same name as material, when it destroys an opponent's monster by its attack: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to half that opponent's monster's original ATK.

If this card you control returns to your hand: You can target 1 face-up monster in your opponent's Main Monster Zone; return it to your opponent's hand. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Lemming" once per turn.

During the Main or Battle Phase, if a "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control left the field because of an opponent's card effect this turn (Quick Effect): You can target this card and 1 Level 4 or lower "Salamangreat" monster in your GY, except "Salamangreat Zebroid X"; Special Summon both monsters, but negate their effects (if any), and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Xyz Monster using only those 2 monsters. You can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Zebroid X" once per turn. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
 Gains 300 ATK for each material attached to it.

You can only control 1 "Salamangreat Ring", also destroy "Salamangreat Ring" at the end of the Battle Phase. "Salamangreat" monsters you control are unaffected by the activated effects of your opponent's monsters, also they gain 500 ATK. You can send 1 "Salamangreat" Spell/Trap from your hand to the GY, except "Salamangreat Ring"; Set this card from your GY to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Ring" once per turn.

You can only activate 1 "Salamangreat Geyser" per turn.

The equipped monster is unaffected by your opponent's activated monster effects, except their Link Monsters', also possession of the equipped monster cannot switch. This equipped card cannot be destroyed or banished by card effects. If the equipped monster attacks an opponent's monster, that opponent's monster loses 800 ATK during the Damage Step only. Once per turn, if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can return 1 Link-2 or higher "Salamangreat" monster from your GY to the Extra Deck instead, and if you do, the equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

If a Link Summoned "Salamangreat" Link Monster left the field because of an opponent's card effect this turn, while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster from your GY with a lower Link Rating than the Link Monster that left the field, then negate the effects of all face-up monsters currently on the field until the end of this turn. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed during the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Salamandra" once per turn.

texts.name: Salamangreat Wolvie (Anime)
texts.desc:
A monster that was Link Summoned using this card as material cannot be destroyed by battle or card effect for the rest of that turn. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Salamangreat Wolvie" per turn, and only once that turn.
 If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 card in your GY; add it to your hand.  If this card is added from your GY to your hand by an effect: You can reveal this card, then target 1 card in your GY; add it to your hand.

texts.name: CompromA.I.se

Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "@Ignister" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it.

During the Damage Step, when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card while this card is in your GY and your "Code Talker" monster is battling: You can banish this card from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, "Code Talker" monsters you currently control gain 700 ATK.

texts.name: A.I.'s Show
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target that attacking monster; Special Summon any number of non-Link Cyberse monsters with 2300 ATK from your Extra Deck, whose total ATK is less than or equal to the targeted monster's ATK, to your zones a Link Monster points to, then end the Battle Phase. You can only activate 1 "A.I.'s Show" per turn.

texts.name: FA.I.ghting Spirit
texts.desc: Target 1 "@Ignister" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects. If an "@Ignister" Link Monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead, and if you do, "@Ignister" Link Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects for the rest of this turn.

texts.name: A.I. Contact (Anime)

texts.name: Gussari @Ignister (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Link Monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. During damage calculation, if your "@Ignister" Link Monster battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; each battling monster's ATK becomes 3000 during that damage calculation only, also you can Special Summon 1 "@Ignister" Link Monster from your GY with a lower Link Rating than your Link Monster at the end of the Damage Step. You can only use each effect of "Gussari @Ignister" once per turn.

texts.name: Gatchiri @Ignister (Anime)

 If the effect activation of your monster is negated by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. This activation and effect cannot be negated.
 If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects this turn.

2 Cyberse monsters

1 Link-2 or higher Link Monster

The Link Summoned Link Monster is unaffected by your opponent's card effects, also monsters in the Extra Monster Zones cannot attack while it is face-up on the field.

texts.name: Karmacept Dragon

If a Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can target 1 of those monsters; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Karmacept Dragon" per turn, and only once that turn.
 If the monster equipped with this card by this card's effect is banished: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster this card was equipped to.

You cannot Summon it this turn.

texts.name: T.G. Jet Falcon (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is used as a Synchro Material Monster for a Synchro Summon and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. This card can also be treated as a Machine-Type monster. When a Spell/Trap Card you control targets this card, you can halve this card's original ATK and DEF. When this card is destroyed, you can add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Summon it this turn.

texts.name: Card of Last Will (Anime)
texts.desc: When the ATK of a monster you control changes: Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand.

texts.name: Thunder King Rai-Oh (Manga)
texts.desc: Your opponent cannot Special Summon monsters from their Deck, or add cards from their Deck to their hand, except by their normal draw. When your opponent would Special Summon a monster: You can send this card to the Graveyard; negate the Special Summon, and destroy it.

texts.name: Metaion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. If damage calculation is performed involving this card, at the end of the Battle Phase: Return as many monsters your opponent controls as possible to the hand, and if a card(s) is returned by this effect, inflict 300 damage for each. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Kamion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Shuffle as many monsters your opponent controls as possible into the Deck, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each card returned. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Lazion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Shuffle all monsters your opponent controls and cards in their Graveyard into the Deck. If your opponent draws a card(s) during the Draw Phase: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Hailon, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the difference between your LP and your opponent's. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Gabrion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Shuffle all cards your opponent controls into the Deck. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Sadion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled while you have 4000 or less LP: Make your LP 4000. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Michion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half their LP. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Empty Machine (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Normal Summon Level 10 or higher monsters without Tributing. The ATK of all monsters you control becomes 0.

texts.name: Infinite Machine (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by sending 1 face-up "Empty Machine" from your Spell & Trap Zone to the Graveyard. You can Special Summon any number of Level 10 or higher monsters from your hand. The ATK of all monsters you control become 0.

texts.name: Time Maiden (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) if you control no cards. This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Fairy-Type monster.

texts.name: Sandaion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects. You take no battle damage from battles involving this face-up Attack Position card. If this card battles, after damage calculation: inflict 4000 damage to your opponent. You cannot Summon monsters except by the effect of "Endless Emptiness" or "Infinite Light". During your Standby Phase: shuffle this face-up card you control into the Deck.

texts.name: Raphion, the Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can reduce the battle damage any player takes from an attack involving this Attack Position card to 0. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Return any opponent's monster that battled this card to the hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the returned monster had on the field. You cannot Summon monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Deck.

texts.name: Infinite Light (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by sending 1 face-up "Infinite Machine" from your Spell & Trap Zone to the Graveyard. You can Special Summon any Level 10 or higher monsters from your hand. "Timelord" monsters you control cannot activate their effects during your Standby Phase. If you have Summoned 10 or more "Timelord" monsters with different names during this Duel: you can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Sephylon, the Ultimate Timelord" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard, ignoring the Summoning Conditions.

texts.name: Sephylon, the Ultimate Timelord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by "Infinite Light". Once per turn: You can Special Summon as many "Timelord" monsters as possible from your hand, Deck, and/or Graveyard, and if you do, their ATK becomes 4000. This card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all "Timelord" monsters you control, except "Sephylon, the Ultimate Timelord". If this card battles a monster, that monster has its effects negated. If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 other "Timelord" monster you control instead, and if you make this card unable to be destroyed by battle, you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Jinzo (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: destroy all Trap Cards on the field. Negate the effects of all set or activated Trap Cards on the field and destroy them.

texts.name: Soul Exchange (Anime)
texts.desc: Both players can Tribute monsters currently controlled by their opponent, as if those monsters were under their control.

texts.name: Double Spell (Anime)
texts.desc: Target any number of Spell Card(s) from your opponent's Graveyard that have been activated during the last turn; activate them on your side of the field.

texts.name: Converging Wishes (Anime)
texts.desc: When a "Shooting Star Dragon" you control is destroyed by battle: you can activate this card; you take no battle damage from that battle. Then, Special Summon 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Extra Deck by banishing the appropriate Synchro Material Monsters from your Graveyard (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon.) It gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all Dragon-Type Synchro Monsters in your Graveyard. You can return 1 Synchro Monster from your Graveyard to the Extra Deck to target 1 monster your opponent controls; it must attack a monster you control. During the End Phase: banish this card and the "Stardust Dragon" Special Summoned by this effect.

texts.name: Sabatiel - The Philosopher's Stone (Anime)
texts.desc:
When a "Winged Kuriboh" is destroyed: You can add this card from your Deck to your hand. Pay half your LP; switch this card with 1 card in your Deck or Graveyard. If you activate that card's effect, after it resolves: Add this card to your hand. After switching cards 3 times with this effect, this effect becomes the following.
 Target 1 face-up monster on the field; multiply its ATK by the number of monsters your opponent controls, until the End Phase.

texts.name: Number C101: Silent Honor DARK (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 5 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard while it has Xyz Material: Special Summon this card from your Graveyard, and if you do, gain LP equal to its original ATK. Once per turn: You can attach 1 monster your opponent controls to this card as a face-up Xyz Material. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 101: Silent Honor ARK", it gains this effect.
 You can detach all Xyz Materials from this card; Special Summon 1 "Number 101: Silent Honor ARK" from your Graveyard.
texts.str1: Special Summon this card and gain LP

texts.name: Number 39: Utopia Beyond (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 6 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Cards you control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 39: Utopia", it gains these effects.
 During your Battle Phase, the ATK of all monsters your opponent controls becomes 0.
 During either player's Battle Phase: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; banish 1 face-up Xyz Monster you control, then Special Summon 1 "Number 39: Utopia" from your Graveyard, and if you do, gain Life Points equal to half its ATK.
texts.str1: Banish, then Special Summon and gain LP

texts.name: Number 99: Utopic Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 10 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Number" Xyz Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it. Its effects are negated. During either player's turn, when a card effect is activated that would make this card leave your side of the field: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate that effect, also destroy all other monsters on the field, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined ATK of the destroyed monsters on the field.

texts.name: Number 80: Rhapsody in Berserk (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) and banish all cards of that type from your opponent's Graveyard. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up monster you control; equip this card to it. The equipped monster gains 1200 ATK. While this card is equipped to a monster, if you would take 1000 or more damage: You can destroy this card, then send it to the Graveyard; halve that damage. During your Main Phase, if this card was sent to the Graveyard to activate this effect: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

(This card is always treated as a "Supreme King" card.)

texts.name: Number C80: Requiem in Berserk (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 5 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; banish all cards in your opponent's Monster Card Zones or Spell & Trap Card Zones. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 2000 ATK. If this card is Xyz Summoned by Ranking Up "Number 80: Rhapsody in Berserk", it gains these effects.
 While this card is equipped to a monster, if the equipped monster battles a monster, that monster's effects are negated.
 While this card is equipped to a monster, if the equipped monster would be destroyed OR, if you would take damage from a card effect, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead. During your Main Phase, if this card was sent to the Graveyard by this effect: You can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

(This card is always treated as a "Supreme King" card.)

texts.name: Divine Evolution (Manga)
texts.desc: This card's activation and effect cannot be negated. All face-up monsters with Divine Hierarchy you control that are not affected by another "Divine Evolution" gain 1000 ATK and DEF and their Divine Hierachy is increased by 1.

texts.name: Destiny Board (Manga)
texts.desc: Activate only when a "Dark Necrofear" is sent to the Graveyard. During your opponent's End Phase, while you have a "Dark Necrofear" in your Graveyard, add 1 letter from "D", "E", "A", "T", and "H" in the proper order to this card. If this card has "D", "E", "A", "T", and "H" in the proper order, you win the Duel.

texts.name: Champion's Majesty
texts.desc: Activate only while you have 3 or more "Champion" cards in your Graveyard. Negate the effects of all card your opponent controls. Each time it destroys a monster: it gains 500 ATK. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

texts.name: Malefic Blue-Eyes White Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck to your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Red-Eyes Black Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending 1 "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" from your Deck to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Cyber End Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending 1 "Cyber End Dragon" from your Extra Deck to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Selector (Anime)
texts.desc: Banish 2 "Malefic" monsters from your Graveyard; Add 2 "Malefic" cards from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Malefic Parallel Gear (Anime)
texts.desc: If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Rainbow Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending 1 "Rainbow Dragon" from your Deck to your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During either player's turn: you can send all other monsters you control to the Graveyard; this card gains 1000 ATK for each "Malefic" monster sent. You can banish all "Malefic" monsters in your Graveyard; shuffle all cards on the field to the Deck. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.
texts.str1: Send all "Malefic" monsters you control to the Graveyard
texts.str2: Banish all "Malefic" monsters in your Graveyard

texts.name: Malefic Paradox Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 "Malefic" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Malefic" monster
When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 Synchro Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, ignoring the Summoning conditions. All face-up monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the total ATK of all other face-up Synchro Monsters you control. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Stardust Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Extra Deck to your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field: you can Tribute this card; negate its activation, and if you do, destroy it. During the End Phase of a turn you activated this effect: you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Malefic Truth Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Malefic Paradigm Shift", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When a "Malefic" monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: destroy all monsters your opponent controls and inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed this way. If this card would be destroyed, you can banish 1 "Malefic" monster from your Graveyard instead. If "Malefic World" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Beast-borg Medal of the Crimson Chain
texts.desc: If you control no "Beastborg" monsters, destroy this card. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck to your opponent's side of the field: You can target 1 of those monsters; it cannot attack, change its battle position, or be destroyed by battle. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. While this card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, or activate Spell/Trap Cards.

texts.name: Majestic Red Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Majestic Dragon" + "Red Dragon Archfiend " + 1 non-Tuner monster
Once per turn: you can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effect(s), and this card gains ATK equal to that monster's ATK, until the End Phase. When your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy this card: negate its activation and destroy it. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK. If this card attacks, after damage calculation: destroy all Defense Position monsters on the field. During the End Phase: target 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Graveyard; return this card from the field to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon that target.

texts.name: Dark Strike Fighter (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 monster, except this card, to inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 200. If you activate this effect, this card cannot declare an attack.

texts.name: Graveyard Rebound
texts.desc: For the rest of this turn, you can activate Spells/Traps from your Graveyard. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect, at the start of your next turn: Shuffle this card from your Graveyard into the Deck.

texts.name: Soul-Binding Gate (Anime)
texts.desc: When a monster that has lower ATK than your Life Points is Summoned face-up on the field: destroy it, and inflict 800 damage to both players.

texts.name: DZW - Chimera Clad (Anime)
texts.desc: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field, then target 1 "Number C39: Utopia Ray" monster you control; equip this monster from your hand or your side of the field to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster, negate the equipped monster's original effects. The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle. When you take battle damage from a battle involving the equipped monster: You can make the equipped monster's ATK becomes double its current ATK, and if you do, it can attack again in a row.

texts.name: Ecole de Zone (Anime)
texts.desc: Monsters cannot attack directly. When a monster is Summoned, except by this card's effect: negate the Summon and destroy that monster. Then, Special Summon 1 "Mask Token" (Spellcaster-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK ?/DEF ?) to the destroyed monster's controller's side of the field. The ATK and DEF of the "Mask Token" are equal to the respective ATK and DEF of the destroyed monster.

texts.name: Hand-Holding Genie (Anime)
texts.desc: You can only control 1 face-up "Hand-Holding Genie". Your opponent cannot target another face-up monster you control for an attack. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, it gains DEF equal to the total DEF of all other face-up monsters you control.

texts.name: Late Penalty (Anime)
texts.desc: If your opponent controls no monsters during their Standby Phase: they cannot conduct their Battle Phase this turn.

texts.name: White Veil (Anime)
texts.desc: If the equipped monster attacks, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls and negate their effect(s). When the equipped monster is destroyed: its controller takes damage equal to the equipped monster's ATK.

texts.name: Dark Matter (Anime)
texts.desc: When a Dark Synchro Monster you control is destroyed: Draw 2 cards and Set them in Defense Position in your Monster Card Zones.

texts.name: Jurassic Impact (Anime)
texts.desc: If your LP is lower than your opponent's: Destroy all monsters on the field. Then, each player takes 1000 damage for each of their monsters destroyed by this effect. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can Normal or Special Summon monsters.

texts.name: Central Shield (Anime)
texts.desc: If a monster you control is attacked, except the equipped monster, you take no Battle Damage from that battle. Your opponent cannot attack directly.

texts.name: Future Fusion (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is activated: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your Deck as Fusion Materials, and equip it with this card. The Monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot battle that turn, also, it cannot be tributed. When this card is destroyed, destroy that monster.

texts.name: Sorcerer of Dark Magic (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 Level 6 or higher Spellcaster-Type monsters, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When a Trap Card or effect is activated: You can negate its activation and destroy it. Once per battle, if this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can target the monster this card is battling; that monster loses 500 ATK for each Spellcaster-Type monster in your Graveyard that was sent there from the field.

texts.name: Clear Vice Dragon (Anime)
texts.desc: This card is not treated as a DARK monster while it is face-up on the field. If this card attacks, it gains ATK equal to twice the ATK of the monster it battles until the end of the Damage Step. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. When a card or effect is activated that would destroy this card: you can discard 1 card; negate its activation, and destroy it. If this card would be destroyed by battle, you can discard 1 card instead.

texts.name: Empress's Staff (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate it and end the Battle Phase. Then, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If you control no monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.

texts.name: Malefic Divide (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 "Malefic" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but banish it during the End Phase of this turn.

texts.name: Malefic Force (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It is unaffected by the effects of your opponent's Spell Cards.

texts.name: Horse of the Floral Knights (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: you can draw 1 card.

texts.name: Power Wall (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Send any number of cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard; You take 100 less battle damage for each card you sent to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Magical Alms
texts.desc: When you activate this card: gain 1000 Life Points. During each player's turn: the turn player guesses how many Spell Cards they will activate for the rest of that turn, then both players gains that amount of Life Points x500. During each player's End Phase, if the turn player activated less Spell Cards than they predicted: they take damage equal to the guessed number x1000.

texts.name: Dark Summoning Beast (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Tribute this card to target 1 "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames", "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder", and "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms" in your Graveyard; Special Summon them, ignoring all the Summoning conditions. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect.

texts.name: Harpie Lady Phoenix Formation (Anime)
texts.desc: Destroy monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of "Harpie Lady" you control. Then your opponent loses Life Points equal to the total ATK of the destroyed monster(s). "Harpie" monsters cannot declare an attack this turn.

texts.name: Infernity Des Gunman (Anime)
texts.desc:
When your opponent activates an effect that would inflict damage, if you have no cards in your hand: you can banish this card from your Graveyard; you take no damage. Then, your opponent chooses to apply the following effect.
 Excavate the top card of your Deck. If it is a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the amount of effect damage you took this turn plus the damage you would have taken. If it is a Spell or Trap Card, you take damage equal to the amount of effect damage you took this turn. If your opponent does not choose to apply this effect, you take no effect damage this turn.

texts.name: Evil 1
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if a monster you control battles an opponent's monster: Activate this card; monsters cannot be destroyed by this battle, also the battle damage taken becomes equal to the Life Points of the player who would take that damage -1. During your Main Phase: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, skip this turn's Battle Phase.

texts.name: Final Attack Orders (Anime)
texts.desc: All face-up monsters on the field are changed to Attack Position and cannot change their Battle Position. When this card is activated: both players choose 3 cards in their Decks. Send the rest of both player's Decks to the Graveyards and the players return the chosen cards in any order.

texts.name: Yomi Boat Watchman
texts.desc:
When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: inflict 800 damage to your opponent. If you controlled this card when it was destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, then while this card is in the Graveyard, it gains this effect.
 When an opponent's monster declares an attack: you can target 1 "Yomi" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.

texts.name: Kiteroid (Anime)
texts.desc: If you would take battle damage from a direct attack, you can discard this card instead. Once per Duel, if you would take battle damage from a direct attack while this card is in the Graveyard: you can reduce that battle damage to 0.

texts.name: Chosen One (Anime)
texts.desc: Choose 1 Monster Card and 2 non-Monster Cards in your hand. Your opponent randomly choose 1 of those cards. If it is the Monster Card, Special Summon it, ignoring the Summoning Conditions, and send the 2 other cards to the Graveyard. Otherwise, send all 3 cards to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Underworld Circle
texts.desc: Destroy all monsters on the field and banish all monsters in both players' Decks. Each player can activate this effect (Quick Effect): the player who activated this effect Special Summons 1 monster from their Graveyard, also the other player can Special Summon 1 monster from their Graveyard. Each player can Special Summon with this effect of "Underworld Circle" once per turn. This effect can only be activated once in the same Chain. Monsters can be Summoned ignoring the Summoning conditions. If a Normal or Special Summoned monster is destroyed, banish it.

texts.name: Card Hexative
texts.desc: Face-down Spells/Traps your opponent currently controls cannot be activated.

texts.name: Jinzo - Lord (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 1 face-up "Jinzo" you control to the Graveyard. Trap Cards cannot be activated and the effects of all Trap Cards on the field are negated. Once per turn: you can look at all cards in your opponent's hand and Spell & Trap Card Zones, and destroy all Trap Cards among those. Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed by this effect.

texts.name: Anti-Magic Arrows (Anime)
texts.desc: Your opponent cannot activate face-down Spell or Trap Cards this turn. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

texts.name: Virus Cannon (Anime)
texts.desc: Your opponent sends 10 Spells from their hand or Deck to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Infernity Zero (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by its own effect, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If your Life Points become 0 by taking damage from a card effect: you can discard all other cards in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. While you control this face-up card, you do not lose the Duel even if your Life Points become 0. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Place 1 Des Counter on this card for each 500 damage you take. texts.name: Fog Castle (Anime)

texts.name: Thorn Prisoner Van
texts.desc: When this card is targeted for an attack: You can reveal 1 "Thorn Prisoner" monster from your hand and pay 400 LP; you take no battle damage from this battle. At the end of the Damage Step, Special Summon both this card from your Graveyard and the revealed "Thorn Prisoner" monster from your hand, in Attack Position.

texts.name: Thorn Prisoner Darli
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your opponent's Battle Phase, when an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control another "Thorn Prisoner" monster: You can pay 400 LP; negate the attack.

texts.name: Thorn Observer Zuma
texts.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 "Thorn Prisoner" monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: Place 1 Thorn Counter on all monsters on the field. While this card is on the field, monsters with Thorn Counters cannot attack, also during each player's End Phase, the turn player takes 400 damage for each Thorn Counter on their field. When this card is targeted for an attack while all of the monsters that were used for the Synchro Summon of this card are in your Graveyard: You can pay 400 LP, then target all of those monsters; you take no battle damage from this battle. At the end of the Damage Step, Special Summon this card and those targets from your Graveyard, in Attack Position.

texts.name: Thorn Overserver Vandarlizuma
texts.desc:
"Thorn Prisoner Van" + "Thorn Prisoner Darli" + "Thorn Observer Zuma"
This card's ATK becomes double the deficit between your current LP and 2500. Once per turn: You can pay 100 LP, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; that target's ATK becomes 100 until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Chaos Ancient Gear Fusion
texts.desc: Send 1 "Polymerization" from your hand to the Graveyard, then reveal 1 "Ancient Gear" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck; banish a number of monsters from your Graveyard that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck equal to its number of Fusion Materials, and if you do, Special Summon its Fusion Materials from your Deck, Extra Deck or Graveyard, ignoring their Summoning conditions, but their effects are negated. Then, Fusion Summon the chosen Fusion Monster, using the Summoned monsters as the Fusion Materials.

texts.name: Forceful Deal
texts.desc: When your opponent Summons a monster: Pay half your LP, and Tribute all monsters you control; take control of all monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Deep Forest
texts.desc: Level 4 or lower Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior-Type monster(s) on the field cannot be targeted for an attack.

texts.name: Chameleon Colors
texts.desc: While there is a Field Spell on the field, the equipped monster can attack directly.

texts.name: Blood Curse
texts.desc: When a monster you control is destroyed: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Vampire" monster from your Deck.

texts.name: Antlion
texts.desc: A monster attacking this card loses 500 ATK during the Damage Step.

texts.name: Forced Withdrawal
texts.desc: Return 1 attacking monster to its owner's hand.

texts.name: Space Megatron
texts.desc: A robot that is constructed primarily with sets of semicircles. It attacks with lasers mounted at its sides and the center.

texts.name: Insect Larva
texts.desc: An infant that hatched from an egg laid by the Insect Queen.

texts.name: Agathion
texts.desc: You take no piercing damage from a battle involving this card.

texts.name: Amulet of Affection
texts.desc: You take no battle damage in a battle involving the equipped monster and an opponent's monster.

texts.name: All-Seeing Eye
texts.desc: Look at all face-down cards your opponent controls, then return it to its original position.

texts.name: Alpha-Wave Emission
texts.desc: Monsters on the field cannot declare an attack and loses 300 ATK.

texts.name: Poison Crossbow
texts.desc: When the equipped monster attacks: destroy the attack target without applying damage calculation.

texts.name: Invincible Demise Lord
texts.desc: Once per Duel, if this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: you can Special Summon it during the End Phase. If this card is Special Summoned by this effect, its ATK becomes 3000, and it cannot be destroyed by card effects.

texts.name: Dark Spell Regeneration (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 Spell from either player's Graveyard; activate it, then, send it to your opponent's Graveyard.

texts.name: Trap Booster
texts.desc: Discard 1 card; This turn, you can activate 1 Trap Card from your hand.

texts.name: Hero's Rule 1: Five Freedoms
texts.desc:
Target 5 cards in the Graveyard(s); banish them.

(This card is always treated as a "Rose" card.)

texts.name: Hope for Escape (Anime)
texts.desc: While your LP are lower than your opponent's: Pay 1000 LP; draw 1 card for each 1000 LP deficit between your LP and your opponent's.

texts.name: Boom Shark
texts.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked or was attacked: Destroy this card, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK on the field. If you control another monster, destroy this card.

texts.name: Sneak Giant
texts.desc: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing, by Special Summoning 1 Level 1 monster from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Elemental HERO Bubbleman (Anime)
texts.desc: If this is the only card in your hand, you can Special Summon this card. If this card is Summoned, if you control no other cards: You can draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Narrow Tunnel
texts.desc:
Each player can only Summon 1 monster to their side of the field per turn. If a player controls 2 or more monsters, they must destroy monsters they control until they only control 1.

(This card is always treated as an "Earth" card.)

texts.name: The Legendary Gambler
texts.desc: When your opponent rolls a six-sided die to activate a card or effect, you can roll a six-sided die. If your die result is higher than your opponent's, negate your opponent's card effect.

texts.name: Cutter Shark
texts.desc: When a monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can Tribute that monster; Special Summon this card from your hand in face-up Defense Position.
texts.str1: Do you want to Special Summon this card?

texts.name: Performapal Elephammer (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card declares an attack: You can return all Spells/Traps your opponent controls to the hand.

texts.name: Infernity Climber
texts.desc: If you have no cards in your hand while this card is in the Graveyard (Quick Effect): You can return this card to the top of your Deck.

texts.name: Poseidon Wave (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate the attack, and if you control a WATER monster, inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Extreme Pressure Power
texts.desc: Target 1 monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, send it to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: Deepest Impact
texts.desc: Destroy all monsters on the field, also, halve both players' LP.

texts.name: Zeta Reticulant (Manga)
texts.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon 2 "Eva Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 2/ATK 500/DEF 300).

texts.name: Labor Pain
texts.desc: Each player must pay 1000 LP to Normal Summon a monster.

texts.name: Twin Gunfighter
texts.desc: After damage calculation, if this card attacks: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's ATK.
texts.str1: Inflict damage equal to this card's ATK

texts.name: Right-Hand Shark (Manga)
texts.desc: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Depth Biter
texts.desc: If your opponent controls a face-up Xyz Monster, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.

texts.name: Amazoness Chain Master (Anime)
texts.desc: When this Attack Position card is sent to the Graveyard: You can pay 1000 LP; look at your opponent's Deck, then add 1 monster from their Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Skull Kraken (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can destroy 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

texts.name: Doppelganger Shark
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Target 1 WATER monster you control; this card's name becomes that monster's name, also that target can attack directly.

texts.name: Aqua Jet (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 WATER monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

texts.name: Depth Eruption
texts.desc: If you control a WATER Xyz Monster: Destroy all cards on the field.

texts.name: Card of Ascension
texts.desc:
Send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard; add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell from your Deck to your hand.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" and an "Earth" card.)

texts.name: Multiply (Anime)
texts.desc: Special Summon any number of copies in the same position of 1 monster you control with 500 or less ATK.

texts.name: Blaster Ogre
texts.desc: Twice per turn: you can destroy 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK and inflict damage to your opponent equal to half of the destroyed monster's ATK. (If it's a tie, you get to choose.)
texts.str1: Destroy 1 faceup Attack position monster you opponent controls.

texts.name: Full Armor Ogre
texts.desc: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: you can Special Summon 1 "Gatling Ogre" from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Big Cannon Ogre
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing "Gatling Ogre" while there is a "Full Armor Ogre" in your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Double all battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent. When this card is destroyed: Special Summon 1 "Full Armor Ogre" from your Graveyard.

texts.name: Rusted Blade - Rust Edge
texts.desc: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 800 ATK. When the monster equipped with this card is destroyed: inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Amplifier (Anime)
texts.desc: Equip only to "Jinzo". It gains 500 ATK. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, the equipped monster gains 300 more ATK.

texts.name: Soul Guide
texts.desc: Tribute 1 monster; Choose either its ATK or DEF and gain that amount of LP, then add 1 monster with the same name as the Tributed monster from your Deck to your hand.
texts.str1: Please select the effect you want to apply
texts.str2: Gain Life Points by amount of ATK
texts.str3: Gain Life Points by amount of DEF

texts.name: Synkron Resonator (Anime)
texts.desc: If your opponent controls a face-up Synchro Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand.

texts.name: Dimension Switch
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster you control; banish it. You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard to return that monster to the field.

texts.name: Gear Changer
texts.desc: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is Summoned: you can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; increase this card's Level by that monster's Level.
texts.str1: Do you want to increase this cadr's level?

texts.name: Card Breaker (Anime)
texts.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in Attack Position by destroying 1 card in the Spell & Trap Zone.

texts.name: Blackboost (Anime)
texts.desc: While you control 2 or more "Blackwing" monsters: Draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Black Feather Beacon (Anime)
texts.desc: When you take damage: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackwing" monster from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Black Wing
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Banish 1 "Blackwing" monster from your Graveyard; negate the attacks of opponent's monsters with 2000 or more ATK this turn. If you have exactly 2 "Black Wing" in your Graveyard including this card: You can banish this card and 1 other "Black Wing" from your Graveyard; destroy 1 Synchro Monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the opponent's destroyed monster had on the field.

texts.name: Muko (Anime)
texts.desc: When your opponent draws a card(s): Send those card(s) to the Graveyard.
texts.str1: Negate draw and send it to the graveyard.
texts.str2: Negate the Summon and send it to the graveyard.
texts.str3: Negate the Activation and send it to the graveyard.

texts.name: Cards for Black Feathers (Anime)
texts.desc: Send 1 "Blackwing" monster from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards.
texts.str1: Send 1 "Blackwing" to grave to draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Stardust Flash (Anime)
texts.desc: During the turn a "Stardust Dragon" was Tributed to activate its effect: Special Summon that "Stardust Dragon".

texts.name: Offside Trap
texts.desc: When a monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, if you control no other cards in your Spell & Trap Zone: Special Summon that monster from your Graveyard, also you take no battle damage from that battle, then it becomes the end of this turn.

texts.name: Defending Sweeper
texts.desc: While "Stadium of Dreams" is on the field, this card's Level is increased by 1.

texts.name: Perfect Pass
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; negate the effects of any monster it battles, also if it attacks an opponent's monster whose DEF is higher than that target's ATK, double that target's ATK. These changes last until the End Phase.

texts.name: Eye Contact
texts.desc: Target 1 "Offside Trap" in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

texts.name: Narukami Waterfall
texts.desc: Neither player can send monsters from their hands to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Grave Arm
texts.desc: Target 1 monster on the field; send it to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Synchronic Ability
texts.desc: The equipped monster gains the effects of all monsters on the field with the same Type as the equipped monster.

texts.name: Laminate Armor
texts.desc: The equipped monster gains 1000 DEF. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead, and if you do, you take no battle damage from that battle.

texts.name: Owner's Seal (Anime)
texts.desc: Return control of all cards on the field to their original owners.

texts.name: Aquaactress Tetra (Anime)
texts.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can add 1 "Aquaactress Tetra" from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Aquarium Lighting (Anime)
texts.desc: During damage calculation, if an "Aquaactress" monster battles a monster: Double its current ATK, during that damage calculation only.

texts.name: Aquarium Set (Anime)
texts.desc: All "Aquaactress" monsters on the field gain 600 ATK.

texts.name: Shutter Layer 1
texts.desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster. (Its name, Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF become that target's name, Type, Attribute, original ATK, and original DEF, respectively). When that target leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Number 3: Cicada King (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 Level 3 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle except with "Number" monsters. When a monster effect is activated on your opponent's side of the field: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate that monster's effects, and if you do, this card gains 500 DEF.

(This card is always treated as an "Earth" card.)

texts.name: Giant Flood
texts.desc: During your Main Phase 1: Send all monsters on the field and from both players' hands to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Dream Cicada
texts.desc: If you control a face-up Attack Position Insect-Type monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When you do: Change 1 face-up Attack Position Insect-Type monster you control to face-up Defense Position.

texts.name: Cicada Illusion
texts.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Insect-Type monster you control in Defense Position. It cannot be destroyed by battle. When its battle position is changed: It gains ATK equal to its DEF. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

texts.name: Release Lease
texts.desc: If you control only 1 monster: Tribute that 1 monster; add 1 Level 3 monster from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Lightning Hoverboard
texts.desc: You can Tribute this card; add 1 Level 6 or higher monster from your Deck to your hand.
texts.str1: Tribute this card to Add 1 Level 6 or higher monster

texts.name: Tribute Trade
texts.desc: Tribute 1 monster that has a Level; add from your Deck to your hand, 1 monster that is 1 Level higher than that monster you Tributed.
texts.str1: Tribute this card to Add 1 monster

texts.name: Pillager
texts.desc: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose 1 card in it and add it to your hand.

texts.name: Dragon Nails
texts.desc: Equip only to a DARK Dragon-Type monster. It gains 600 ATK.

texts.name: Dark Spear
texts.desc: Equip only to "Dark Magician". If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Kung Fu Nyan Nyan
texts.desc: During your Standby Phase, if this face-up Attack Position card did not attack during your last turn: it gains 300 ATK . If this card attacks after gaining ATK this way, it loses 300 ATK during the End Phase.

texts.name: Luminous Clouds
texts.desc: Tribute 1 "Master Kyonshee" and 1 "Kung Fu Nyan Nyan"; Special Summon 1 "Dragon Lady" from your hand or Deck.

texts.name: Dragon Lady
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Luminous Clouds". Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. This card cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect.

texts.name: Magical Academy
texts.desc: Discard 2 cards; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand, that can be Normal Summoned/Set, by Tributing the same number of monsters needed for a Tribute Summon, then increase its Level by 2 and ATK by 500, also, negate the effects of your opponent's Spells/Traps that target the Summoned monster this turn.

texts.name: Yosen Whirlwind (Anime)
texts.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP. Each time a "Yosenju" monster(s) you control is returned to the hand, you can return an equal number of cards your opponent controls to the hand. Once per turn, during your End Phase, if a "Yosenju" monster is not returned to the hand, destroy this card.

texts.name: Fluffal Sheep (Anime)
texts.desc: If you control a "Fluffal" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is returned from the field or Graveyard to your hand: You can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.

texts.name: Frightfur Factory (Anime)
texts.desc: You can banish 1 "Polymerization" or "Fusion" card from your Graveyard; Fusion Summon 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

texts.name: Blocken
texts.desc: If another monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can change the target to this card. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 "Lengard" from your Deck.

texts.name: Lengard
texts.desc: If you would take battle damage from a battle involving a monster you control, you can destroy this face-up card instead.

texts.name: Magnet Reverse (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 Rock-Type or Machine-Type monster in your Graveyard that was sent to your Graveyard this turn; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position.

texts.name: Suture Rebirth (Anime)
texts.desc: Target 1 "Fluffal" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

texts.name: Edge Imp Saw (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Fluffal" monster from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Frightfur Fusion (Anime)
texts.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, banishing monsters on your side of the field or Graveyard as Fusion Materials.

texts.name: Frightfur Defender
texts.desc: If a "Frightfur" monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect: That monster is not destroyed, also it gains 800 ATK.

texts.name: Frightfur Chimera (Anime)
texts.desc:
3 "Frightfur" monsters
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon that opponent's monster to your side of the field. Gains 300 ATK for each monster you control that was Special Summoned by this effect. When this card battles: You can activate this effect; your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Battle Phase.

texts.name: Frightfur Leo (Anime)
texts.desc:
"Fluffal Leo" + "Edge Imp Saw"
Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that opponent's monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK.

texts.name: Edge Imp Sabres (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Fluffal" monster you control; return that target to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Fluffal" monster from your hand.

texts.name: Full Moon
texts.desc: Equip only to a Beast-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK/DEF.

texts.name: Jelly Hole
texts.desc: When your opponent Special Summons a WATER Xyz Monster: Negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls, until the end of the turn.

texts.name: Swordstalker (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is Summoned and a monster(s) you control was destroyed by battle last turn: You can make this card gains ATK equal to 20% of its current ATK.
